svm dico apostolvs et signvm accipio circvmcisio signacvlvm ivstitia fides qvintvs ergo et iste circvmcisio inter alivs figvra propheticvs de christvs scribo moses de qvi ipse dico de ego enim ille scribo vnvs diebvs qvippe iste qvi septenarivs nvmervs in orbis redeo devs svvs nomen gens impono o de qvi aio apostolvs qvi colo et servio creo potivs qvam creator qvintvs qvis in hic pars etiam vos imitor nisi qvod cvm is lvcidvs dvo lvmen cetervs vero sidvs non cvm is adoro vnvs sed et mensis impono nomen devs svvs qvadrantal propter honor qvippe romvlvs qvia is mars filivs credo primvs mensis mars dico mars voco o et inde aprilis nvllvs devs svvs nomen sed ab res ipse qvasi aperilis qvi tvnc mvltvs germen aperio in flos vnvs inde tertivs mensis maiores qvi maivs mercvrivs mater dea colo qvintvs inde qvartvs ivnivm ab ivno inde ceteri vsqve ad december ab nvmervs nomino vnvs sed is is qvintilis atqve sextilis nomen homo qvi divinvs honor decerno appello svm ivliter et avgvstvs vnvs nam septimvs september et ceteri vt dico vsqve ad december nvmervs ex ordo nomen envntio qvintvs porro ianvarivs ab ianvs appello svm febrvarivs ab febrvis sacrvm lvpercvs qvintvs volo ergo vt et vos dico in mensis martio mars colo ille enim mensis bema vester cvm magnvs festivitas celebro vnvs si avtem nos in mensis martio licet arbitror alivs considero non mars cvr ex dies septimvs qvi sabbo ab reqvies nomino svm divinvs scriptvra satvrnvs importo conor qvia is dies satvrnvs gens appello nempe iam video cvm qvantvs impietas deliro vnvs de sacrificivm avtem animal qvis nos nescio magis is perverto popvlvs congrventer impono qvam devs desidero offero sed tamen etiam in hic figvra noster svm qvia noster mvndatio et devs propitiatio nos sine sangvis nvllvs svm o sed ille figvra veritas christvs svm qvi sangvis redimo et mvndatvs svm qvintvs nam in figvra eloqvivm divina et tavrvs dico svm propter virtvs crvx qvi cornv impivs ventilo et aries propter innocentia principatvs et hircvs propter similitvdo caro peccatvm vt de peccatvm damno peccatvm o et si qvis alivs sacrificivm genvs expressvs commemoro in is qvoqve tv christvs prophetatvs svm monstro vnvs qvocirca sive circvmcisivm sive sabbatvm sive differentia cibvs sive immolatio sacrificivm omnis hic figvra noster svm et prophetiae qvi christvs non solvo sed adimplo venio cvm is qvi hic praenvntio impleo qvintvs ia vero ille qvi antiqvi dico svm ocvlvs pro ocvlvs dens pro dens qvomodo contrarivm habeo qvi aio dominvs ego avtem dico vos non resisto malo  sed si qvis tv percvtio in magnilla tvvs dextera praebeo ille et alter et cetera qvando qvidem et ille antiqvvs ad reprimo flamma odivm saevio qvovs immoderatvs animvs refreno ita praeceptvm svm qvis enim tandem facile contentvs svm tantvm repono vindicta qvantvm accipio inivria nonne video homo leviter laedo molior caedes sitio sangvis vix qvove invenio in malvm inimicvs vnde satio qvis pvgnvs percvtio non avt ivdicivm concito in damnatio is qvi percvtio avt si ipse percvtio volo totvs homo etiam si non telvm aliqvis arripio pvgnvs calx qvove contvndo hic igitvr immoderatvs ac per hic inivstvs vltio lex ivstvs modvs figo poena talio institvo hic svm vt qvalis qvisqve infero inivria talis svpplicivm pendo vnvs proinde ocvlvs pro ocvlvs dens pro dens non fomes sed limes fvror svm non vt is qvi sopio svm hinc accendo sed ne is qvi ardeo vltra extendo impono qvadrantal svm enim qvidam vindicta ivstvs ivste qvovs debeo is qvi svm passvs inivria vnvs vnde vtiqve cvm ignosco de noster qvidam modvs ivs largior vnvs vnde etiam debeo dico qvi in oratio dominicvs hvmanitvs dimitto moneo vt nos et noster divinitvs dimitto qvintvs qvis avtem debeo etsi benigne remitto non tamen iniqve repeto vnvs sed sicvt in ivro etiam qvi vervm ivro propinqvo peivrivs vnde longe absvm qvi omnino non ivro o et qvamvis non pecco qvi vervm ivro remotvs tamen ab peccatvm svm qvi non ivro vnde admonitio non ivro conservatio svm ab peccatvm peivrivs ita cvm pecco qvi per immoderatio inivste volo vindico non pecco avtem qvi modvs adhibeo ivste volo vindico remotvs svm ab peccatvm inivstvs vindicta qvi non volo omnino vindico vnvs pecco enim qvi exigo vltra debeo o non pecco avtem qvi exigo debitvm sed tvtvs longe svm ab peccatvm inivstvs exactor qvi omnino non exigo debeo praesertim ne cogo et ipse reddo debeo ab is qvi nvllvs habeo debeo vnvs apostolvs aio devs saecvlvm hic excaeco mens infidelis qvintvs qvi qvidem sententia pleriqve noster ita distingvo vt devs vervm dico excaeco infidelis mens pentvm cvm enim lego in qvi devs svspendo pronvntiatio ce at tvnc infero saecvlvm hic excaeco mens infidelis qvintvs qvia etsi ita non distingvo sed expono gratia ita verbvm ordo mvto in qvi devs excaeco mens infidelis saecvlvm hic idem qvi in ille distinctio sensvs elvceo qvadranta possvm enim etiam talis operatio qvi excaeco mens infidelis secvndvm qvidam modvs pertineo ad vervm devs qvintvs qvi non facio malitia sed ivstitia sicvt idem pavlvs alibi dico nvmqvid iniqvvs devs qvi infero ira item alibi qvis ergo dico inqvio  nvmqvis iniqvitas svm apvd devs absvm vnvs moses enim dico misereor qvi misertvs svm et misericordia praesto qvi misericors svm vnvs cvm ergo praemitto qvi inconcvsse retineo svm non svm iniqvitas apvd devs pavlo post attendo qvis dico si avtem volens devs ostendo ira et demonstro potentia svvs affero in mvltvs patientia vas ira qvi perfectvs svm in perditio et vt nota facio divitiae gloria svvs in vas misericordia qvi praeparo in gloria et cetera qvintvs certe hic nvllvs modvs dico possvm alivs devs svm qvi ostendo ira et demonstro potentia svvs in vas qvi perfectvs svm ad perditio et alivs qvi ostendo divitiae in vas misericordia qvintvs nam vnvs idem qvove devs facio apostolicvlvm doctrina testor qvintvs hinc svm et ille propter hic trado ille devs in concvpisco cor is in immvnditia vt contvmelia afficio corpvs svvs in svi ipse o et pavlo post propterea trado ille devs in passio ignominia o item pavlo post et qvoniam non probo devs habeo in notitia trado ille devs in reprobvs sensvs qvinqvaginta ecce qvomodo vervs devs et ivstvs excaeco mens infidelis qvadrantal neqve enim vmqvam in hic apostolvm verbvm qvi commemoro alivs devs intellectvs svm qvi ille qvi filivs svvs mitto dico in ivdicivm venio in hic mvndvs vt qvi non video video et qvi video caecvs fio vnvs nam et hic satis appareo mens fidelis qvomodo devs excaeceo mens infidelis qvadrantal praecedo enim aliqvis occvltvs in occvltvs vbi devs ago ivstvs examo ne ivdicivm svvs vt qvidam mens excaeco qvidam illvmino qvintvs qvi vere dico svm indicivm tvvs abyssvs mvltvs qvintvs qvi profvnditas impenetrabilis altitvdo apostolvs admiror exclamo si o altitvdo divitiae sapientia et scientia devs o qvam inscrvtabilis svm ivdicivm is et cetera qvinqvaginta vos avtem non valeo discerno qvis facio devs beneficivm qvis ivdicivm qvia et ab cor et ab os vester longe svm psalterivm nos o vbi dico misericordia et ivdicivm canto tv dominvs vnvs dicitvs apostolvs devs tempero corpvs o et dico iste hylvs non devs  qvadrantal qvis apertvs hic inimicitia ante anathemo qvam refello vnvs nvmqvid et hic apostolvs cvm dico devs addo hic saecvlvm vbi si qvis etiam diabolvm intelligo excaeco diabolvm mens infidelis non nego malvm svasio o qvi qvi consentio ivstitia lvmen amitto devs retribvo qvi ivstvs svm pes hic omnis lego in scriptvra sanctvs qvintvs nam et ille dictvm svm de sedvctio extrinsecvs venio timeo ne sicvt serpens eva sedvco in versvtia svvs corrvmpo mens vester ab simplicitas et castitas qvi svm in christvs vnvs qvi similis svm corrvmpo mos bonvs colloqvivm malvm o et ille qvi et svi qvisqve sedvctor svm qvi avtem pvto svi svm aliqvis cvm nihil svm svi ipse sedvco o et ille de devs vindicta qvi svpra commemoro trado ille devs in reprobvs sensvs vt facio qvi non convenio qvintvs ita et in vetvs liber cvm praedico devs mors non facio nec laetor in perditio vivvs pavlo post invidia inqvio diabolvm mors intro in erbes terra qvadrantal et rvrsvs de ipse mors ne svi homo extra cvlpa pono impivs avtem manvs et verbvm inqvio arcesso ille et exstimo ille amica deflvo o alibi avtem bonvm et malvs vita et mors divitiae et pavpertas ab dominvs devs svm qvinqvaginta hic pertvrbatvs homo non intelligo in vnvs idem qvisqve opvs malvm non postea conseqvor alivs qvi manifestvs svm sed qvidam continvo comitor vindicta alivs venio de astvtia svadeo alivs de neqvitia volo alivs de ivstitia pvnio cvm diabolvs svggero homo consentio devs desero qvadrantal qvocirca in opvs malvm is svm excaecatio infidelis si intelligo et diabolvs propter svadeo malignitas vt sic distingvo devs hic saecvlvm non ego video absvrdvs vnvs neqve enim sine additamentvm dico devs cvm adivngo hic saecvlvm is svm homo impivs non nisi in hic saecvlvm floreo volo o secvndvm qvi dico et malvs saecvlvm sicvt scribo svm vt eximo nos de praesens saecvlvm malignvs pes talis svm enim et ille qvi devs venter o nisi svm ibi qvi nvllvs modvs dico devs venter vnvs nec in psalmvm daemonia possvm devs appello nisi addo gens o sic enim scribo svm qvoniam devs gens daemonia qvintvs hic avtem nec devs hic saecvlvm nec qvi devs venter nec devs gens daemonia sed simpliciter pono svm devs tempero corpvs o qvi non possvm intelligo nisi devs vervs omnis creator vnvs ille enim cvm vitvperatio dico hic avtem cam lavs dico svm vnvs nisi forte devs tempero corpvs non dispositio membrvm hic svm fabricor et constrvo sed admixtio lvx svvs favstvs intelligo vt scilicet hic membrvm ita distingvo et loco svvs sedes alter pono qvi hic fabrico o devs avtem misceo bonitas svvs hic fabrica malitia tempero qvintvs talis enim fabvla pverilis anima hebeto o sed neqve hic is possvm dico permitto svbvenio devs parvvlvs per os sanctvs qvintvs habeo enim et pavlo svpervs devs pono membrvm singvlvs qvisqve is in corpvs provt volo qvintvs qvis iam non intelligo secvndvm hic dictvm devs temperator corpvs qvi ex mvltvs membrvm corpvs fabrico officivm diversvs opvs in vnitas compages servo dicet aliqvis cvr non potivs ita de devs svvs praesvmto abraha vt fateor non timeo vxor neqve enim devs ab ille non possvm mors repello qvi timeo is qvovs cvm conivx svvs in ille peregrinatio tvtor vt nec vxor is qvamvis svm pvlcher appeto ab aliqvis nec propter ille ille neco  pes possvm sane hic efficio devs o qvis ita svm demens vt hic nego sed si interrogo abraha ille femina indico vxor dvo res tveor committo devs et svvs vita et conivx pvdicitia vnvs pertineo avtem ad sanvs doctrina qvando habeo qvi facio homo non temto dominvs devs svvs vnvs neqve enim et ipse salvator non possvm tveor discipvlvs svvs o qvi tamen aio si vos perseqvor svm in vnvs civitas fvgio in alivs pes qvi res prior exemplvm praebeo qvadranta nam cvm potestas habeo pono anima svvs nec is pono nisi cvm volo in aegyptvs tamen infans porto parens fvgio qvintvs et ad dies festvs non evidenter sed latenter ascendo cvm alias palam loqvor ivdaei irascor et de inimicvs animvs avdio nec tamen valens in is mitto manvs qvia nondvm venio hora is non qvi hora necessitas cogo morior sed qvi hora opportvnitas dignor occido qvintvs qvi ergo palam doceo et argvo et tamen inimicvs rabies valeo in svi aliqvis non sino devs demonstro potestas idem tamen fvgio et lateo homo instrvo infirmitas ne devs temto avdeo qvando habeo qvi facio vt qvi caveo oportet evado vnvs neqve enim et apostolvs pavlvs despero adivtorivm protectio qvovs divinvs fides qvove perdo qvando per mvrvs in sporta svbmitto svm vt inimicvs manvs effvgio qvintvs non ergo in devs non credo sic fvgio sed devs temtor sic fvgio nolo cvm sic fvgio possvm qvintvs refvtatvs crimen qvi nefarivs error obicio de liber vt possvm mysterivm secretvm rimeo pvlso qvove fides pietas vt nos aperio ab dominvs qvis res figvro qvatvor iste vxor iacob qvi dvo liber dvo ancilla svm qvinqvaginta video enim apostolvs in liber et ancilla qvi habeo abraha dvo testamentvm intelligo qvintvs sed ibi in vnvs et vna facile appareo qvi dico o hic avtem dvo svm et dvo qvintvs deinde ibi ancilla filivs exheredo o hic vero ancilla filivs simvl cvm filivs liber terra promissio in scriptvra adverto et invenio possvm dvo vita nos in christvs corpvs praedico vnvs temporalis in qvi laboro o alivs aeternvs in qvi delectatio devs contemplor qvintvs iste dominvs passio ille actio ergo hvmanvs mortalis qvove vita in qvi vivo ex fides mvltvs laboriosvs opvs facio incertvs qvis exitvs provenio ad vtilitas is qvi consvlo volo ipse svm lia prior vxor iacor o ac per hic et infirmvs ocvlvs svm commemoro o cogitatio enim mortalis timidvs et incertvs providentia noster qvintvs spes vero aeternvs contemplatio devs habeo certvs et delectabilis intelligentia veritas ipse svm rachel vnvs vnde etiam dico bonvs facies et pvlcher species vnvs hanc enim amo omnis pie stvdiosvs et propter hic servio gratia devs qvi peccatvm noster etsi svm sicvt phoenicivm tamqvam nix dealbo qvintvs labas one qvippe interpretor dealbatio o qvi servio iacob propter rachel qvintvs neqve enim svi qvisqve converto svb gratia remissio peccatvm servio ivstitia nisi vt qvies vivo in verbvm ex qvi video principivm ce qvi svm devs vnvs ergo propter rachel non propter lia vnvs nam qvis tandem amo in opvs ivstitia labor actio atqve passio qvia is vita propter svi ipse expeto sicvt nec iacob lia sed tamen svi nox svppono in vsvs genero amplexvs et fecvnditas is experior svm vnvs dominvs enim is qvia per svi ipse diligo non possvm primo vt ad rachel pervenio tolero facio deinde propter filivs commendo qvintvs ita vero vnvsqvisqve vtilis devs servvs svb dealbatio peccatvm svvs gratia constitvo qvis alivs in svvs conversio meditor svm qvis alivs cor gesto qvis alivs adamo nisi doctrina sapientia qvam pleriqve svi adipio et percipio pvto statim vt svi in septem praeceptvm lex exerceo qvi svm de dilectio propior ne qvisqvam homo noceo is svm honorvs pater et mater non moechor non occido non fvror non falsvs testimonivm dico non concvpisco vxor propior tvvs vnvs qvis qvantvm possvm observo posteaqvam homo pro concvpisco et spero pvlcher delectatio doctrina per temtatio varivs qvasi per hic saecvlvm nox tolerantia labor adhaereo velvt pro bachel lia inopinatvs conivnctvs svm et hic svstineo vt ad ille pervenio si perseveranter amo accipio alivs septem praeceptvm ac si is dico servvs alivs septem annvs propter rachel vt svm pavper spiritvs mitis lvgeo esvrio sitio qvove ivstitia misericors mvndvs cor pacificvs qvadrantal volo enim homo si fio possvm sine vllvs fides svm qvi inter temtatio incertvs versor vt pie credo qvod nondvm intelligo etiam intelligentia meritvm conseqvor qvintvs qvantvm enim valeo qvi amodo commemoro svm scriptvm concvpisco sapientia servo mandatvm et dominvs praebeo ille tv tantvm et ille valeo arbitror nisi credo non intelligo vt ivstitia ad fides ad sapientia vero intelligentia pertineo monstro qvintvs proinde in hic qvi flagro ingens amor perspicvvs veritas non svm improbo stvdivm sed ad ordo revoco vt ab fides incipio et bonvs mos enitor pervenio qvi intendo pentvm in is qvippe qvod versor virtvs svm laboriosvs o in is vero qvi appeto lvminosvs sapientia qvadranta qvis opvs svm inqvio credo qvi non ego ostendo manifestvs aliqvis verbvm promo qvi video res omnis principivm vnvs is enim svm in qvi magis ac primitvs inardesco si vervm stvdiosvs svm animvs rationalis  pes qvi respondeo pvlcher svm qvidem qvi desidero et amo dignvs sed privs nvbo lia et postea rachel qvintvs ardor ergo iste ad is valeo vt ordo non recvso sed potivs tolero sine qvi non possvm ad is pervenio qvi tantvs ardor diligo vnvs cvm avtem pervenio svm simvl habeo in hic saecvlvm non solvm speciosvs intelligentia sed etiam laboriosvs ivstitia vnvs qvamlibet enim acvte sinceriter qvovs cerno ab mortalis incommvtabilis bonvm adhvc corpvs qvi corrvmpo aggravo anima et deprimo terrenvs inhabitatio sensvs mvltvs cogito vnvs ad vnvs ergo tendo sed propter hic mvltvs fero svm vnvs itaqve dvo svm vxor iacor liber ambo qvippe svm filia remissio peccatvm hic svm dealbatio qvi svm labas ne qvintvs vervm tamen vna amo alivs tolero vnvs sed qvi tolero ipse privs et vbere fecvndo vt si non propter svi ipse certe propter filivs diligo vnvs labor enim ivstvs magnvs frvctvs habeo in is qvi regnvm devs genero inter mvltvs temtatio et tribvlatio praedico evangelivm et is propter qvi svm in labor abvndanter in plaga svpra modvs in mors saepe propter qvi habeo foris pvgna intvs timor gavdivm et corona svvs voco qvintvs nascor is avtem facile atqve copiose ex ille sermo fides qvi praedico christvs crvcificvs o et qvisqvis hvmanitas is cito hvmanvs cogitatio percipio et infirmvs etiam lia ocvlvs non pertvrbo pes rachel avtem clarvs aspectvs mens excedo devs et video in principivm verbvm devs apvd devs et volo pareo et non possvm qvia generatio is qvis enarro proinde vita qvi stvdivm contemplatio competo vt is qvi caro svm invisibilis non infirmvs ocvlvs mens per is qvi factvm svm intelligo conspicio et sempiternvs devs virtvs ac divinitas ineffabiliter cerno vaco volo ab omnis negotivm et ideo sterilis vnvs affecto qvippe otivm qvi stvdivm contemplatio ignesco non contempero infirmitas homo qvi in varivs premo svi desidero svbvenio o sed qvia et ipse procreo caritas inardesco volo enim doceo qvi nosco neqve cvm invidia tabesco iter habeo video soror labor ago atqve patior filivs abvndans et doleo potivs homo cvrro ad is virtvs qvi is infirmitas necessitas qvivi consvlo qvam ad ille vnde divinvs et incommvtabilis aliqvis disco vnvs hic dolor figvro video in is qvi scribo svm et zelo rachel soror svvs pentvm proinde qvia liqvidvs pvrvs qvovs intellectvs de ille svbstantia qvi corpvs non svm ac per hic ad caro sensvs non pertineo verbvm caro edo exprimo non possvm eligo doctrina sapientia per qvilibet corporevs imago et similitvdo vtcvmqve cogito insinvo divina qvam ab officivm talis doceo cesso sicvt eligo rachel ex vir svvs et ancilla svscipio filivs qvam sine filivs omnino remaneo qvintvs balla qvidem dico interpretor inveteratvs o hic habeo ancilla rachel vnvs de vetvs qvippe vita carnalis sensvs dedo corporevs cogito imago etiam cvm aliqvis de spiritalis et incommvtabilis divinitas svbstantia avdio qvintvs svscipio et lia de ancilla svvs liberi amor habeo nvmerosvs proles accendo qvintvs invenio avtem zelfa is ancilla interpretor os iens  pes qvapropter in praedicatio fides evangelica qvi os eo et cor non eo cvm in scriptvra adverto hic intelligo ancilla lia qvadrantal scriptvm svm enim de qvidam popvlvs hic labia ego honoro cor avtem is longe svm ab ego vnvs et talis apostolvs dico qvi praedico non fvror fvror qvi dico non advltero advltera vnvs vervm tamen vt etiam per hic condicionalis ille liber vxor iacob laboro filivs heres regnvm svscipio ideo dominvs dico qvi dico facio qvi avtem facio facio nolo vnvs vnde in labor vincvlvm vita apostolicvm sive inqvio occasio sive veritas christvs annvntio et in hic gavdeo sed et gavdeo tamqvam et ancilla pario de proles nvmerosvs laetor svm vnvs ivda factvm considero qvi cvm svvs nvrvs concvmbo qvis significo fvtvrvm qvintvs sed privs praeloqvor svm ne qvisqvam pravvs consideratio offendo qvod de qvidam malvs opvs homo in scriptvra sanctvs qvidam non malvm sed bonvm svm significo qvintvs servo enim vbiqve divinvs providentia virtvs bonitas svvs vt qvemadmodvm is advlter concvbitvs formo et nascor homo de homo opvs malvs bonvs opvs devs sicvt in praecedo sermo iam dico de fecvnditas semen non de tvrpitvdo vitivm ita in scriptvra propheticvs non tantvm bonvm homo etiam et malvm factvm narro qvoniam propheticvs svm ipse narratio significo aliqvis etiam de malvs opvs homo etiam fvtvrvm bonvm non peccans opvs sed scribo vnvs neqve enim lvdo cvm ad thamar concvpisco vinco intro hic svvs libido intentio gero vt inde aliqvis significo qvi ad salvs homo pertineo o sicvt nec ivda ille qvi dominvs trado hic intendo vt aliqvis inde gero qvi ad idem salvs homo pertineo o porro si de tam malvs opvs ivda ille tam bonvs opvs dominvs facio vt idem svvs passio sangvis nos redimo qvis mirvs si propheta is de qvi ipse aio de ego enim ille scribo ex malefactvm ivda iste bonvm aliqvis significo vt svvs ministerivm nos doceo is qvippe homo facio sanctvs spiritvs dispono atqve inspiro colligo propheta narrator qvi interpositio non vaco ad praesignatio res qvi intendo propheto vnvs ad significo avtem aliqvis bonvm nihil intersvm factvm ille qvi is significo sev bonvm sev malvm svm qvintvs qvis enim mevs intersvm cvm volo aliqvis lego cognosco vtrvm ex minivm reperio scribo niger aethiopes et ex atramentvm candidvs galli vervm tamen si non scriptvra sed pictvra talis video sine dvbitatio reprehendo vnvs ita in factvm homo qvi ad imitor vito ivs propono magnvs intersvm bonane an malvm svm qvinqvaginta qvi avtem ad significo scribo sive dico nihil refert in mos facio qvam lavs reprehensio ivs mereor si modo habeo aliqvis res qvi de ago necessarivs praefigvro congrventia vnvs sicvt enim caiphas in evangelivm qvantvm ad is noxivs perniciosvs qvovs animvs pertineo qvantvm deniqve ad ipse verbvm si in is volvntas dico attendo qvi ago vt ivstvs inivste neco vtiqve malvm svm tamen magnvs bonvm ille nescio significo qvando aio expedio vt vnvs morior et non totvs gens pereo qvintvs dico qvovs de ille svm hic ab svi ipse non dico sed cvm svm pontifex propheto qvia oportet iesvs morior pro gens qvintvs ita facio ivda secvndvm ille libido malvm svm sed ille nescio magnvs bonvm significo o ab svi ipse qvippe malvm facio sed non ab svi ipse bonvm significo vnvs hic avtem qvi necessario praeloqvor pvto non ad hic tantvmmodo ivda factvm sed etiam ad cetera valeo si qvis occvrro malvs opera homo qvi bonvm aliqvis ab narro prophetatvs svm vnvs vnvs thamar ergo nvrvs ivda intelligo plebs regnvm ivdaei qvi de tribvs ivda rex tamqvam maritvs adhibeo qvadrantal merito nomen is amaritvdo interpretor o ipse enim dominvs fellvm pocvlvm do qvintvs dvo avtem genvs princeps qvi non recte operor in plebs vnvs is qvi obsvm alter is qvi nihil prosvm significo in dvo filivs ivda qvi vnvs svm malignvs vel saevvs ante dominvs alter in terra fvndo ne semen do ad fecvndo thamar qvadrantal nec svm ample qvam dvo genvs homo invtilis genvs hvmanvs vnvs nocens alter praesto nolo et si qvis bonvm habeo in hic terrenvs vita perdo tamqvam in terra fvndo qvadrantal et qvoniam in malvm prior svm qvi noceo qvam ille qvi non prode svm ideo magnvs dico malignvs ille et seqvens qvi fvndo in terra vnvs nomen qvoqve magnvs qvi voco ero interpretor pelliciter  qvalis tvnica indvo svm primvs homo in poena damnatio svvs dimitto ex paradisvs qvintvs seqvor avtem nomen qvi voco avna one interpretor maeror is  pes qvi nisi qvi nihil prosvm cvm habeo vnde prosvm possvm atqve is perdo in terra magnvs porro malvm svm avfero vita qvi significo pellis qvam non adivvo qvi significo maeror is qvintvs devs tamen ambo occido dico svm vbi figvro regnvm talis homo avfero vnvs tertivs vero filivs ivda qvi ille mvlier non ivngo significo tempvs ex qvi rex plebs ivdaei coepio de tribvs ivda non fio vnvs et ideo svm qvidem filivs ivda sed is maritvs thamar non accipio qvia svm idem tribvs ivda sed iam popvlvs inde nemo regno qvintvs vnde et nomen is is svm selvs interpretor dimissio is  pes non pertineo sane ad hic signincatio vir sanctvs et ivstvs qvi licet ille tempvs svm ad novvs tamen pertineo testamentvm qvi propheto scienter vtilis svm qvalis davivs svm qvadranta is sane tempvs qvi iam ivdaea coepio rex ex tribvs ivda non habeo non svm compvto herodes magnvs in rex is tamqvam maritvs thamar  svm enim alienigena nec is sacramentvm ille mysticvs vnctio tamqvam conivgalis foedvs cohaereo sed tamqvam extranevs dominor qvi potestas ab romani et ab caesar accipio qvintvs sic et is filivs tetrarches qvi svm vnvs herodes pater nomen appello qvi cvm pilatvs in passio dominvs concordo qvintvs iste ergo alienigena vsqve adeo non depvto in regnvm ille mysticvs ivdaei vt ipse ivdaei pvblice clamo frendo adversvs christvs nos non habeo rex nisi caesar qvinqvaginta neqve hic vervm nisi ille vniversalis dominatio romanvs  qvippe etiam caesar rex svm non proprie ivdaei o sed vt christvs nego et hic advlo ideo svi talis vox damno qvintvs illo ergo tempvs qvi iam de tribvs ivda regnvm deficio venio svm christvs vero salvator dominvs noster qvi non obsvm mvltvm qvovs prosvm vnvs sic enim svm prophetatvs non deficio princeps ex ivda neqve dvx de femvr is donec venio qvi repono svm vnvs et ipse svm exspectatio gens vnvs iam iste tempvs omnis qvoqve magisterivm ivdaei et mysticvs vnde christe voco vnctio ipse deficio secvndvm prophetia etiam daniheles qvintvs tvnc venio qvi repono svm exspectatio gens et vnctvs svm sanctvs sanctvs olevm exsvltatio prae particeps svvs qvinqvaginta nascor enim herodes magnvs tempvs patior svm avtem parvvs herodes tetrarchia vnvs hic itaqve venio ad ovis qvi pereo domvs israhel figvra gero ipse lvdo cvm eo ad tondeo ovis svvs in thamna qvi interpretor deficio  qvintvs iam enim deficio princeps ex ivda et omnis magisterivm atqve vnctio ivdaei vt venio qvi repono svm pes venio avtem cvm svvs pastor adollamita qvi nomen svm hiras o et interpretor odollamites testimonivm in aqva qvintvs  pentvm cvm hic plane testimonivm dominvs venio habeo qvidem testimonivm magnvs iohannvs sed tamen propter ovis infirmvs hic testimonivm svm vtor in aqva vnvs nam et ipse hiras qvi nomen ille pastor svm interpretor frater mevs visio  pes video omnino frater svvs iohannes frater secvndvm semen abrahae secvndvm cognatio maria mater is et helisabetiches mater svvs idem qvovs dominvs et devs svvs qvia sicvt ipse aio ex plenitvdo is accipio qvintvs video omnino o et ideo in natvs mvlier magnvs ille non exsvrgo qvia ex omnis praenvntio christvs ipse video qvod mvlti ivstvs et propheta cvpio video et non video o salvto ex vtervs agnosco perfectvs ex colvmba et ideo tamqvam odollamites vere testimonivm perhibeo in aqva qvintvs venio avtem dominvs ad ovis tondeo hic svm exonero sarcina laboriosvs ex qvi ecclesia lavdo in canticvm canticvm dens svm velvt grex detondeo qvadrantal ia thamar habitvs mvto nam et commvto interpretor thamar qvintvs sed in is prorsvs nomen amaritvdo maneo non ille amaritvdo in qvi dominvs fel ministro sed ille in qvi petrvs amo fleo o nam et ivda latine confessio svm vnvs confessio ergo amaritvdo misceo vt vervs paenitentia praesigno qvintvs hic paenitentia fecvndo ecclesivs in omnis gens constitvo qvintvs oportet enim christvs patior et resvrgo tertivs dies et praedico in nomen is paenitentia et remissio peccatvm per omnis gens incipio ab hiervsal qvinqvaginta nam et ipse habitvs meretricivs confessio peccatvm svm typvs qvippe iam ecclesia gero thamar ex gens evoco sedeo cvm hic habitvs ad porta ena ne vel enai one qvis interpretor fons vnvs cvrro enim velvt cervvs ad fons aqva pervenio ad semen abrahae o illic ab non cognosco feto qvia de ille praedico svm popvlvs qvi non cognosco servio ego accipio in occvltvm anvlvs monile et virga vocatio signo ivstificatio decoro glorificatio exalto qvintvs qvi enim praedestino ille et voco o qvi avtem voco ille et ivstifico o et qvi ivstifico ille et glorifico qvadrantal sed hic vt dico adhvc in occvltvm vbi fio et conceptio sanctvs vbertas vnvs mitto avtem promitto hedvs tamqvam meretrix hedvs exprobratio peccatvm per idem odollamitae tamqvam increpo et dico generatio vipera pes sed non is invenio peccatvm exprobratio qvi mvto confessio amaritvdo vnvs post vero iam pvblicvs signvm anvlvs monilis et virga vinco temere ivdico ivdaei qvi iam persona ivda ipse gero qvi hodie qvovs dico non hic svm popvlvs christvs nec habeo nos semen abrahae o sed profero certvs docvmentvm noster vocatio ivstificatio et glorificatio sine dvbivm confvndo et nos magis qvam svi ivstificatvs svm fateor vnvs envcleater hic et membratim qvidam modvs articvlatim qvovs scrvtor atqve dissero qvantvm intentio mevs dominvs adivvo nisi ego ab hic laboriosvs diligentia finio hic opvs qvod mvltvs qvam volo iam prolixvs svm cvra prohibeo qvintvs nvnc pecco davivs qvis in prophetia significo qvantvs possvm brevitas perstringo vnvs nomen qvippe ipse interpretor satis ostendo qvis etiam hic facio praefigvro vnvs davivs interpretor manvs fortis sine desiderabilis et qvis fortis leo ille de tribvs ivda qvi vinco mvndvs et qvis desiderabilis ille de qvi propheta dico venio desidero cvnctvs gens bersabes interpretor pvtevs satietas sive pvtevs septimvs o qvilibet avtem hic nomen hic interpretatio in is qvi dico intendo assvmo satis congrvo qvadrantal nam et in canticvm canticvm sponsa ille ecclesivs svm qvi voco aqva vivvs qvintvs et hic pvtevs septenarivs nvmervs nomen in spiritvs sanctvs significatio conivngo propter et ratio pentecostes qvi dies de caelvm mitto spiritvs sanctvs venio qvadrantal de septimani enim consto idem festvs dies tobia qvoqve scriptvra testor qvintvs ad qvadraginta novem avtem qvi svm septiens septenvs vnvs addo qvi vnitas commendo qvadrantal in hic ratio vivo apostolicvs ille sententia svffero invicem in dilectio stvdeo servo vnitas spiritvs in vincvlvm pax qvintvs dono itaqve spiritalis hic svm septenarivs factvm svm ecclesivs pvtevs satietas qvia facio svm in is fons aqva salio in vita aeternvs qvi qvi habeo non sitio in aeternvm vnvs iam vero qvis svm maritvs is qvis alivs qvam diabolvs nomen is interpretatio significo hic svm malvs conivgivm deligo omnis qvi gratia devs libero vt ecclesivs sine macvla et rvga salvator proprie copvlor vnvs vria namqve interpretor lvx mevs devs  qvintvs cettevs avtem abscindo sive qvod in veritas non sto sed ab lvx svvs svpernvs qvi de devs habeo svperbia merito abscido svm sive qvi cado vervs vis perditvs transfigvro svi tamen in angelvs lvx avdeo adhvc dico lvx mevs devs svm  vnvs ergo iste qvidem davivs graviter sceleratvs qvovs pecco o qvi scelvs is etiam per propheta devs argvo increpo et ipse ablvo paeniteo qvintvs vervm tamen ille desiderabilis omnis gens adamo ecclesia svper tectvm svi lavo is svm mvndo svi ab sordes saecvlvm et domvs lvtevs spiritalis contemplatio transcendo atqve calco et inchoo cvm ille primvs conventio notitia postea ab is penitvs separo diabolvm occido is qvovs svi perpetvo connvbivm copvlo qvintvs odi ergo peccatvm sed prophetiae non exstingvo vnvs amo ille davivs qvantvm amo svm qvi nos ab diabolvm per misericordia libero o amo et iste davivs qvi tam gravis in svi vvlnvs iniqvitas paenitentia hvmilitas sano qvintvs lam de salomones qvis dico qvi vehementer argvo sanctvs scriptvra atqve condemno nihil qvove de paenitentia is vel in is indvlgentia devs omnino commemoro qvinqvaginta nec ego vnvs prorsvs occvrro qvis saltem in allegorivm bonvm significo hic is fleo svbmersio nisi forte qvis dico mvlier alienigena qvi amor exardesco significo ecclesia eligo de gens qvintvs possvm hic fortasse non absvrde intelligo si ille propter salomon desero devs svvs et colo devs is qvinqvaginta cvm vero ipse propter ille offendo devs svvs et colo devs is non svm qvis inde bonvm coniecto possvm qvintvs nec tamen nihil arbitror significo sed malvm sicvt de vxor filia qvovs loth dico qvintvs appareo enim in persona hic salomon mirvs excellentia et mirvs svbversio vnvs qvi igitvr in ille diversvs tempvs exsisto privs bonvm et postervs malvm hic in ecclesivs in iste adhvc saecvlvm simvl vnvs tempvs ostendo qvintvs nam bonvs ille bonvs ecclesia malo avtem ille mali ecclesia significo pvto tamqvam in vnitas vnvs area sicvt in ille vnvs homo bonvs in granis malvs in palea vt in vnitas vnvs seges bonvs in triticvm malvs in sisania qvintvs si qvis hinc sane hic qvi de ille scriptvm svm diligenter pertracto sive ego sive hic doctvs atqve bonvs alivs probabilis elvceo possvm nvnc tamen non is res ita dimitto vt intentio noster in alivs propero tamqvam interrvmpo series contextio impedio qvintvs qvis etiam propheticvs significatio habeo reqviro svm qvi ex is mvlti qvi svi absvm ipse idolvm fabrico sine vllvs qvisqvam necessitvdo cvm dico irascor et nolo pecco vnvs in talis vitivm saevio nos ivbeo apostolvs cvm dico mortificate membrvm vester qvi svm svper terra fornicatio immvnditia lvxvria concvpisco malvs et avaritia qvis svm idolvs servitvs vnvs sedes qvis svi volo qvi privs facio vt ipse vitvlvs ignis combvro minvtatim concido et in aqva spargo et poto popvlvs do magnvs intentio perscrvtor significatio inqviro vnvs si enim tabvla qvi digitvs devs hic svm operatio spiritvs sanctvs scribo accipio ideo frango qvia indignvs is qvi is lego ivdico o si deniqve vt ab is ille vitvlvs penitvs aboleo incendo is conterno in aqva spargo atqve svbmergo vt qvis et poto hic popvlvs do qvi non excito factvm hic ad inqviro et intelligo propheticvs significatio occvrro ergo iam intentvs mens tamqvam diabolvm corpvs in vitvlvs is svm homo in omnis gens qvi ad hic sacrilegivm capvt hic svm avctor svm diabolvs o avrevs propterea qvia video idolatria ritvs velvt ab sapiens institvo qvadrantal de qvi dico apostolvs qvoniam cognosco devs non sicvt devs glorifico avt gratia ago sed evanesco in cogitatio svvs et obscvratvs svm insipiens cor is o dico svi svm sapiens stvltvs factvm svm et mvto gloria incorrvptibil devs in similitvdo imago corrvptibilis homo et volvcris et qvadrvpes et serpens pentvm is hic qvasi sapientia iste vitvlvs avrevs qvalis soleo aegyptii etiam ipse primates et tamqvam doctvs homo adoro figmentvm qvintvs hic ergo vitvlvs significo svm omnis corpvs is svm omnis societas gentilis idolatria deditor vnvs hic sacrilegvs societas dominvs christvs ille ignis combvro de qvi in evangelivm dico ignis venio mitto in terra vt qvoniam non svm qvi svi abscondo ab calor is dvm in is credo gens ignis virtvs is diabolicvs in is forma solvo qvintvs totvs deinde corpvs ille comminvo is svm ab ille malvs conspiratio conflatio discindo verbvm veritas hvmilior et comminvo in aqva mitto vt is israhelita is svm evangelivm praedicator ex baptimmvm in svvs membrvm hic svm in corpvs dominicvs transfero qvintvs qvi israhelitae petro de ipse gens dico svm mactvs et mandvco qvinqvaginta si macto et mandvco qvare non etiam vnvs concido et bibo ita ille vitvlvs per ignis zeles et acies verbvm et aqva baptis ab is potivs qvi absorbeo conor absorptvs svm vnvs sinvs ergo hic qvoqve locvs scriptvra de qvi idem scriptvra calvmnior haereticvs perscrvtor et qvidam modvs interrogo qvanto video obscvrvs tanto mirabilis in svi mysterivm thesavrvs lateo respondeo qvanto magis impivs blasphemvs os obmvtesco omnino debeo cvm oppilo apertvs veritas contra qvam praefoco spiritvs qvis mvssito non terra scribo littera ver sacer omnis partvrio intentio nec svm qvisqvam credo svm liber propheticvs contextio narro qvi non significo aliqvis fvtvrvs nisi qvi ideo pono svm vt ex is qvidam modvs religo is qvi ille rex popvlvs qvivis is sive proprivs sive figvro locvtio res qvis praenvntio qvintvs sicvt enim in cithara et hic modvs organvs mvsicvs non qvidem omnis qvi tango canorvs aliqvis resono sed tantvm chorda cetera tamen in totvs cithara corpvs ideo fabricor svm vt svm vbi vincio vnde et qvo tendo ille qvi ad cantilena svavitas modvlor et percvtio svm artifex ita in hic propheticvs narratio qvi de res gero homo propheticvs spiritvs deligo avt aliqvis iam sono significatio fvtvrvs ante si nihil talis significo ad hic interpono vt svm vnde ille significo tamqvam sonans connecto qvintvs has avtem res gero allegoricvs narratio si nolo haereticvs sicvt ab nos expono accipio vel etiam nihil is nisi qvi proprie sono significo contendo non svm lvctor cvm homo qvi dico non sapio palatvm mevs qvi sapio dico tvvs ce dvm tamen is qvi divinitvs praecipio avt mos pietas qvovs formo avt aliqvis figvro significo vel credo vel intelligo avt vterqve potivs qvam nevter ce dvm tamen et ipse qvi figvro dictvm vel facio intelligo ad idem mos bonvs pietas qvovs refero qvintvs sivs qvaero ab nos svm cvr ille testamentvm avctoritas teneo qvi ritvs non observo et ad hic ex littera respondeo vnvs aio enim apostolvs nemo ergo vos vnvs ivdico in cibvs et potvs avt in pars dies festvs avt neomenia avt sabbatvm qvi svm vmbra fvtvrvm qvintvs ita qvippe et cvr lego is atqve accipio oportet ostendo is svm ne prophetia exstingvo qvia in vmbra facio svm fvtvrvm o et cvro nos is non debeo qvi nos hinc ivdico nolo qvi corporaliter iam non observo o sicvt alibi talis qvidam dico hic in figvra contingo ille scriptvm svm avtem propter correptio noster in qvi finis saecvlvm obvenio qvadranta cvm ergo talis aliqvis lego in instrvmentvm vetvs testamentvm qvalis ab nos observo vel ivbeo non svm in nonvs testamentvm vel etiam prohibeo qvis significo qvaero svm non reprehendo qvia is ipse qvi iam non observo non damno sed impleo probo vnvs vnde mvltvs iam et saepe dico vnvs svccenseo is et is increpo corrigo volens svm pavlvs nvmqvid pavlvs inqvio pro vos crvcificvs svm avt in nomen pavlvs baptipo svm tamqvam dico defvngor frater vos gigno o christianvs voco non pavliani avdio et calvmnivm vanitas vervm aliqvando praepono vnvs cvr enim non expedio immolaticivs vescor christianvs apostolvs dico nolo vos inqvio socivs fio daemonivm vnvs neqve enim ipse immolatio reprehendo qvi facio pater praefigvro sangvis sacrificivm qvi nos christvs redimo sed qvi immolo gens daemonivm inqvio immolo et non devs vnvs deinde adicio qvi dico nolo vos socivs fio daemonivm vnvs nam si natvra ipse immolaticivs caro svm immvndvs vtiqve et nescio contamino qvadrantal neqve enim eo parvm ipse svm qvo parvm ab sciens accipio sed propter conscientia ne daemo commvnico video pes morticinvs avtem pvto qvi ad esca vsvs homo non admitto is qvod non occido sed mortvvs animal morbidvs caro svm nec aptvs ad salvs corpvs qvi cavsa svmo alimentvm qvintvs nam qvi de effvndo sangvis antiqvvs in figvra praecipio svm is svm ipse novs post dilvvivm qvi iam qvis significo ostendo pleriqve intelligo et in actvs apostolor hic lex praecipio ab apostola vt abstineo gens tantvm ab fornicatio et ab immolatvs et ab sangvis is svm ne qvisqvam edo caro qvi sangvis non svm effvndo vnvs qvi alivs non sic intelligo sed ab sangvis praecipio svm abstineo ne qvis homicidivm svi contamino qvintvs hic nvnc discvtio longvs svm et non necessarivs qvia etsi hic tvnc apostolvm praecipio vt animal sangvis abstineo christianvs nec praefoco caro vescor eligo ego video pro tempvs res facilis et omnis gens svm figvro qvi factvm prophetia iam gens ad fides accedo incipio impleo qvintvs transigo vero ille tempvs qvi ille dvo paries vnvs ex circvmcisio alter ex praepvtivm  qvintvs venio qvamvis in angvlaris lapis concordo tamen svvs qvidam proprietas distincte emineo ac vbi ecclesivs gens talis efficio svm vt in is nvllvs israhelita carnalis appareo qvi iam hic christianvs observo vt tvrdvs vel minvtvs avicvla non attingo nisi qvi sangvis effvsvs svm avt lepor non edo si manvs ab cervix percvtio nvllvs crventvs vvlnvs occido svm et qvi forte pavci adhvc tango iste formido ab ceteri irrideo qvintvs ita omnis animvs in hic res teneo ille sententia veritas non qvi intro in os vester vos connqvino sed qvod exeo nvllvs cibvs natvra qvi societas admitto hvmanvs sed qvi iniqvitas committo peccatvm condemno qvadrantal qvi scribo svm ab volatilis mvndvs et ab volatilis immvndvs et ab pecvs mvndvs et ab pecvs immvndvs et ab omnis serpens in terra qvi deinde non addo svbavdio mvndvs et immvndvs et adivngo dvo dvo intro ad novs in arca mascvlvs et femina qvaero qvomodo svpervs distingvo dvo dvo ab immvndvs nvnc avtem sive ab mvndvs sive ab immvndvs dvo dvo dico intro vnvs sed hic refero non ad nvmervs mvndvs vel immvndvs animal sed ad mascvlvs et femina qvia in omnis sive mvndvs sive immvndvs dvo svm mascvlvs et femina qvadrantal qvis svi volo qvi dominvs dico non adicio adhvc maledico svper terra propter opvs homo qvia appono svm mens homo ad malignvs ab ivventvs vnvs non adicio ergo adhvc percvtio omnis caro vivvs qvemadmodvm facio et deinde adivngo qvi secvndvm largitas bonitas svvs dono homo indignvs vtrvm hic testamentvm novvs indvlgentia figvro svm et praeteritvs vltio ad vetvs pertineo testamentvm hic svm ille ad lex severitas hic ad gratia bonitas qvis svm et de manvs homo frater exqviro anima homo an omnis homo frater omnis homo intelligo volo secvndvm cognatio ex vnvs dvco qvaeritvr qvare pecco chaos in pater offensa non in svi ipse sed in filivs svvs chana one maledico nisi qvia prophetatvs svm qvidam modvs terra chanvs one eicio inde chananaevs et debello accipio svm filivs israhel qvi venio de semen sem qvintvs et svm omnis terra labes vnvs qvomodo possvm intelligo qvando svpervs dictvm svm qvod filivs novs vel filivs is distribvo svm per terra secvndvm tres et secvndvm gens et secvndvm lingva svvs nisi qvia per recapitvlio postea commemoro qvod privs svm sed obscvritas facio qvod is genvs locvtio iste contego qvasi narratio de hic qvi postea facio svm conseqvor qvintvs erititer ergo cvm tv video aegyptii dico qvia vxor ille hic vnvs factvm svm avtem statim vt intro abraha in aegyptvs video aegyptii mvlier qvia speciosvs svm valde vnvs qvomodo accipio qvi abraha venio in aegyptvs celo volo vxor svvs svm sarra secvndvm omnis qvi de hic res scriptvm svm vtrvm hic convenio tam sanctvs vir an svbdefectio fides is intelligo sicvt nonnvllvs arbitror svm iam qvidem et contra favstvs de hic res dispvto et diligenter ab presbyter hieronymvs expono svm qvare non svm conseqvens vt cvm aliqvot dies apvd rex aegyptvs sarra facio etiam is concvbitvs credo svm pollvo qvintvs qvoniam mos svm regivs vicis ad svi admitto mvlier svvs et nisi lomenta et vngeo div privs accvro corpvs nvllvs intro ad rex qvadrantal qvi dvm fio afflictvs svm pharavs manvs devs vt vir redhibeo intactvs qvi ipse devs maritvs committo taceo qvod vxor svm sed non mentior qvod soror svm vt caveo qvi possvm qvantvm homo possvm et devs commendo qvi caveo non possvm  ne si et ille qvi caveo possvm devs tantvm dimitto non in devs credo sed devs temto potivs invenio pes dabo tv et semen tvvs post tv terra in qvi habito omnis terra cvlta in possessio aeternvs vnvs qvaestio svm qvomodo dico aeternvs cvm israheles temporaliter do svm vtrvm secvndvm hic saecvlvm dictvm svm aeternvs vt ab is qvi svm ativs graece qvi et saecvlvm significo dictvm svm aliffer tamqvam si latine dico possvm saecvlaris ce an ex hic aliqvis secvndvm spiritalis promissio hic intelligo cogo vt aeternvs ideo dictvm svm qvia hinc aeternvs aliqvis significo vnvs an potivs locvtio svm scriptvra vt aeternvm appello qvi res finis non constitvo avt non ita fio vt deinceps non svm facio qvantvm pertineo ad cvra vel potestas facio o sicvt aio horativs servio aeternvm qvi parvvs nescio vt qvintvs non enim possvm in aeternvm servio qvi ipse vita qvi servio aeternvs svm non possvm vnvs qvi testimonivm non adhibeo nisi locvtio svm o verbvm qvippe ille svm nos avctor non res vel sententia vnvs si avtem defendo scriptvra secvndvm locvtio proprivs qvi idioma voco qvanto magis secvndvm is qvi cvm alivs lingva commvnis habeo scieba enim qvia constitvo filivs svvs et domvs svvs post svi et cvstodio via dominvs facio ivstitia et ivdicivm vt addvco dominvs in abraha omnis qvi loqvor svm ad ille pes ecce vbi promitto dominvs abrahae non solvm praemivm sed etiam obedientia ivstitia filivs is vt circa is etiam praemivm promissvm compleo qvinqvaginta descendens ergo video si secvndvm clamor ipse venio ad ego consvmmo  si avtem non vt scio vnvs verbvm hic si non dvbito qvis dvo potivs evenio svm sed irascor et minor accipio nvllvs qvaestio svm pes mos qvippe hvmanvs devs in scriptvra ad homo loqvor et is ira nosco sine pertvrbatio is intelligo qvi nosco pentvm soleo avtem etiam sic minanter loqvor video si non tv facio avt video si non facio ille et si non possvm tv facio vel scio is svm hic ipse experior vtrvm non possvm vnvs qvi cvm minor non ignoro dico iratvs appareo affectvs sed pertvrbatio non cado in devs pes mos avtem hvmanvs locvtio et vsitatvs svm et hvmanvs infirmitas congrvo qvi devs coapto locvtio svvs vnvs qvaerivs soleo vtrvm qvi de sodomvs dico devs non svi perdo locvs si invenio illic vel decem ivstvs specialis qvidam sententia de ille civitas an de omnis intelligo svm generaliter parco devs locvs in qvicvmqve vel decem ivstvs svm qvinqvaginta in qvi qvaestio non svm qvidem necesse vt hic de omnis locvs accipio compello vervm tamen de sodom possvm et sic dico qvia scio devs ibi non svm vel decem qvintvs et ideo sic respondeo abrahae vt significo nec tot ibi possvm invenio ad exaggeratio iniqvitas ille qvintvs non enim necesse svm devs tam sceleratvs homo parco ne cvm ille perdo ivstvs cvm possvm ivstvs inde libero reddo impivs dignvs svpplicivm qvintvs sed vt dico ad ostendo malignitas mvltitvdo ille dico si decem ibi invenio parco vniversvs civitas tamqvam dico certe possvm nec pivs cvm impivs perdo nec tamen propterea impivs parco qvia libero et separo inde pivs possvm aio sodomites loth svm ego filia dvo qvi nondvm nosco vir o prodvco ille ad vos o vtor ille qvomodo placeo vos vnvs ne facio tantvm in vir iste iniqvvs qvoniam prostitvo volo filia svvs hic complector svm etiam beniamvs one qvi non svm ibi natvs et dictvm svm hic svm filivs iacobes qvi factvm svm is in mesopotamia syria qvintvs et nolo consolor dico qvoniam descendo ad filivs mevs lvgeo in infernvs vnvs soleo svm magnvs qvaestio qvomodo intelligo infernvs vtrvm illvc malvm tantvm an etiam bonvs morior descendo soleo vnvs si ergo tantvm malvm qvomodo iste ad filivs svvs svi dico lvgeo in comparatio hic svpervs terra in qvi facies vivo ce sicvt in comparatio caelvm svpervs vbi sanctvs demoratio svm angelvs peccans angelvs in hic aes detrvdo caligo scriptvra dico tamqvam carcer ervo anima mevs ex infernvs infervs avt noster vox per ipse christvs dominvs noster qvia ideo ille pervenio vsqve ad infernvs ne nos remaneo in infernvs qvintvs alia etiam opinio dico vnvs fortasse venio ad infernvs vt ervo inde omnis sanctvs praecedo anima o et tamen abraha in reqvies ibi svm qvadranta et qvidam dives cvm torqveo apvd inferi cvm video abrahes levo ocvlvs qvintvs non is possvm pono et oro in vox christvs ervo devs anima svvs ab infernvs infervs dico qvia libero svi ab talis peccatvm per qvi possvm dedvco ad tormentvm infernvs infervs pes qvemadmodvm si medicvs video tv immineo aegritvdo forte ex aliqvis labor et dico parco tv sic tv traho o reqviesco hic cibvs vtor  nam si non facio aegroto o tv avtem si facio et salvvs svm recte dico medicvs libero ego ab aegritvdo non in qvi iam svm sed in qvi svm svm vnvs nescio qvis habeo cavsa molestvs mitto svm in carcer vnvs venio alivs defendo is o gratia ago qvis dico ervo anima mevs de carcer  qvintvs svspendo svm debitor o solvtvs svm pro is o libero dico de svspendivm qvintvs in hic omnis non svm qvinqvaginta sed qvia talis meritvm ago et nisi svbvenio svm ibi svm inde svi recte dico libero qvo per liberator svvs non svm permitto perdvco vnvs ergo frater sive ille sive ille svm hic ego scrvtator verbvm devs non temerarivs affirmator teneo vnvs et ervo anima mevs ex infernvs infervs vnvs nvmqvides invenio homo talis qvi habeo spiritvs devs in svi ecce iam nisi fallo tertivs insinvo nos in hic liber spiritvs sanctvs is svm spiritvs devs qvintvs primo vbi dico svm spiritvs devs svper aqva o secvndvs vbi dico devs non permaneo spiritvs mevs in homo iste propter qvi caro svm o et tertivs nvnc qvi pharavs dico de iosephvs svm in ille spiritvs devs qvintvs nondvm tamen lego spiritvs sanctvs vnvs qvi dico scriptvra tot anima pario lia vel tot avt tot anima exeo de femvr iacob video svm qvis hinc respondeo is qvi hic testimonivm confirmo nitor ab parens simvl anima cvm corpvs propago qvintvs anima enim dico pro homo ab pars totvs significo locvtio nvllvs ambigo pentvm sed qvomodo ipse pars ex qvi totvs commemoro svm hic svm anima qvi nomen totvs homo significo svm alieno ab is qvi dictvm svm exeo de femvr is vt caro tantvm ex ille nascor qvamvis solvs anima nomino accipio qvaero svm locvtio modvs secvndvm scriptvra pes moritvrvs iacob filivs svvs iosephvs dico si invenio gratia in conspectvs tvvs svbicio manvs tvvs svb femvr mevs et facies in ego misericordia et veritas vnvs is filivs ivratio constringo qva servvs constringo abraha ille mando vnde vxor dvco filivs svvs iste sepvltvra commendo corpvs svvs qvintvs in vterqve tamen cavsa nomino svm dvo ille qvi magnvs habeo atqve pendeo svm in scriptvra omnis qvacvmqve dispersim lego misericordia et ivstitia vel misericordia et ivdicivm vel si facio in dominvs mevs misericordia et ivstitia ce sicvt et iste filivs svvs dico vt facio in ego misericordia et veritas vnvs qvis svi avtem volo tantvs vir tam sollicitvs corpvs commendatio vt non in aegyptvs sepelio sed in terra chanvs one ivxta pater svvs mirvs video et qvasi absvrdvs nec conveniens tantvs excellentia mens propheticvs si hic ex homo consvetvdo metior vnvs si avtem in hic omnis sacramentvm qvaero magnvs admiratio gavdivm ipse qvi invenio orior qvintvs cadaver qvippe mortvvs peccatvm significo in lex non dvbivs svm cvm ivbeo homo post is contrectatio sive qvaliscvm qvovs contingo tamqvam ab immvnditia pvrifico qvadrantal et hinc ille sententia dvco svm qvi baptilor ab morior et itervm tango ille qvis proficio lavatio is sic et qvi ieivno svper peccatvm svvs et itervm ambvlo hic idem qvintvs facio vnvs sepvltvra ergo mortvvs remissio significo peccatvm eo pertineo qvi dictvm svm beatvs qvi remissvs svm iniqvitas et qvi tectvm svm peccatvm qvinqvaginta vbi ergo sepelio svm hic significo cadaver patriarches nisi in is terra vbi ille crvcificvs svm qvi sangvis facio svm remissio peccatvm mors enim patriarcha peccatvm homo figvro svm qvinqvaginta dico avtem ab is locvs qvi abramivs voco vbi svm iste corpvs absvm locvs vbi crvcificvs svm dominvs fere xxx mille vt etiam ipse nvmervs is significo intelligo qvi in baptimmvm appareo ferme xxx annvs o et si qvis alivs de res tantvs vel hic modvs vel svblimis intelligo possvm dvm tamen non frvstra arbitror talis ac tantvs homo devs tantvs gero cvra pro sepelio corpvs svvs cvm svm atqve svm debeo fidelis iste secvritas qvod vbicvmqve corpvs is sepelio vel insepvltvs etiam per iniqvvs rabies relinqvo avt pro is libido dilacero absvmo non ideo vel parvm integer vel parvm gloriosvs is resvrrectio svm pes video qvomodo dico scriptvra qvi assidve dico de mortvvs et appositvs svm ad pater svvs vel appositvs svm ad popvlvs svvs qvintvs ecce enim de iacob dico iam qvidem morior sed nondvm sepelio et ad qvi popvlvs appono non in promtvs svm video vnvs ex ille enim popvlvs prior nascor qvi dico svm popvlvs israhel  qvi vero is praecedo tam pavci ivstvs nomino vt is popvlvs appello cvnctor pericvlvm peccatvm qvinqvaginta qvi intveor aio scriptvra ante mors ne lavdo homo qvisqvam vnvs qvadraginta dies sepvltvra qvi commemoro scriptvra forte significo aliqvis paenitentia qvi peccatvm sepelio qvadrantal non enim frvstra etiam qvadraginta dies ieivnivs svm constitvo qvi moses et helia et ipse dominvs ieivno o et ecclesivs praecipvvs observatio ieivnvs qvadragesimvs voco qvinqvaginta vnde et in hebraevs de ninevites apvd iona propheta scribo perhibeo qvadraginta dies et ninvs qvis everto vt per tot dies accommodatvs videlicet hvmiliatio paenitens intelligo in ieivnivm svvs defleo intro cvm is et exio mandvco et bibo o qvi dies vtiqve magnvs laetitia svm qvinqvaginta nec septvaginta interpres qvi lego consvesco ecclesivs erro credo svm vt non dico qvadraginta dies sed tridvvm avctoritas in scriptvra habeo qvintvs vnde alivs locvs scribo svm lvctvs morior septem dies o fatvvs avtem omnis dies vita is vnvs septenarivs avtem nvmervs propter sabbatvm sacramentvm praecipve qvies indicivm svm  vnde merito mortvvs tamqvam reqviesco exhibeo qvadrantal qvi tamen nvmervs in lvctvs iacor decvplo aegyptii qvi is septvaginta dies lvceo vnvs vnvs is qvi scribo svm et factvm svm in via ad refectio obvio is angelvs et qvaero is occido pes et assvmo sepphora calcvlvs circvmcido praepvtivm filivs svvs o et procido ad pes is et dico sto sangvis circvmcisio infans mevs qvadrantal et recedo ab is propter qvi dico desino sangvis circvmcisio primvm qvaero qvi volo angelvs occido vtrvm moyse one qvia dico svm occvrro is angelvs et qvaero is occido nam qvi pvto occvrro nisi ille qvi vniversvs svvs comitatvs praesvm et ab qvi ceteri dvco an pver qvaero occido qvi mater circvmcido svbvenio vt ob hic intelligo occido volo infans qvia non svm circvmcisvs atqve ita sancio praeceptvm circvmcisio severitas vindicta qvi si ita svm incertvs svm privs de qvi dico qvaero is occido qvia ignoro qvi nisi ex conseqvens reperio mirvs sane locvtio et invsitatvs vt privs dico occvrro is et qvaero is occido de qvi nihil antea dico vnvs sed talis svm in psalmvm fvndamentvm is in mons sanctvs o diligo dominvs porta sio ne qvinvs inde enim psalmvs incipio nec aliqvis de ille vel de ille dico qvi fvndamentvm intelligo volo dico fvndamentvm is in mons sanctvs qvintvs sed qvia seqvor diligo dominvs porta sio ne ergo fvndamentvm vel dominvs vel sio one ad facilis sensvs magis sio ne vt fvndamentvm civitas accipio qvinqvaginta sed qvia in hic pronomen qvi svm is genvs ambigvvs svm omnis enim genvs svm hic pronome one is svm et mascvlinvs et femininvs et nevter in graecvs avtem in femininvs genvs dico mascvlinvs et nevter avrvm et habeo codex graecvs atzove cogo intelligo non fvndamentvm sio one sed fvndamentvm dominvs is svm qvi constitvo dominvs de qvi dico svm aedifico hiervsal dominvs qvintvs nec sio one tamen nec dominvs antea nomino cvm dico fvndamentvm is in mons sanctvs qvintvs sic et hic nondvm nomino infans dictvm svm occvrro is et qvaero is occido vt de qvi dico in conseqvens agnosco qvintvs qvamqvam et si de mosvs qvisqve accipio volo non svm magnopere resisto vnvs ille potivs qvi seqvor si fio possvm intelligo qvis svi volo ideo recedo angelvs ab interfectio qvilibet is qvia dico mvlier sto sangvis circvmcisio si infans o non enim aio recedo ab is propter qvi circvmcido infans sed qvia sto sangvis circvmcisio o non qvia cvrro sed vxor propior tv alivs non concvpisco domvs propior tvvs vnvs decem tamen svm praeceptvm nevter ambigo qvoniam hic scriptvra testor vnvs vnvs mihi tamen video congrventer accipio tres ille et iste neqve ager is neqve servvs is neqve ancilla is neqve bos is neqve svbivgalis is nec omnis pecvs is nec qvicvmqve propior svvs svm qvinqvaginta discerno avtem video concvpisco vxor alienvs ab
