misericordia ivdicivm vnvs dvo enim chervbvs ne pinna svvs obvmbro propitiatorivs is svm honoro velo qvoniam ministerivm iste svm o et invicem svi attendo qvia consono dvo qvippe testamentvm figvro ibi et vvltvs is svm in propitiatorivs qvia misericordia devs in qvi vnvs spes svm valde commendo qvintvs deniqve hinc svi promitto  vnvs loqvor devs ad mosvs one de medivm chervbvs ne desvrsvs propitiatorivs qvintvs porro si creo rationalis in mvltitvdo scientia qvoniam hic interpretatio habeo chervbvs one dvo ipse animal significo ideo dvo svm vt societas caritas commendo ideo pinna svvs propitiatorivs obvmbro qvia devs non svi tribvo pinna svvs is svm devs honoro virtvs qvi praesto o et vvltvs is non svm nisi in propitiatorivs qvia qvicvmqve provecto ad mvltitvdo scientia spes non svm nisi in devs misericordia vnvs cvm dico moses ad dominvs ostendo ego gloria tvvs respondeo is dominvs ego transeo ante tv gloria mevs et voco nomen dominvs in conspectvs tvvs  et misereor qvi misertvs svm et misericordia praesto qvi misericordia praesto o cvm pavlo ante dico ipse antecedo tv et reqvies tv do vnvs qvi moses sic video accipio antecedo tv tamqvam non is popvlvs qvovs praesens in iter svm svm  et ideo aio si non tv ipse simvl venio nos cvm ne ego edvco hinc et cetera qvintvs devs avtem neqve hic is nego dico et hic tv verbvm qvi dico facio vnvs qvomodo ergo cvm dico moses ostendo ego gloria tvvs rvrsvs tamqvam praecedo et non cvm is simvl svm video dico ego transeo ante tv nisi qvia hic alivs svm ille qvippe intelligo loqvor et dico transeo ante tv de qvi dico evangelivm cvm venio hora vt transeo de hic mvndvs ad pater qvi transitvs etiam pascha interpretor perhibeo qvintvs hic itaqve magnvs omnino prophetia svm vnvs ipse enim ante omnis sanctvs transeo ad pater de hic saecvlvm paro ille mansio regnvm caelvm qvi do is in resvrrectio morior o qvoniam transeo ante omnis primogenitvs ab mortvvs facio svm gratia vero svvs in is ipse valde commendo cvm dico et voco nomen dominvs in conspectvs tvvs tamqvam in conspectvs popvlvs israhel qvi moses cvm qvinvs hic avdio typvs gero qvadrantal in conspectvs enim gens ipse vbiqve dispergo voco dominvs christvs in omnis gens qvinqvaginta voco avtem dico non voco activvs verbvm pro passivvs pono genvs locvtio invsitatvs in qvi nimirvm magnvs sensvs lateo vnvs sic enim fortasse significo volo svi ipse hic facio is svm gratia svvs fio vt voco dominvs in omnis gens vnvs qvi vero addo et misereor qvi misertvs svm et misericordia praesto qvi misericordia praesto plane expressvs ostendo vocatio qvi nos voco in svvs regnvm et gloria non pro meritvm noster sed pro misericordia svvs qvintvs qvoniam enim svi gens introdvco polliceor dico voco nomen dominvs in conspectvs tvvs commendo hic svi misericorditer facio o sicvt apostolvs dico dico enim christvs minister svm circvmcisio propter veritas devs ad confirmo promissio pater gens avtem svper misericordia glorificor devs qvintvs hic ergo praedico svm misereor qvi misertvs svm et misericordia praesto qvi misericordia praesto vnvs qvi verbvm prohibeo homo velvt de proprivs virtvs meritvm glorior vt qvi glorior in dominvs glorior qvintvs non enim aio misereor talis vel talis sed qvis misericors svm vt nemo praecedo bonvs opvs svvs misericordia tantvs vocatio mereo demonstro qvintvs etenim christvs pro impivs morior svm vnvs sedes vtrvm hic idem repeto volo cvm addo misericordia praesto qvi misericordia praestvs io tero vel sicvt alivs interpretor svm qvi misericors svm an aliqvis intersvm nescio vnvs qvi enim in graecvs lingva dvo verbvm dico svm et qvi vnvs atqve idem video significo non possvm latinvs diversvs verbvm dico et diversvs modvs idem misericordia repeto pes si avtem dico misereor qvi misereor et misereor qvi misereor avt misereor qvi misertvs svm non satis commode dico video vnvs et tamen fortis ille ipse ibi sensvs svm qvod avt ipse misericordia svvs firmitas devs iste repetitio monstranio sicvt amo ne amo one sicvt fio vnvs fio sicvt repetitio somnivm pharaon mvltvs qvove similis ante in vterqve popvlvs gens et hebraei hic modvs devs praenvntio misericordia svi svm facio vnvs qvi apostolvs ita dico sicvt enim vos aliqvando non credo devs nvnc avtem misericordia conseqvor svm ille incredvlitas sic et ipse nvnc non credo in vester misericordia vt et ipse misericordia conseqvor qvinqvaginta conclvdo enim devs omnis in incredvlitas vt omnis misereor qvintvs deindes post hic svvs misericordia commendatio respondeo ad ille qvi is dictvm svm ostendo ego gloria tvvs vel qvi svpra peto moses dico ostendo ego tv ipse manifeste video tv non possvm inqvio video facies mevs o non enim video homo facies mevs et vivo ostendo hic vita qvi ago in sensvs mortalis corrvptibilis caro devs sicvt svm appareo non possvm  is svm sicvt svm video in ille vita possvm vbi vt vivo hic vita morior svm vnvs ites interpono articvlvs dico scriptvra et aio dominvs seqvor et loqvor ecce locvs penes ego qvintvs qvis enim locvs non penes devs svm qvi nvsqvam svm absvm sed ecclesia significo dico ecce locvs penes ego tamqvam templvm svvs commendo vnvs et sto inqvio svper petra qvia svper hic petra aio dominvs aedifico ecclesia mevs statim vt transeo gloria mevs is svm statim vt transeo gloria mevs sto svper petra qvia post transitvs christvs is svm post passio et resvrrectio christvs sto popvlvs fidelis svper petra pes et pono tv inqvio in caverna petra mvntvs one firmvs significo vnvs alivs avtem interpretor svm in specvla petra vnvs sed graecvs habeo dnyvs o hic avtem forame one vel caverna recte interpretor vnvs et tego manvs mevs svper tv donec transeo  et avfero manvs mevs et tvnc video postervs mevs o facies avtem mevs non video tv vnvs cvm iam dico sto svper petra statim vt transeo gloria mevs vbi intelligo post transitvs svvs promitto svper petra stabilitas qvomodo accipio svm qvi aio pono tv in caverna petra et tego manvs mevs svper tv donec transeo  et avfero manvs et tvnc video postervs mevs qvasi iam ille in petra constitvo tego manvs svvs svper is et deinde transeo cvm svm in petra non possvm nisi post is transitvs pes sed recapitvlio intelligo svm res praetermitto qvalis soleo vt scriptvra in mvltvs locvs o postea qvippe dico qvod ordo tempvs prior svm vnvs qvi ordo ita svi habeo tego manvs mevs svper tv donec transeo et tvnc video postervs mevs o nam facies mevs non video tv o et sto svper petra statim vt transeo gloria mevs et pono tv in caverna petra vnvs hic enim factvm svm in is qvi tvnc significo persona mosivs hic svm israheles qvi in dominvs iesvs sicvt actvs apostolor indico postea credo is svm statim vt transeo is gloria vnvs nam posteaqvam resvrgo ab mortvvs et ascendo in caelvm mitto desvper spiritvs sanctvs cvm lingva omnis gens apostolvm loqvor compvnctvs svm cor mvlti ex is qvi crvcifico christvs  qvi vt non cognosco et dominvs gloria crvcifico  qvintvs caecitas ex pars israhel facio svm sicvt dico svm tego manvs mevs svper tv donec transeo vnvs vnde psalmvs dico qvoniam dies ac nox gravo svm svper ego manvs tvvs dies appello qvando christvs divinvs miracvlvm facio nox qvando sicvt homo morior qvando et ille titvbo qvi in dies credo qvintvs hic svm ergo cvm transeo tvnc video postervs mevs transeo de hic mvndvs ad pater o postervs in ego credo svm qvi typvs gero  vnvs tvnc enim compvngo cor dico qvis facio et ivbeo svm ab apostola qvintvs ago paenitentia et baptizo in nomen iesvs christvs vt dimitto ille peccatvm is qvintvs qvi in psalmvm ille seqvor cvm dico svm dies ac nox gravo svm svper ego manvs tvvs is svm vt non cognosco  si enim cognosco nvmqvam dominvs gloria crvcifico seqvor et ivngo converto svm in haervmna dvm confringo spina is svm cvm svm cor compvngo qvinqvaginta deinde addo peccatvm mevs cognosco et facinvs mevs non operio posteaqvam video qvantvs scelvs christvs crvcifico qvadranta et qvia recipio consilivm vt ago paenitentia et in baptismvs remissio accipio peccatvm dico inqvio pronvntio adversvs ego delictvm mevs dominvs et tv remitto impietas cor mevs vnvs hanc avtem prophetia qvi loqvor svm domina ad mosvs one satis res ipse indico qvando qvidem de petra vel caverna is et de manvs is svperpositio de visio posterivs is nihil postea visibilis opvs svbseqvor lego qvinqvaginta mox enim adivngo interpono articvlvs scriptvra et dico dominvs ad mosvs one cvm ipse dominvs vtiqve etiam ille qvi svpra svm loqvor  atqve inde contego qvis deinceps dominvs dico excido tv dvo tabvla lapidevs sicvt et primvs et cetera qvintvs et scribo in tabvla verbvm testamentvm decem verbvm qvinqvaginta de mosvs dictvm svm qvi ipse scribo qvi etiam devs pavlo ante dico scribo tv verbvm hic qvinqvaginta cvm vero primvm lex accipio qvi tabvla abicio et frango nec ipse excido dico svm tabvla lapidevs et modo dictvm svm excido tv dvo tabvla lapidevs  nec is dictvm svm vt scribo sicvt is modvs dico o nec is ipse scribo narro sicvt modo narro scriptvra et dico scribo in tabvla verbvm testamentvm decem verbvm qvinqvaginta sed tvnc dictvm svm et do mosivs statim vt cesso loqvor ad is in mons sina dvo tabvla testimonivm tabvla lapidevs scribo digitvs devs qvintvs deinde pavlo post et converto inqvio moses descendo de mons et dvo tabvla testimonivm in manvs is tabvla lapidevs scribo ex vterqve pars is hinc atqve hinc svm scribo et tabvla opvs devs svm et scriptvra scriptvra devs et scvlptvs in tabvla qvinqvaginta proinde magnvs orior qvaestio qvomodo ille tabvla qvi svm moses vtiqve devs praescio frango non homo opvs dico svm nec ab homo scribo sed scriptvra devs digitvs devs o postervs vero tabvla tamdiv maneo et in tabernacvlvm ac templvm devs svm ivbeo qvidem devs tamen ab homo excido svm ab homo scribo qvinqvaginta an forte in ille prior gratia devs significo non homo opvs qvi gratia indignvs factvm svm revertor cor in aegyptvs et facio idolvs o vnde ille beneficivm privatvs svm et propterea moses tabvla frango iste vero tabvla postervs significo svm qvi de svvs opvs glorior vnde dico apostolvs ignoro devs ivstitia et svvs volo constitvo ivstitia devs non svm svbicio ideo tabvla hvmanvs opvs scvlpo et hvmanvs opvs scribo do svm qvi cvm ipse maneo ad is significo de svvs opvs glorior non de digitvs devs hic svm de spiritvs devs certe ergo repetitio lex nonvs testamentvm significo ce ille avtem vetvs significo  vnde confringo et abolesco svm vnvs magis cvm secvndvs lex do nvllvs terror do sicvt ille in tantvs strepitvs ignis nvbes et tvba vnde tremefacio popvlvs dico non loqvor devs ad nos ne morior vnde significo timor svm in vetvs testamentvm in novvs dilectio vnvs qvomodo igitvr solvo hic qvaestio qvare ille opvs devs iste opvs homo et ille conscribo digitvs devs iste scribo ab homo an forte ideo magis in ille prior vetvs significo svm testamentvm qvia devs ibi praecipio sed homo non facio lex enim pono svm in vetvs testamentvm qvi convinco transgressor o qvi svbintro vt abvndo delictvm qvadrantal non impleo timor qvi non impleo nisi caritas vnvs et ideo dico opvs devs qvia devs lex constitvo devs conscribo o nvllvs opvs homo qvia homo devs non obtempero et is potivs lex revs facio qvadrantal in secvndvs avtem tabvla homo per adivtorivm devs tabvla facio atqve conscribo qvia novvs testamentvm caritas lex facio vnvs vnde dico dominvs non venio lex solvo sed impleo vnvs dico avtem apostolvs plenitvdo lex caritas o et fides qvi per dilectio operor qvintvs factvm svm itaqve homo in novvs testamentvm qvi in vetvs difficilis svm habeo fides qvi per dilectio operor atqve ille digitvs devs hic svm spiritvs devs intvs is in cor scribo non foris in lapis vnvs vnde dico apostolvs non in tabvla lapidevs sed in tabvla cor carnalis o qvoniam caritas devs qvi veraciter impleo praeceptvm diffvndo svm in cor noster per spiritvs sanctvs qvi do svm nos vnvs hic svm ergo primo do svm lex vbi significo vetvs testamentvm qvi svm opvs tantvmmodo devs et conscriptio digitvs devs qvi apostolvs dico itaqve lex sanctvs et mandatvm sanctvs et ivstvs et bonvm vnvs lex ergo sanctvs et bonvs devs opvs svm vbi homo nihil ago qvia non obtempero sed reatvs potivs premo lex minor atqve damno vnvs peccatvm enim inqvio vt appareo peccatvm per bonvm ego operor svm mors vnvs beatvs avtem homo svm cvm hic mandatvm sanctvs et ivstvs et bonvm svm etiam opvs is sed per gratia devs vnvs privs ergo vt adverto et intelligo admoneo non dico dominvs omnis blasphemivm in spiritvs non remitto neqve dico qvi dico qvicvmqve verbvm contra spiritvs sancio non remitto is sed qvi dico verbvm vnvs ille enim si dico nihil nos omnino remaneo vnde dispvto possvm qvintvs qvoniam si omnis blasphemivs et omnis verbvm qvi dico contra spiritvs sancio non remitto homo ex nvllvs genvs impietas is qvi donvm christvs et sanctificatio ecclesia contradico vel paganvs vel ivdaei avt qvi haereticvs nonnvllvs etiam in ipse catholicvs imperitvs qvisqvam ecclesivs lvcror qvintvs sed absvm vt hic dominvs dico o absvm inqvio vt veritas dico omnis blasphemia vel omnis verbvm qvi contra spiritvs sanctvs dico non habeo remissio neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm pes exerceo qvippe nos volo difficvltas qvaestio non decipio sententia falsitas vnvs qvapropter non svm necesse vt omnis blasphemia et omnis verbvm qvi dico contra spiritvs sanctvs remissio qvisqvam existimo non habeo o sed necesse svm plane vt svm aliqvis blasphemia et aliqvis verbvm qvi si dico contra spiritvs sanctvs nvllvs vmqvam venia remissio qvovs mereor vnvs qvia si omnis accipio qvisnam possvm salvo si avtem rvrsvs nvllvs pvto contradico salvator vnvs svm ergo sine dvbivm aliqvis blasphemivs et aliqvis verbvm qvi si dictvm svm contra spiritvs sanctvs non remitto vnvs qvis svm avtem hic verbvm qvaero ab nos dominvs volo o ideo non exprimo vnvs qvaero inqvio volo non nego vnvs soleo enim scriptvra ita loqvor vt qvando aliqvis sic dico vt neqve ex totvm neqve ex pars dico definio non svm necesse ex totvm sed fio possvm ex pars vt intelligo qvintvs iste ergo sententia ex totvm is svm vniversaliter pronvntio si dico omnis blasphemia in spiritvs non remitto avt qvi dico vllvs verbvm contra spiritvs sancio non remitto is neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm  ex pars avtem is svm particvlariter pronvntio si dico qvidam blasphemivs in spiritvs non remitto  pes qvia nec vniversaliter ergo nec particvlariter pronvntio sententia svm non enim dictvm svm omnis blasphemivs spiritvs avt qvidam blasphemivs sed tantvmmodo indefinite dictvm svm spiritvs blasphemivm non remitto o nec dictvm svm qvi dico qvicvmqve verbvm avt qvi dico qvidam verbvm sed indefinite qvi dico verbvm non svm necesse vt omnis blasphemia vel omnis verbvm intelligo sed necesse svm plane vt qvidam blasphemivs et qvidam verbvm volo intelligo dominvs qvamvis is exprimo nolo vt qvaero peto pvlso si qvis rectvm intellectvs accipio non viliter habeo vnvs hoc vt manifeste video ille attendo qvi aio idem ipse de ivdaei si non venio et loqvor is svm peccatvm non habeo qvintvs neqve enim ita dictvm svm vt sine vllvs omnino peccatvm volo intelligo fvtvrvs svm ivdaei si non venio et loqvor is svm o plenvs qvippe invenio onero qvovs peccatvm qvintvs propter qvi dico venio ad ego omnis qvi laboro et onero svm vnvs vnde nisi sarcina peccatvm ex transgressio lex qvoniam lex svbintro vt abvndo delictvm qvadrantal cvm ergo ipse etiam alibi dico non venio voco ivstvs sed peccator qvomodo si non venio peccatvm non habeo nisi qvia iste sententia nec vniversaliter nec particvlariter sed indefinite pronvntio non omnis peccatvm cogo intelligo sed plane nisi aliqvis peccatvm intelligo qvod non habeo nisi christvs venio et loqvor is svm falsvs qvod absitvntea svm dico vnvs non ergo aio si non venio et loqvor is svm nvllvs peccatvm habeo ne veritas mentior vnvs nec rvrsvs definiter dico si non venio et loqvor is svm qvidam peccatvm non habeo ne pivs stvdivm parvm exerceo vnvs in omnis qvippe copia scriptvra sanctvs pasco aperio et exerceo obscvrvs illinc fama expello hinc fastidivm qvinqvaginta qvia ergo dico non svm peccatvm nvllvs habeo non pertvrbo cvm peccator ivdaei etiam si dominvs non venio agnosco  sed tamen qvia dictvm svm si non venio peccatvm non habeo qvintvs vnde necesse svm etiam si non omnis aliqvis tamen is ex adventvs dominvs qvi non habeo contraho peccatvm qvintvs ille ipse profecto svm qvi in praesens svi qvovs loqvor non credo is qvovs inimicvs depvto qvoniam vervs dico insvper occido qvintvs hic peccatvm tam magnvs et horrendvs si non venio et loqvor is svm vtiqve non habeo qvadrantal sicvt ergo ibi cvm avdio peccatvm non habeo non omnis sed alo qvintvs qvi peccatvm intelligo ita in hodiernvs lectio cvm avdio spiritvs blasphemivm non remitto non omnis blasphemivs sed qvidam o et cvm avdio qvi dico verbvm contra spiritvs sanctvs non remitto is non omnis verbvm sed qvidam intelligo debeo vnvs nam et hic ipse qvi aio spiritvs avtem blasphemivs non remitto vtiqve non omnis spiritvs sed spiritvs sanctvs blasphemivs necesse svm intelligo pentvm qvi etsi plane alibi non dico qvis tam vecors svm vt alivs intelligo secvndvm hic regvla locvtio et ille accipio nisi qvis renatvs svm ex aqva et spiritvs qvintvs non enim aio et ab spiritvs sanctvs et tamen hic intelligo vnvs nec qvoniam dico ex aqva et spiritvs omnis spiritvs qvisqvam intelligo cogo qvintvs qvocirca cvm avdio spiritvs avtem blasphemivm non remitto sicvt non omnis spiritvs ita non omnis blasphemia oportet accipio vnvs avdio iam volo vos video qvoniam non svm omnis qvisnam svm ille blasphemivs spiritvs qvi non remitto et qvi svm verbvm qvoniam non svm omnis qvi si dico svm contra spiritvs sanctvs non remitto neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm pes iam et ego volo dico qvi intente exspecto avdio o sed tolero aliqvantvs magnvs diligentia mora donec adivvo dominvs totvs qvi occvrro expedio vnvs alivs qvippe dvo evangelistvs marcvs et lvcae cvm de hic res loqvor non dico blasphemivs sev verbvm vt intelligo non omnis blasphemivs sed qvidam nec verbvm omnis sed qvidam vnvs qvia non possvm omnis intelligo ne paganvs ivdaei haereticvs omnis qvovs homo genvs qvi diversvs error et contradictio blasphemo in spiritvs sanctvs spes remissio si svi corrigo avfero resto vtiqve vt in is qvi scribo svm qvi blasphemo in spiritvs sanctvs non habeo remissio in aeternvs ille intelligo qvi non omnis modvs sed is modvs blasphemo vt is nvmqvam possvm ignosco vnvs sicvt enim in is qvi dico svm devs nemo tento non omnis sed qvidam temtatio modvs devs nemo temto intelligo svm ne falsvs svm ille qvi scriptvm svm tento vos dominvs devs vester et ne christvs nego devs vel dico falsvs evangelivm vbi lego qvi interrogo discipvlvs tento is o ipse avtem scio qvis svm facio svm enim temtatio addvco peccatvm qva devs nemo tento o et svm temtatio probo fides qvi et devs temto dignor ita cvm avdio qvi blasphemo in spiritvs sanctvs non omnis blasphemo genvs debeo accipio sicvt nec ibi omnis temtor vnvs item cvm avdio qvi credo et baptizatvs svm salvvs svm non vtiqve intelligo is modvs credo qvo et daemo credo et contremesco nec in is nvmervs baptipo in qvi magvs simo one baptizo possvm sed salvvs svm non possvm vnvs sicvt ergo cvm dico qvi credo et baptizatvs svm salvvs svm non omnis credo et baptizo sed qvidam intveor in is scilicet constitvo fides qvi apostolvs distingvo per dilectio operor ita cvm dico qvi blasphemo in spiritvs sanctvs non habeo remissio in aeternvm non omnis sed qvidam blasphemans spiritvs sanctvs intendo reor qvi qvisqve svm obligo nvllvs vmqvam remissio solvo vnvs illvs etiam qvi aio is qvi mandvco mevs caro et bibo mevs sangvis in ego maneo et ego in ille qvomodo intelligo svm nvmqvid etiam ille hic possvm accipio de qvi dico apostolvs qvod ivdicivm svi mandvco et bibo cvm ipse caro mandvco et ipse sangvis bibo nvmqvid et lvdo magister venditor et traditor impivs qvamvis primvs ipse manvs is conficio sacramentvm caro et sangvis is cvm cetervs discipvlvs sicvt aperte lvcae evangelistvs declaro mandvco et bibo maneo in christvs avt christvs in is tam mvltvs deniqve qvi vel cor fictvs caro ille mandvco et sangvis bibo vel cvm mandvco et bibo apostatvs fio nvmqvid maneo in christvs avt christvs in is sed profecto svm qvidam modvs mandvco ille caro et bibo ille sangvis qvi modvs qvi mandvco et bibo in christvs maneo et christvs in is qvintvs non ergo qvicvmqve modvs qvisqve mandvco caro christvs et bibo sangvis christvs maneo in christvs et in ille christvs sed certvs qvidam modvs qvi modvs ipse vtiqve video qvando iste dico qvintvs sic igitvr et in is qvi aio qvi blasphemo in spiritvs sancio non habeo remissio in aeternvm non qvicvmqve modvs blasphemo revs svm hic irremissibilis delictvm sed modo qvidam qvi nos qvaero atqve intelligo volo qvi hic sententia vervs terribilis qvove depromo vnvs proevs captvs noster qvantvm iste per specvlvm et in aenigma praesertim talis qvalis adhvc svm video concedo insinvo nos in pater avctoritas in filivs nativitas in spiritvs sanctvs pater filivs qvavis commvnitas in tres aeqvalitas vnvs qvi ergo commvnis svm pater et filivs per hic nos volo habeo commvnio et inter nos et cvm svi per ille donvm nos colligo in vnvm qvi ambo habeo vnvs hic svm per spiritvs sanctvs devs et donvm devs vnvs in hic enim divinitas reconcilio is qvove delecto qvintvs nam qvis nos prosvm qvisqvis bonvs nosco nisi etiam diligo sicvt avtem veritas disco ita caritas diligo vt et plene cognosco et beatvs cognosco perfrvor vnvs caritas porro diffvndo svm in cor noster per spiritvs sanctvs qvi do svm nos vnvs et qvia peccatvm alieno ab possessio vervs bonvm caritas cooperio mvltitvdo peccatvm qvintvs svm ergo pater filivs veritas origo verax et filivs de verax pater orior veritas et spiritvs sanctvs ab pater bonvs et filivs bonvs effvndo bonitas vnvs omnis svm avtem non impar divinitas nec separabilis vnitas vnvs primo ergo in nos ad accipio vita aeternvs qvi in novvs do de bonitas devs mvnvs venio ab initivm fides remissio peccatvm qvadrantal per qvi beneficivm ervo de potestas tenebrae et princeps hic mvndvs mitto foras ab fides noster qvi operor in filivs infidelitas nvllvs vis alivs nisi societas et obligatio peccatvm qvintvs in spiritvs enim sanctvs qvi in vnvs devs popvlvs congrego eicio spiritvs immvndvs qvi in svi ipse divido qvintvs contra hic donvm gratvitvs contra iste devs gratia loqvor cor impaenitens vnvs ipse ergo impaenitentia svm spiritvs blasphemivm qvi non remitto neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm pes contra enim spiritvs sanctvs qvi baptizo qvi peccatvm omnis dimitto et qvi accipio ecclesivs vt qvi dimitto peccatvm dimitto is verbvm valde malvm et nimis impivs sive cogitatio sive etiam lingva svvs dico qvintvs qvi patientia devs cvm ad paenitentia addvco ipse secvndvm dvritia cor svvs et cor impaenitens thesavrilo svi ira in dies ira et revelatio ivstvs ivdicivm devs qvi reddo vnvsqvisqve secvndvm opera is qvintvs hic ergo impaenitentia sic enim vnvs aliqvis nomen possvm vtcvmqve appello blasphemia et verbvm contra spiritvs sancio qvi remissio non habeo in aeternvm hic inqvio impaenitentia contra qvi clamo et praeco et ivdex dico paenitentia agite o appropinqvo enim regnvm caelvm o contra qvi dominvs os evangelica praedicatio aperio et contra qvi ipse evangelivm in totvs orbis praedico svm praedico vbi posteaqvam resvrgo ab mortvvs aio discipvlvs svvs oportet christvs patior et resvrgo ab mortvvs tertivs dies et praedico in nomen is paenitentia et remissio peccatvm per omnis gens incipio ab hiervsal hic omnino impaenitentia non habeo remissio neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm qvia paenitentia impetro remissio in hic saecvlvm qvi valeo in fvtvrvm pes sed iste impaenitentia vel cor impaenitens qvamdiv qvisqve in hic caro vivo non possvm ivdico vnvs de nvllvs enim despero svm qvamdiv patientia devs ad paenitentia addvco nec de hic vita rapio impivs o qvi non volo mors impivs qvantvm revertor et vivo qvintvs paganvs svm hodie o vnde scio vtrvm svm svm crastinvm christianvs ivdaevs infidelis svm hodie o qvis si cras credo in christvs haereticvs svm hodie o qvis si cras seqvor catholicvs veritas schismaticvs svm hodie o qvis si cras amplector catholicvs pax qvis si iste qvi in qvicvmqve genvs error nota et tamqvam desperatvs modo damnvs anteqvam finio iste vita ago paenitentia et invenio vervs vita proinde frater etiam ad hic vos admoneo qvi aio apostolvs nolo ante tempvs qvisqvam indico vnvs hic enim blasphemivs spiritvs qvi nvmqvam svm vllvs remissio qvi non omnis sed qvidam intelligo is qvive persevero dvritia cor impaenitens vel dico vel invenio vel etiam qvantvm existimo ostendo non possvm in qvisqvam sicvt dico dvm adhvc in hic vita svm deprehendo vnvs qvi non ideo video absvrdvs qvia cvm homo vsqve in finis hic vita in dvrvs impaenitentia persevero div mvltvm qvovs loqvor adversvs hic gratia spiritvs sanctvs evangelivm tamen tam longvs contradictio cor impaenitens qvasi brevis aliqvis verbvm appello dico qvicvmqve dico verbvm contra filivs homo remitto is  qvi avtem dico contra spiritvs sancio non remitto is neqve in hic saecvlvm neqve in fvtvrvm pes hic enim qvamvis prolixvs svm et mvltvs verbvm contexo et prodvco blasphemivs soleo tamen scriptvra etiam mvltvs verbvm verbvm appello vnvs neqve enim vnvs verbvm loqvor svm qvicvmqve propheta o et tamen sic lego verbvm qvi factvm svm ad ille vel ille propheta  pes et apostolvs presbo inqvio dvplex honor honoro magis qvi laboro in verbvm et doctrina  non aio in verbvm sed in verbvm qvintvs et sanctvs iacobvs svm inqvio factor verbvm et non avditor tantvm o non aio et ipse verbvm sed verbvm qvamvis tam mvltvs verbvm de scriptvra sanctvs in ecclesivs celebriter et sollemniter lego dico avdio qvintvs sicvt ergo qvantvscvm qvisqve tempvs qvisqve nos in praedico evangelivm laboro non verbvm sed verbvm dico praedicator o et qvantvscvm qvisqve tempvs qvisqve vos noster praedicatio diligenter atqve instanter avdio non verbvm sed verbvm avdio stvdiosvs nvncvpo ita is mos qvi scriptvra loqvor et qvi nosco ecclesias consvetvdo qvisqvis vniversvs svvs vita qvi in iste gero caro qvantvslibet longitvdo protendo qvicvmqve verbvm vel os vel solvs cogitatio loqvor svm cor impaenitens contra remissio peccatvm qvi fio in ecclesivs verbvm dico contra spiritvs sanctvs qvintvs ideo avtem non solvm verbvm qvi dico svm contra filivs homo sed omnis prorsvs peccatvm et blasphemivs remitto homo o qvia vbi hic peccatvm non svm cor impaenitens contra spiritvs sancio qvi in ecclesivs peccatvm solvo cvnctvs alivs dimitto qvadrantal qvomodo avtem hic remitto qvi etiam remissio impedio alivs omnis ergo dimitto is in qvi hic non svm qvi nvmqvam dimitto  in qvi svm avtem qvoniam hic nvmqvam dimitto nec alivs dimitto qvia omnis remissio vincvlvm iste impedio vnvs non ergo propterea qvicvmqve dico verbvm contra filivs homo remitto is qvi avtem dico contra spiritvs sanctvs non remitto qvia in trinitas magnvs svm filivs spiritvs sanctvs qvod nvllvs vmqvam vel haereticvs dico o sed qvoniam qvisqve resisto veritas et blasphemo veritas qvi svm christvs etiam post tantvs svi praedicatio at verbvm apvd homo carvs fio et habito in nos qvi svm filivs homo ipse idem christvs si non dico verbvm ille cor impaenitens contra spiritvs sanctvs de qvi dico svm qvi non renascor svm ex aqva et spiritvs et de qvi item dico svm accipio spiritvs sanctvs  si qvi dimitto peccatvm dimitto ille is svm si paeniteo is accipio per donvm remvs sio omnis peccatvm simvl et hic qvi verbvm dico contra filivs homo qvia peccatvm ignorantia sive contvmacia vel qvisqve blasphemia non addo peccatvm impaenitentia contra donvm devs et gratia regeneratio vel reconciliatio qvi fio in ecclesivs spiritvs sanctvs qvintvs proindes nec ille sentio svm qvi qvidam pvto ideo remitto verbvm qvi dico contra filivs homo non remitto avtem qvi dico contra spiritvs sancio qvia propter svscipio caro facio svm filivs homo christvs qvi caro vtiqve magnvs svm spiritvs sanctvs qvi svbstantia proprie aeqvalis svm pater et vnigento filivs secvndvm is divinitas secvndvm qvam et ipse vnigenitvs filivs aeqvalis svm pater et spiritvs sanctvs vnvs nam si hic propterea dico svm profecto de omnis cetera blasphemivs taceo vt hic solvs remissibilis video qvi contra filivs homo dico qvia sicvt homo solvm pvto qvintvs cvm vero praemitto svm omnis peccatvm et blasphemivs remitto homo qvi etiam apvd alivs evangelistvs ita pono svm omnis dimitto filivs homo peccatvm et blasphemia qvi blasphemo procvl dvbivm et ille blasphemivs qvi contra pater dico iste generalitas conclvdo o et tamen hic solvs irremissibilis definio qvi dico contra spiritvs sanctvs vnvs nvmqvidnam et pater forma servvs accipio qvi svm magnvs spiritvs sanctvs non vtiqve o sed ideo post vniversalis commemoratio omnis peccatvm omnis qvove blasphemia eminenter volo exprimo blasphemia qvi dico contra filivs homo qvia etiam si ille peccatvm svm homo obligo qvi commemoro vbi aio si non venio et loqvor is svm peccatvm non habeo  qvi etiam in evangelivm secvndvm iohannes one valde gravis ostendo svm pecco vbi aio de ipse spiritvs sanctvs cvm is svi mitto svm promitto ille argvo mvndvs de peccatvm de ivstitia et de ivdicivm o de peccatvm qvidem qvi non credo in ego tamen si non dico ille cor impaenitens dvritia verbvm contra spiritvs sancio etiam hic qvi dictvm svm contra filivs homo remitto vnvs hinc fortasse aliqvis qvaero vtrvm tantvmmodo spiritvs sanctvs peccatvm dimitto an et pater et filivs vnvs respondeo qvod et pater et filivs vnvs ipse enim filivs de pater dico si dimitto peccatvm homo dimitto vos pater vester peccatvm vester vnvs qvi nos qvoqve dico in oratio dominicvs pater noster qvi svm in caelvm o atqve inter cetera et hic peto dico dimitto nos debeo qvintvs noster qvintvs de svi ipse avtem aio vt scio qvi habeo filivs homo potestas in terra dimitto peccatvm qvintvs si ergo inqvio et pater et filivs et spiritvs sanctvs peccatvm dimitto cvr ille impaenitentia qvi nvmqvam dimitto tantvmmodo ad spiritvs blasphemivs dico pertineo tamqvam ille qvi hic impaenitentia peccatvm svm obligo donvm sanctvs spiritvs resisto video qvod is donvm fio remissio peccatvm haect ita dico vt tamen inseparabilis intelligo operatio trinitas ita vt cvm operatio pater dico non is sine filivs et spiritvs sanctvs operor intelligo o et cvm operatio filivs non sine operatio pater et spiritvs sanctvs  et cvm operatio spiritvs sanctvs non sine pater et filivs vnvs satis notvs svm recte credo vel etiam vt possvm intelligens et ille ideo dictvm svm de pater ipse facio opera qvi ab ille svm origo etiam opvs ab qvi svm exsisto coopero persona qvia et filivs de ille natvs svm et spiritvs sanctvs principaliter de ille procedo de qvi natvs svm filivs et cvm qvi ille commvnis svm idem spiritvs vnvs hinc svm qvi dominvs iesvs in spiritvs sanctvs daemo eicio vnvs neqve enim et solvs hic impleo non possvm atqve ille adivtorivm tamqvam hic opvs non svfficiens assvmo  sed spiritvs divido in svi ipse is spiritvs congrvo expello qvi pater et filivs non divido in svi ipse commvniter habeo vnvs sic et peccatvm qvia praeter ecclesia non dimitto in is spiritvs dimitto oportet qvi in vnvm ecclesivs congrego qvintvs deniqve si qvisqvam extra ecclesia svvs paeniteo peccatvm et hic tantvs peccatvm qvi alienvs svm ab ecclesivs devs cor impaenitens habeo qvis is prosvm ille paenitentia cvm iste solvs verbvm dico contra spiritvs sanctvs qvi extranevs svm ab ecclesia qvi accipio hic donvm vt in spiritvs sanctvs fio remissio peccatvm qvi remissio cvm trinitas facio proprie tamen ad spiritvs sanctvs intelligo pertineo vnvs ipse enim spiritvs adoptio filivs in qvi clamo abbo pater vt is possvm dico dimitto nos debeo noster qvinqvaginta et in hic cognosco sicvt iohannes apostolvs aio qvoniam christvs in nos maneo et de spiritvs qvi do nos qvintvs ipse spiritvs testimonivm reddo spiritvs noster qvia svm filivs devs vnvs ad ipse enim pertineo societas qvi efficio vnvs corpvs vnicvs filivs devs vnvs vnde scribo svm si qvis igitvr exhortatio in christvs si qvis solacivm caritas si qvis societas spiritvs vnvs propter hic societas ille in qvi primitvs venio lingva omnis gens svm loqvor qvia per lingva consociatio consto genvs hvmanvs o et sic oportet per lingva omnis gens significo iste societas filivs devs et membrvm christvs svm in omnis gens vt qvemadmodvm tvnc ille appareo accipio spiritvs sanctvs qvi loqvor lingva omnis gens ita ille svi nvnc agnosco accipio spiritvs sanctvs qvi teneo vincvlvm pax ecclesia qvi diffvndo in omnis gens qvintvs vnde dico apostolvs stvdeo servo vnitas spiritvs in vincvlvm pax qvadrantal qvis avtem ipse svm spiritvs pater ipse filivs dico de pater procedo o et alivs locvs non enim vos svm qvi loqvor sed spiritvs pater vester qvi loqvor in vos qvintvs qvi vero ipse svm spiritvs filivs apostolvs dico mitto devs spiritvs filivs svvs in cor noster clamo abba pater hic svm clamo facio o nos enim clamo sed in ille is svm ipse diffvndo caritas in cor noster sine qvi inaniter clamo qvicvmqve clamo qvintvs vnde item dico qvisqvis avtem spiritvs christvs non habeo hic non svm is vnvs ad qvi ergo in trinitas proprie pertineo hic commvnio societas nisi ad is spiritvs qvi svm pater filivs qvovs commvnis neqve enim habito in qvisqvam spiritvs sanctvs sine pater et filivs sicvt nec filivs sine pater et spiritvs sanctvs nec sine ille pater vnvs inseparabilis svm qvippe operatio qvia inseparabilis habitatio ce sed singillatim plervmqve per creo significatio non per svvs svbstantia demonstro sicvt svvs tempvs spativm syllaba occvpo separatim vox pronvntio nec tamen ab svi ipse vllvs intervallvm momentvm qvovs tempvs separo non enim vmqvam dico possvm simvl cvm svm non possvm nisi semper simvl qvinvs sed vt iam non semel dico ideo remissio peccatvm qvi in svi divido spiritvs everto et expello regnvm ideo societas vnitas ecclesia extra qvam non fio ipse remissio peccatvm tamqvam proprivs opvs svm spiritvs sanctvs pater sane et filivs coopero qvia societas svm qvidam modvs pater et filivs et spiritvs sanctvs vnvs nam pater non commvniter habeo pater ab filivs et spiritvs sanctvs qvia non svm pater ambo o et filivs non commvniter habeo filivs ab pater et spiritvs sanctvs qvia non svm filivs ambo qvintvs spiritvs avtem sanctvs commvniter habeo ab pater et filivs qvia spiritvs svm vnvs ambo qvintvs qvisqvis igitvr revs svm impaenitentia contra spiritvs in qvi vnitas et societas commvnio congrego ecclesia nvmqvam ille remitto qvia hic svi clavdo vbi remitto  et merito damno cvm spiritvs qvi in svi ipse divido svm divido et ipse contra spiritvs qvi in svi ipse divido non svm vnvs vt de blasphemivs spiritvs hic sententia dico cavsa exsisto ex commemoratio spiritvs immvndvs qvi in svi ipse divido svm vnvs dico enim svm de dominvs qvi in princeps daemon eicio daemo vnvs ibi svi dominvs aio in spiritvs sanctvs eicio daemo vt spiritvs qvi non svm in svi divido is qvi in svi divido svm vinco atqve eicio ille avtem homo in is perditio remaneo qvi in hic qvi in svi divido non svm pax per impaenitentia transeo detrecto pentvm hic enim marcvs ita narro amo ne dico vos qvoniam omnis dimitto filivs homo peccatvm et blasphemia qvi blasphemo ce qvi avtem blasphemo in spiritvs sanctvs non habeo remissio in aeternvm sed revs svm aeternvs delictvm vnvs hic verbvm dominvs cvm qvintvs dico svvs deinde conivngo dico qvoniam dico spiritvs immvndvs habeo vt ostendo hinc svm exorior cavsa vt hic dico qvi dico is in beelzebvbvs princeps daemonivm daemo repello non qvia ipse svm blasphemia qvi non remitto cvm et hic remitto si rectvs paenitentia conseqvor ce sed qvod hinc vt dico cavsa exsisto vt ab dominvs ille sententia profero facio mentio spiritvs immvndvs qvi adversvs svi ipse dominvs divido ostendo propter spiritvs sanctvs qvi non solvm adversvs svi divido non svm sed etiam qvi colligo efficio indivisvs peccatvm qvi adversvs svi divido svm dimitto is qvove mvndatvs inhabito qvintvs nam etsi qvisqvam ita svm contrarivs veritas vt devs loqvor non in prophes sed in vnicvs filivs cvm propter nos is vt nos in is loqvor filivs homo svm volo relvctor remitto is cvm paeniteo converto svm ad devs benignitas ce qvi cvm mors impivs nolo qvantvm vt revertor et vivo do ecclesia svvs spiritvs sancio vt qvicvmqve in is peccatvm dimitto dimitto is qvintvs qvi vero hic donvm exsisto inimicvs vt non ille per paenitentia peto sed is per impaenitentia contradico fio irremissibilis non qvicvmqve peccatvm sed contemtvs vel etiam oppvgno ipse remissio peccatvm qvintvs atqve ita dico verbvm contra spiritvs sancio cvm ex dispersio ad congregatio nvmqvam venio qvi ad remitto peccatvm accipio spiritvs sancio qvadrantal ad qvis congregatio etiam si per minister reprobvs et fictvs aliqvis accedo cor non fictvs in ipse spiritvs sanctvs remissio accipio peccatvm qvintvs qvi spiritvs in sanctvs ecclesivs etiam iste tempvs qvi velvt area cvm palea tritvro sic operor vt nvllvs vervs confessio aspernor nvllvs simvlatio fallo atqve ita reprobvs fvgio vt etiam per is ministerivm probvs colligo vnvs vnvs ergo svffvgivm svm ne svm irremissibilis blasphemivs cor impaenitens caveo nec aliter paenitentia prosvm credo nisi vt teneo ecclesivs vbi remissio peccatvm do et societas spiritvs in pax vincvlvm cvstodio qvadranta dico aliqvis non cotidie accipio evcharistia vnvs qvaero qvare qvoniam inqvio eligo svm dies qvi pvrvs homo continenter qvove vivo qvo ad tantvs sacramentvm dignvs accedo qvintvs qvi enim mandvco indigne ivdicivm svi mandvco et bibo  vnvs alivs contra immo inqvio si tantvs svm plaga peccatvm atqve impetvs morbvs vt medicamentvm differo svm avctoritas antistes debeo qvisqve ab altarivm removeo ad ago paenitentia et idem avctoritas reconcilio qvintvs hic svm enim indigne accipio si is tempvs accipio qvi debeo ago paenitentia non vt arbitrivm svvs cvm libet vel avfero svi commvnio vel reddo pentvm cetervm si tantvs non svm vt excommvnico qvisqve homo ivdico non svi debeo ab cotidianvs medicina dominicvs corpvs separo  vnvs recte inter is fortasse qvispiam dirimo lis qvi moneo vt praecipve in christvs pax permaneo qvintvs facio avtem vnvsqvisqve qvi secvndvm fides svvs pie credo svm facio vnvs nevter avtem is exhorreo corpvs et sangvis dominvs sed salvber sacramentvm certatim honoro contendo qvintvs neqve enim litigo inter svi avt qvisqvam is svi alter praepono zacchaevs et ille centvrio cvm alter is gavdeo in domvs svvs svscipio dominvs alter dico non svm dignvs vt svb tectvm mevs intro ambo salvator honorifics diversvs et qvasi contrarivs modvs ambo peccatvm miser ambo misericordia conseqvor qvintvs valeo enim ad hic similitvdo qvi in primvs popvlvs vnvsqvisqve fidelis manna secvndvm proprivs volvntas in os sapio sic in vnvsqvisqve os christianvs sacramentvm ille qvi svbivgo svm mvndvs vnvs nam et ille honoro non avdeo cotidie svmo et ille honoro non avdeo vllvs dies praetermitto vnvs contemtvs solvs non volo cibvs iste sicvt manna fastidivm qvadrantal inde enim et apostolvs indigne dico acceptvm ab is qvi hic non discerno ab cetervs cibvs veneratio singvlariter debeo qvintvs continvo qvippe cvm dico ivdicivm svi mandvco et bibo addo vt dico non diivdico corpvs qvi satis totvs ipse locvs in epistola ad corinthivs primvs si diligenter attendo appareo mille sio aliqvis peregrinvs in is forte locvs vbi perseveranter in observatio qvadragesimvs nec qvintvs sabbatvm lavo relaxo qve ieivnivm noriv inqvio hodie ieivno  vnvs qvaero cavsa vnvs qvia non fio inqvio in patria mevs  pentvm qvis alivs iste nisi consvetvdo svvs consvetvdo alter praepono conor non enim ego de liber devs hic recito svm avt vniversvs qvi dilato ecclesia plenvs vox certo avt ostendo ille contra fides facio svi avtem secvndvm fides mos qvovs hinc bonvs avt ille violo avt svi cvstodio convinco qvintvs violo sane qvies et pax svvs de svperflvvs qvaestio rixor vnvs malo tamen in res hic modvs vt et ille in hic et hic in ille patria ab is qvi ceteri facio non abhorreo vnvs sine etiam in alienvs patria cvm peregrinor vbi magnvs et freqvens et fervens svm popvlvs devs video verbvm gratia bis offero qvintvs sabbatvm vltimvs qvadragesimvs et mane et ad vespera venio qvovs in patria svvs vbi in finis dies mos svm offero male atqve illicite fio contendo qvoniam aliter ipse video pverilis svm iste sensvs cano in nos tolero et corrigo in noster qvintvs his enim cavsa is svm avt propter fides avt propter mos vel emendo oportet qvod perperam fio vel institvo qvi non fio vnvs ipse qvippe mvtatio consvetvdo etiam qvi vtilitas adivvo novitas pertvrbo qvintvs qvapropter qvi vtilis non svm pertvrbatio infrvctvosvs et conseqventer noxivs svm vnvs nec ideo pvto debeo institvtvm svm mvltvs locvs vt ille dies post refectio offero qvia scriptvm svm identidem et calix post cena dico qvintvs ipse enim possvm appello cena qvod iam corpvs accipio vt deinde calix accipio qvadrantal nam qvia alibi dico conveniens ergo vos in vnvs non svm dominicvs cena mandvco hic ipse acceptio evcharistia dominicvs cena voco ille magis moveo possvm homo vt iam reficio dies ille vel offero vel svmo evcharistia qvi in evangelivm dico cvm avtem ille mandvco accipio iesvs panis et benedico cvm etiam svpervs dico cvm sero avtem factvm svm recvmbo cvm dvodecim qvintvs et mandvco ille dico qvoniam vnvs ex vos trado ego vnvs post enim trado sacramentvm o et liqvidvs appareo qvando primo accipio discipvlvs corpvs et sangvis dominvs non is accipio ieivnvs qvintvs nvmqvid tamen propterea calvmnior svm vniversvs ecclesiae qvi ab ieivnvs semper accipio ex hic enim placeo spiritvs sanctvs vt in honor tantvs sacramentvm in os christianvs privs dominicvs corpvs intro qvam ceteri cibvs o nam ideo per vniversvs orbis mos iste servo qvintvs neqve enim qvia post cibvs do dominvs propterea pranseo avt cenatvs frater ad ille sacramentvm accipio convenio debeo avt sicvt facio qvi apostolvs argvo et emendo mensa svvs iste misceo qvintvs namqve salvator qvo vehementer commendo mysterivs ille altitvdo vltimvs hic volo infigo cor et memoria discipvlvs ab qvi ad passio digredior svm o et ideo non praecipio qvis deinceps ordo svmo vt apostola per qvi ecclesia dispono svm sacro hic locvs qvintvs nam si hic ille moneo vt post cibvs alivs semper accipio credo qvod is mos nemo vario qvintvs cvm vero aio apostolvs de hic sacramentvm loqvor propter qvi frater cvm coanvenio ad mandvco invicem exspecto o si qvis esvrio domvs mandvco vt non ad ivdicivm convenio statim svbtexo cetera avtem cvm venvs ordino pentvm vnde intelligo do qvia mvltvm svm vt in epistola totvs ille ago ordo insinvo qvi vniversvs per orbis servo ecclesivs ab ipse ordino svm qvod nvllvs mos diversitas qvinqvaginta vario vnvs qvaeris qvi cavsa svm cvr anniversarivs dies celebro dominicvs passio non ad idem redeo annvs dies sicvt dies qvi trado nascor o et deinde svbivngo si hic fio propter sabbatvm et lvna qvis svi volo in hic res observatio sabbatvm et lvna hic primvm oportet nosco dies natalis dominvs non in sacramentvm celebro sed tantvm in memoria revoco qvi nascor svm o ac per hic nihil opvs svm nisi revolvo dies annvs qvi ipse res facio svm festvs devotio signo vnvs sacramentvm svm avtem in aliqvis celebratio cvm res gero commemoratio ita fio vt aliqvis etiam significo intelligo qvi sancte accipio svm pes is itaqve modvs ago pascha vt non solvm qvi facio svm in memoria revoco is svm qvi morior christvs et resvrgo sed etiam cetera qvi circa is attestor ad sacramentvm significatio non omitto pes qvia enim sicvt dico apostolvs mortvvs svm propter delictvm noster et resvrgo propter ivstificatio noster transitvs qvidam de mors ad vita in ille et hvmilis cor et invenio reqvies anima vester cetera tamen ibi praeceptvm proprie sicvt praeceptvm svm sine vllvs figvro significatio abservo vnvs vnde non inconveniter intelligo ad amor excito qvi simvl crvcificvs svm crvx cvm ille vt evacvo corpvs peccatvm vt vltra non servio peccatvm vnvs qvamdiv ergo is ago opvs noster vt evacvo corpvs peccatvm qvamdiv exter homo corrvmpo vt interior renovo de dies in dies tempvs svm crvx vnvs hic svm etiam bonvs opera qvidem tamen adhvc laboriosvs qvi merces svm reqvies qvintvs et in scriptvra qvidem vetvs ad ago pascha non svm praecipio tempvs nisi ex per pater concilivm et orbis vniversvs christianvs persvadeo is modvs pascha celebro oportet qvintvs qvadragesimvs sane ieivnivm habeo avctoritas et in vetvs liber et ex ieivnivm mosi et helia et ex evangelivm qvia totidem dies dominvs ieivno demonstro evangelivm non dissentio ab lex et prophes qvintvs in persona qvippe mosivs lex in persona helia propheta accipio inter qvi in mons gloriosvs appareo vt evidenter emineo qvi de ille dico apostolvs testimonivm habeo ab lex et prophes qvintvs in qvi ergo pars annvs congrventer observatio qvadragesimvs constitvo nisi confinis atqve contigvvs dominicvs passio qvia in is significo hic vita laboriosvs qvi opvs svm continentia vt ab ipse mvndvs amicitia ieivno qvi vtiqve fallaciter blandior et illecebra fvcvs circvmspargo atqve iacio non cesso nvmervs avtem qvadragenarivs vita iste propterea figvro arbitror qvia denarivs in qvi svm perfectio beatitvdo noster sicvt in octonarivm qvia redeo ad primvm ita in hic qvia creo qvi septenarivs figvro adhaereo creator in qvi declaro vnitas trinitas per vniversvm mvndvs temporaliter annvntio svm qvia mvndvs et ab qvatvor ventvs de qvintvs linio et ab qvatvor elementa erigo et ab qvatvor annvvs tempvs vicis vario qvadrantal decem avtem qvater in qvadraginta consvmmo o qvadragenarivs avtem pars svvs compvto addo ipse denarivs et fio qvinqvaginta tamqvam merces labor et continentia qvintvs neqve enim frvstra ipse dominvs et qvadraginta dies post resvrrectio in hic terra et in hic vita cvm discipvlvs conversor svm et posteaqvam ascendo in caelvm decem dies interpono promissvm mitto spiritvs sancio compleo dies pentecostes qvi dies qvinqvagenarivs habeo alter sacramentvm qvi septiens septenvs septem fio o et cvm redeo ad initivm qvi svm octavvs qvi et primvs dies qvinqvaginta compleo qvi celebro post dominvs resvrrectio iam in figvra non labor sed qvies et laetitia pes propter hic ieivnivm relaxo et sto oro qvi svm signvm resvrrectio vnvs vnde etiam dies omnis dominicvs ad alto observo et allelvia cano qvi significo actio noster svm non svm nisi lavs devs sicvt scribo svm beatvs  pes qvi habito in domvs tvvs o in saecvlvm saecvlvm lavdo tv vnvs sed dies qvinqvaginta et in scriptvra commendo non tantvm in evangelivm qvia tvnc spiritvs sanctvs advenio sed etiam in vetvs liber qvintvs nam et ipse posteaqvam paschivm occido agnvs celebro qvinqvaginta dies nvmero vsqve in dies qvi lex do svm in mons sina famvlvs devs mosivs digitvs devs scribo qvinqvaginta celebro vervm pascha et interpono qvinqvaginta dies do ad caritas spiritvs sanctvs qvi svm digitvs devs contrarivs homo svvs qvaero et ideo ivgvm asper et sarcina gravis porto nec invenio reqvies anima svvs o qvia caritas non vnvs qvaero qvi svvs svm qvinqvaginta ideo animositas haereticvs et corpvs per eloqvivm dominvs castvs argentvm ignis examino terra pvrgo septvplvm accipio merces denarivs vt svm decem et septem qvintvs nam et in hic nvmervs sicvt in alivs mvltiplex figvra exhibeo omnis inimicvs is nisi cvm et ille novvs inimicvs destrvo mors ad hic tempvs pertineo nvmervs ille dvo piscis qvintvs nam et ipse nvmervs decem et septiens svrgo in trigon centvm svmma compleo dies ordo qvi commemoro in genesis qvamqvam et illic tenebrae praecedo  nam tenebrae svm svper abyssvs cvm dico devs fio lvx et factvm svm lvx sed qvia ille tenebrae nondvm svm nox o nondvm enim ab lvx coepio et transigo lvx vsqve ad mane singvlvs termino vnvs sed posteaqvam creo homo ab lvx ivstitia ad peccatvm tenebrae declino ab qvi is christvs gratia libero factvm svm vt nvnc dies ab nox malvm devs addvco in ivdicivm in omnis despicio is svm in omnis etiam qvi contemtibilis hic video et ideo nec video o qvoniam devs et ipse video nec is despicio nec cvm ivdico praetereo vnvs salvator cvm obivrgo civitas in qvi virtvs magnvs facio neqve credo et is alienigena antepono aes tamen inqvio dico vos tyrvs et sidonis remisse svm in dies ivdicivm qvam vos vnvs et pavlo post alter civitas generatio iste et condemno is qvia paenitentia ago in praedicatio iona et ecce mvltvs qvam iona hic qvintvs regina avster svrgo in ivdicivm cvm generatio iste et condemno is qvia venio ab finis terra avdio sapientia salomon et ecce mvltvs qvam salomvs one hic vnvs dvo res hic locvs disco et venio svm ivdicivm et cvm mor tvvs resvrrectio venio qvintvs de ninevites enim et regina avster qvando iste locvs cvm de homo bonvm et malvm nvnc permixtio postea separatione vtiqve dies ivdicivm svm svm loqvor adhibeo similitvdo de triticvm seminatvs et svpersemino zizania is qvove svvs expono discipvlvs qvi semino inqvio bonvm semen svm filivs homo o ager avtem svm mvndvs et cetera qvintvs hic ivdicivm qvidem vel dies ivdicivm non nomino sed is mvlto clare ipse res exprimo et in finis saecvlvm svm svm praedico vnvs item discipvlvs svvs amo one en inqvio dico vos qvi vos qvi seqvor ego svm in regeneratio cvm sedeo filivs homo in sedes maiestas svvs sedeo et vos svper sedes dvodecim ivdico dvodecim tribvs israhel qvinqvaginta hic disco cvm svvs discipvlvs ivdico iesvs qvintvs vnde et alibi ivdaei dico si ego in beelzebvbvs eicio daemonia filivs vester in qvi eicio ideo ipse index svm pars nvmervs septenarivs qvi significo plervmqve vniversitas qvi dvo pars is svm tres et qvatvor alter per alter mvltiplico dvodecim facio qvintvs nam et qvatvor ter et tres qvater dvodecim svm et sinvs qvis alivs hic dvodenarivs nvmervs qvi ad hic valeo ratio reperio qvadrantal alioqvi qvoniam in locvs ivda traditor apostolvm matthia ne lego ordino apostolvs pavlvs qvi mvltvs ille omnis laboro
