sentio vel irrevocabiliter vnvs fvgio omnis moveo vnde iam etiam qvaestio ille solneo svm qvi difficilis video ceteri vbi qvaero cvm carvs morior homo etiam alter vivens fio caro qvi potivs is in resvrrectio reddo vnvs si enim qvispiam conficio fames atqve compello vescor cadaver hvmanvs qvi malvm aliqvotiens accido et vetvs testor historia et nostri tempvs infelix experimentvm doceo nvm qvisqvam veridicvs ratio contendo totvs digero svm per infervs meatvs nihil inde in is caro mvto atqve converto cvm ipse macies qvi svm et non svm satis indico qvi ille escisco detrimentvm qvintvs svppleo svm iam itaqve aliqvis pavlo ante praemitto qvi ad iste qvoqve nodvs solvo valeo debeo qvintvs qvisqvis enim caro exhavrio fames vtiqve in avra svm exhalo o vnde dico omnipotens devs possvm revoco qvi fvgio vnvs reddo ergo caro ille homo in qvi svm caro hvmana primitvs coepio vnvs ab ille qvippe alter tamqvam mvtvvs svmo depvto svm  qvi sicvt aes alienvs is redhibeo svm vnde svmo svm vnvs svvs vero ille qvi fames exinanio ab is qvi possvm etiam exhalo revoco reddo vnvs qvamvis etsi omnis pereo modvs nec vllvs is materies in vllvs natvra latebra remaneo vnde volo is reparo omnipotens qvintvs sed propter sententia veritas qvi dico svm capillvs capvt vester non pereo absvrdvs svm vt pvto cvm capillvs homo pereo non possvm tantvs caro fames depasco atqve consvmo pereo possvm vnvs qvi omnis pro noster modvlvs considero atqve tracto hic svpervs conficio vt in resvrrectio caro in aeternvm is mensvra habeo corpvs magnitvdo qvi habeo perficio sive perfectvs qvisqve indo corpvs ratio ivventvs in membrvm qvoqve omnis modvlvs congrvo decvs servo qvadrantal qvi decvs vt servo si aliqvis demo svm indecens aliqvis granditas in pars aliqvis constitvo qvi per totvm spargo vt neqve is pereo et congrvens pars vbiqve teneo non svm absvrdvs vt aliqvis inde etiam statvra corpvs addo possvm credo cvm omnis pars vt decor cvstodio is distribvo qvod si enormiter in vnvs svm vtiqve non decet vnvs avt si contendo in is qvisqve statvra corpvs resvrgo svm in qvi defvnctvs svm non pvgnaciter resisto svm o tantvm absvm omnis deformitas omnis infirmitas omnis tarditas omnis qvove corrvptio et si qvis alivs ille non decet regnvm in qvi resvrrectio et promissio filivs aeqvalis svm angelvs devs si non corpvs non aetas certe felicitas vnvs restitvo ergo qvisqvis de corpvs vivvs vel post mors de cadaver pereo et simvl cvm is qvi in sepvlcrvm remaneo in spiritalis corpvs novitas ex animal corpvs vetvstas mvto resvrgo incorrvptio atqve immortalitas vestitvs vnvs sed etsi vel casvs aliqvis gravis vel inimicvs immanitas totvs penitvs contero in pvlvis atqve in avra vel in aqva dispergo qvantvm fio possvm nvsqvam svm sino omnino nvllvs modvs svbtraho possvm omnipotentia creator sed capillvs in is capvt non pereo vnvs svm ergo spiritvs svbdo caro spiritalis sed tamen carvs non spiritvs o sicvt caro svbdo svm spiritvs ipse carnalis sed tamen spiritvs non caro vnvs qvi res habeo experimentvm in noster poena deformitas pes non enim secvndvm caro sed vtiqve secvndvm spiritvs carnalis svm qvi aio apostolvs non possvm vos loqvor qvasi spiritalis sed qvasi carnalis o et homo spiritalis sic in hic vita dico vt tamen corpvs adhvc carnalis svm et video alivs lex in membrvm svvs repvgno lex mens svvs o svm avtem etiam corpvs spiritalis cam idem carvs sic resvrgo vt fio qvi scribo svm semino corpvs animalis resvrgo corpvs spiritalis vnvs qvis svm avtem et qvam magnvs spiritalis corpvs gratia qvia nondvm venio in experimentvm vereor ne temerarivs svm omnis qvi de ille pentvm profero eloqvivm vnvs qvalvs svm corpvs qvi omnis modvs spiritvs svbdo et eo svfficienter vivifico nvllvs alimonivm indigeo non enim animalis sed spiritalis svm habeo qvidem caro sed sine vllvs carnalis corrvptio svbstantia vnvs vervs de animvs bonvm qvi post hic vita beatvs perfrvor non ab nos dissentio philosophvs nobilis o de caro resvrrectio contendo hic qvantvm possvm nego qvintvs sed credo mvlti nego pavcvs relinqvo et ad christvs qvi hic qvi iste video absvrdvs in svvs resvrrectio monstro fidelis cor converto svm doctvs et indoctvs sapiens mvndvs et insipiens qvadrantal hic enim credo mvndvs qvi praedico devs qvi etiam hic praedico qvod hic res svm mvndvs credo  neqve petrivs maleficivm is cvm lavs credo tanto ante praenvntio compello svm vnvs ille svm enim devs qvi sicvt iam dico aliqvotiens nec commoneo ego piget confiteor porphyrivs atqve is oracvlvm devs svvs probo cvpio ipse nomen perhorresco o qvi sic lavdo vt is et devs pater et rex voco qvadranta absvm enim vt sic intelligo svm qvi praedico qvomodo nolo hic qvi hic cvm mvndvs non credo qvi mvndvs credo svm praedico vnvs cvr enim non potivs ita sicvt credo tanto ante praedico svm mvndvs non sicvt pavcvs garrio qvi hic cvm mvndvs qvi credo praedico svm credo nolo si enim propterea dico alivs modvs svm credo ne si dico vanvs svm conscribo inivria facio ille devs qvi tam magnvs perhibeo testimonivm tantvs prorsvs is vel etiam gravis facio inivria si etiam aliter dico svm intelligo non sicvt mvndvs is credo qvi credo ipse lavdo ipse promitto ipse compleo vnvs vtrvm enim non possvm facio vt resvrgo caro et vivo in aeternvm an propterea credo non svm is is svm facio qvia malvm svm atqve indignvs devs sed de omnipotentia is qvi tot et tantvs facio incredibilis iam mvltvs dico qvintvs si volo invenio qvi omnipotens non possvm habeo prorsvs ego dico mentior non possvm vnvs credo ergo qvi possvm non credo qvi non possvm pes non itaqve credo qvi mentior possvm credo svm facio qvi svi facio svm promitto et sic credo sicvt is credo mvndvs qvi credo svm praedico qvi credo svm lavdo qvi credo svm promitto qvi credo iam ostendo vnvs hic avtem malvm svm vnde demonstro pentvm non svm illic vllvs corrvptio qvi svm corpvs malvm vnvs de ordo elementvm iam dispvto o de alivs homo coniectvra satis dico o qvantvs svm svm in corpvs incorrvptibilis facilitas motvs de praesens bonvs valetvdo temperamentvm qvi vtiqve nvllvs modvs ille comparo svm immortalitas in liber xed satis vt opinor ostendo qvintvs lego svpervs opvs hic qvi vel non lego vel volo recolo qvi lego qvintvs sedes porphyrivs aio inqvio vt beatvs svm anima corpvs svm omnis fvgio vnvs nihil ergo prosvm qvia incorrvptibilis dico svm corpvs si anima beatvs non svm nisi omnis corpvs effvgio qvintvs sed iam et hinc in liber memoro qvantvm oportet dispvto vnvs vervm hic vnvs inde tantvm commemoro vnvs emendo liber svvs iste omnis magister platon et dico is devs vt beatvs svm svvs corpvs fvgio is svm svm morior qvi in caelestia corpvs dico inclvdo qvi tamen devs ab qvi factvm svm qvo possvm svm secvris immortalitas is svm in idem corpvs aeternvs permansio non is natvra is habeo sed svvs consilivm praevaleo promitto qvintvs vbi etiam ille everto qvi dico qvoniam svm impossibilis ideo resvrrectio caro non svm credo vnvs aperte qvippe ivxta idem philosophvs vbi devs ab svi facio promitto devs non facio immortalitas qvi impossibilis svm svi dico svm facio vnvs sic enim is loqvor narro platon qvoniam svm orior inqvio immortalis svm et indissolvbilis non possvm ce non tamen dissolvo neqve vos vllvs mors fatvm perimo nec svm valens qvam consilivm mevs qvi magnvs svm vincvlvm ad perpetvitas vester qvam ille qvi svm colligo vnvs si non solvm absvrdvs sed svrdvs non svm qvi hic avdio non vtiqve dvbito devs factvm ab ille devs qvi is facio secvndvm platon qvi svm impossibilis svm promissvm vnvs qvi enim dico vos qvidem immortalis svm non possvm sed mevs volvntas immortalis svm qvis alivs dico qvam is qvi fio non possvm ego facio tamen svm ille igitvr caro incorrvptibilis immortalis spiritalis resvscito qvi ivxta platon is qvi impossibilis svm svi facio svm promitto vnvs qvis adhvc qvi promitto devs qvi devs promitto credo mvndvs qvi etiam ipse promissvs svm credo svm impossibilis clamo qvando qvidem nos devs qvi etiam secvndvm platon facio impossibilis is facio svm clamo pentvm non ergo vt beatvs svm anima corpvs svm omnis fvgio sed corpvs incorrvptibilis recipio vnvs et in qvi convenienter incorrvptibilis corpvs laetor qvam in qvi corrvptibilis gemo sic enim non in is svm ille dirvs cvpiditas qvi pono ex platon vergilivs vbi aio rvrsvs et incipio in corpvs volo revertor o sic inqvio cvpiditas revertor ad corpvs non habeo cvm corpvs in qvi revertor cvpio cvm svi habeo et sic habeo vt nvmqvam non habeo nvmqvam is prorsvs vel exigvvs qvilibet tempvs vllvs mors depono qvintvs singvla qvidam dico platon atqve porphyrivs qvi si inter svi commvnico possvm factvm svm fortasse christianvs qvinqvaginta platon dico sine corpvs anima in aeternvs svm non possvm vnvs ideo enim dico etiam sapiens anima post qvilibet longvs tempvs tamen ad corpvs redeo vnvs porphyrivs avtem dico anima pvrgatvs cvm redeo ad pater ad hic malvm mvndvs nvmqvam svm redeo vnvs ac per hic qvi vervm video platon si do porphyrivs etiam ivstvs atqve sapiens pvrgatvs anima ad hvmana corpvs redeo o rvrsvs qvi vervm video porphyrivs do platon nvmqvam redeo ad miseria corrvptibilis corpvs anima sanctvs vt non singvlvs hic singvlvs sed ambo et singvlvs vterqve dico pvto qvi video svm iam conseqvens vt redeo anima ad corpvs et talis recipio corpvs in qvi beate atqve immortaliter vivo qvinqvaginta qvoniam secvndvm platon etiam sanctvs anima ad hvmana corpvs redeo secvndvm porphyrivs ad malvm hic mvndvs sanctvs anima non redeo vnvs dico itaqve cvm platon porphyrivs redeo ad corpvs o dico platon cvm porphyrivs non redeo ad malvm et ad is corpvs redeo consentio in qvi nvllvs patior malvm qvinqvaginta hic itaqve non svm nisi ille qvi promitto devs beatvs anima in aeternvm cvm svvs aeternvs caro iactvra qvadrantal hic enim qvantvm existimo iam facile nos concedo ambo vt qvi fateor ad immortalis corpvs redeo anima svm sanctvs ad svvs ille redeo permitto in qvi malvm hic saecvlvm perfero in qvi devs vt hic malvm careo pie fideliter qvivis colo qvintvs nonnvlli nostri propter qvidam praeclarvs loqvor genvs et propter nonnvllvs qvi veraciter sentio amans platon dico is aliqvis similis nos etiam de mortvvs resvrrectio sentio vnvs qvi qvidem sic tango in liber de res pvblicvs aedifico nos qvinqvaginta iesvs avtem eo cvm ille qvintvs et cvm iam non longe svm ab domvs mitto ad is centvrio amicvs dico dominvs nolo nego  non enim dignvs svm vt svb tectvm mevs intro qvintvs clamo ivdaei crvcifigo crvcifigo sed is potivs hora tertivs dico qvi dominvs svm crvcificvs in lignvm vnvs qvis fidelis non faveo hic solvtio qvaestio si modo possvm aliqvis articvlvs conicio ab hora qvando ad domvs perdvco svm socer caipha vbi et avdio svm ab princeps sacerdos adhvc gallvs non canto qvod ex petrivs negatio colligo qvi cvm iam avdio facio svm ce si avtem qvando pilatvs trado svm iam mane svm aperte scriptvm svm vnvs resto ergo vt intelligo tvnc coepio iste parasceve one pascha is svm praeparatio mors dominvs qvando respondeo omnis princeps sacerdos apvd qvi primo avdio et dico revs svm mors qvi apvd matthaevs et marcvs invenio vt recapitvldo intelligo de petrvs negatio postea dico qvi antea facio svm qvinqvaginta non enim absvrde conicio is tempvs qvando vt dico revs mors pronvntio nonvs hora nox possvm svm vnvs ex qvi hora vsqve ad hora qva sedeo pilatvs pro tribvnal qvasi sextvs hora svm non dies sed parascevis is svm immolatio dominvs qvi vervs pascha svm vt plenvs sextvs idem parasceves qvi plenvs dies tertivs occvrro dominvs svspendo in lignvm qvintvs sive ergo hic potivs intelligo eligo sive marcvs tertivs hora recolo is qvove magis ad condemnatio ivdaei in dominvs crvcifixio commemoro nolo qva intelligo clamo possvm vt crvcifigo vt ipse potivs crvcifico accipio qvam is qvi manvs svspendo in lignvm svm o sicvt ille centvrio magis accedo ad dominvs qvam ille amicvs qvi mitto procvl dvbivm qvaestio solvtvs svm de hora dominicvs passio qvi magis soleo contentiosvs concito impvdentia et infirmvs imperitia pertvrbo vnvs seqvor matthaevs et dico is ipse avtem et latro qvi figo svm cvm eo impropero is qvinqvaginta nec marcvs discrepo hic idem dico alivs verbvm qvadrantal lvcae avtem possvm pvto repvgno nisi genvs locvtio satis vsitatvs non obliviscor qvinqvaginta aio enim lvcae vnvs avtem de hic qvi pendeo latro blasphemo is dico si tv svm christvs salvvs facio tv ipse et nos vnvs et seqvor idem ipse atqve ita contego respondeo avtem alter increpo ille dico neqve tv timeo devs qvi in idem damnatio svm et nos qvidem ivste o nam dignvs factvm recipio o hic vero nihil malvm gero et dico ad iesvs dominvs memini mevs cvm venio in regnvm tvvs vnvs et dico ille iesvs amo ne dico tv hodie cvm ego svm in paradisvs pentvm qvomodo ergo sicvt vnvs matthaevs dico latro qvi figo svm cvm eo impropero is o vel sicvt marcvs dico et qvi cvm is crvcificio svm convicio is qvando qvidem vnvs is conviciatvs svm secvndvm lvca testimonivm alter et compesco is et in devs credo nisi intelligo matthaevs et marcvs breviter perstringo hic locvs mvlalis nvmervs pro singvlaris pono sicvt in epistola ad hebraei lego plvraliter dico clavdo os leo cvm solvs danihel intelligo et plvraliter dico seco svm cvm de solvm isaia trado qvintvs in psalmvm etiam qvi dico svm assisto rex terra et princeps convenio in vnvs mvlalis nvmervs pro singvlaris pono in actes apostolor expono vnvs nam rex propter heros princeps propter pilatvs intelligo qvi testimonivm idem psalmvs adhibeo qvadranta sed qvia et paganvs soleo calvmnior evangelivm video qvemadmodvm loqvor svm avctor is phaedras medea et clytemestra cvm singvlvs svm qvinqvaginta qvis avtem vsitatvs verbvm gratia qvam vt dico aliqvis et rvsticvs ego insvlto etiam si vnvs insvlto tvnc enim svm contrarivs qvi lvcae de vnvs manifesto si ille dico ambo latro convicio dominvs o ita enim non possvm svb nvmervs mvlalis vnvs intelligo vnvs cvm vero dico svm latro vel qvi cvm is crvcificio svm nec addo svm ambo non solvm si ambo facio possvm hic dico sed etiam qvia vnvs hic facio possvm vsitatvs locvtio modvs per mvlalis nvmervs significo qvadrantal invenimvs itaqve apvd qvatvor evangelista deciens commemoro dominvs video svm ab homo post resvrrectio semel ad monvmentvm mvlier o itervm idem egredior ab monvmentvm in iter  tertivs petro  qvartvs dvo eo in castellvm  qvintvs mvltvs in hiervsal vbi non svm thomas o sextvs vbi is video thomas  septimvs ad mare tiberiades  octavvs in mons galilaevs secvndvm matthaevs o nonvs qvi dico marcvs nove recvmbo qvia iam non svm in terra cvm ille convivor  decimvs in ipse dies non iam in terra sed elevo in nvbes cvm in caelvm ascendo qvi marcvs et lvcae commemoro qvintvs marcvs qvidem post ille qvi is discvmbo appareo ita continvo vt dico et dominvs qvidem postqvam loqvor svm is assvmtvs svm in caelvm o lvcae avtem praetermitto omnis qvi per qvadraginta dies ago ab ille cvm discipvlvs possvm ille primvs dies resvrrectio is qvando in hiervsal mvltvs appareo conivngo tacite novvs dies qvi ascendo in caelvm ita narro edvco avtem ille foris in bethania et elevo manvs svvs benedico is qvintvs et factvm svm cvm benedico is recedo ab is et fero in caelvm qvintvs video ergo is praeter qvi in terra video etiam dvm fero in caelvm qvintvs totiens ergo in evangelix liber commemoro ab homo video anteqvam ascendo in caelvm in terra scilicet noviens et in aes semel ascendo qvadranta sedes non omnis scriptvm svm sicvt iohannes fateor vnvs creber enim svm is cvm ille conversatio per dies qvadraginta privsqvam ascendo in caelvm qvinqvaginta non tamen is per omnis qvadraginta continvvs appareo qvintvs nam post dies primvm resvrrectio is alivs vm dies intervenio dico iohannes post qvi is rvrsvs appareo tertivs avtem ad mare tiberiades fortasse continvo conseqvor dies o nihil enim repvgno pes et deinde qvando volo constitvo is qvod et ante praedico is in galilaevs mons praecedo  atqve omnino per ille qvadraginta dies qvotiens volo qvi volo qvemadmodvm volo sicvt petrvs dico qvando is cornelivs et hic qvi cvm ille svm praedico qvi simvl inqvio mandvco et bibo cvm ille posteaqvam resvrgo ab mortvvs per dies qvadraginta  non qvod cotidie per dies qvadraginta cvm ille mandvco et bibo  nam svm contrarivs iohanni qvi octo ille dies interpono qvi is video non svm vt tertivs manifesto ad mare tiberiades qvinqvaginta inde iam etiam si cotidie ille video et cvm ille convivatvs svm nihil repvgno vnvs et fortasse ideo dictvm svm per qvadraginta dies qvi qvater denvs svm in mysterivm vel totvs mvndvs vel totvs temporalis saecvlvm qvia et ille primvs decem dies in qvi svm ille octo dies ab pars totvs possvm mos scriptvra non dissone compvto qvintvs confero ergo et qvi aio apostolvs pavlvs vtrvm nihil affero qvaestio resvrgo inqvio tertivs dies secvndvm scriptvra et appareo cephae qvintvs non vnvs dico primo appareo cephae o nam svm contrarivs qvi primo mvlier appareo in evangelivm lego qvintvs postea inqvio dvodecim o qvilibet qvi hora libet ipse tamen resvrrectio dies vnvs deinde appareo mvltvm qvam qvingenti frater simvl sive iste cvm ille xi svm congrego clavdo ostivm propter metvs ivdaei vnde cvm exeo thomas venio ad is iesvs o sive post octo ille dies qvandolibet nihil habeo adversvm vnvs postea inqvio appareo iacobvs o non tvnc avtem primvm accipio debeo video svm iacobvs sed aliqvis proprivs manifestatio singvlariter vnvs deinde apostola omnis o nec ille tvnc primvm sed iam vt familiariter conversor cvm is vsqve ad dies ascensio svvs pes nove avtem omnis inqvio qvasi abortivvs appareo et ego sed hic iam de caelvm post non parvvs tempvs ascensio svvs vnvs nvnc iam video qvi differo qvi mysterivs gratia secvndvm matthaevs et marcvs resvrgo ita mando praecedo vos in galilaevs ibi ego video vnvs qvi etsi compleo svm tamen post mvltvs compleo svm cvm sic mandatvm svm qvamqvam sine praeivdicivm necessitas vt avt hic solvs avt hic propior exspecto fio debeo vnvs procvl dvbivm ergo qvoniam vox svm iste non evangelis narro qvi ita facio sed angelivm ex mandatvm dominvs et ipse postea dominvs evangelistvs avtem narro qvi ita sed ab angelvm et ab dominvs dico svm prophetice dictvm accipio svm vnvs galilaevs namqve interpretor vel transmigratio vel revelatio vnvs privs itaqve secvndvm transmigratio significatio qvis alivs occvrro intelligo praecedo vos in galilaevs ibi is video nisi qvia christes gratia de popvlvs israhel transmigro svm ad gens qvi apostolivm praedico evangelivm nvllvs modvs credo nisi is ipse dominvs via in cor homo praeparo o et hic intelligo praecedo vos in galilaevs vnvs qvi avtem gavdeo miror dirvmpo et evinco difficvltas aperio svi ostivm in dominvs per illvminatio fidelis hic intelligo ibi is video is svm ibi membrvm is invenio ibi vivvs corpvs is in hic qvi vos svscipio agnosco  vnvs secvndvm ille avtem qvi galilaevs interpretor revelatio non iam in forma servvs intelligo svm sed in ille in qvi aeqvalis svm pater qvi promitto apvd iohannis dilector svvs cvm dico et ego diligo is et ostendo ego ipse ille  non vtiqve secvndvm is qvi iam video et qvi etiam resvrgo cvm cicatrix non solvm video sed etiam tango postmodvm ostendo sed secvndvm ille ineffabilis lvx qvi illvmino omnis homo venio in hic mvndvs secvndvm qvam lvceo in tenebrae et tenebrae is non comprehendo qvinqvaginta illvc nos praecedo vnde ad nos venio non recedo et qvi nos praecedo non desero vnvs ille svm revelatio tamqvam vervs galilaevs cvm similis is svm o ibi is video sicvt svm pes ipse svm etiam beatvs transmigratio ex iste saecvlvm in ille aeternitas si is praeceptvm sic amplector vt ad is dextera segrego mereor qvinqvaginta tvnc enim eo sinister in combvstio aeternvs ivstvs avtem in vita aeternvs vnvs hinc illvc transmigro et ibi is video qvomodo non video impivs qvadrantal tollo enim impivs vt non video claritas dominvs o et impivs lvmen non video pentvm hic svm avtem inqvio vita aeternvs vt cognosco tv vnvs vervm devs et qvi mitto iesvs christvs  sicvt in ille aeternitas cognosco qvi servvs perdvco per forma servvs vt liberi contemplor forma dominvs qvinqvaginta discipvlvs etiam insvfflo do spiritvs sancio ne ipse spiritvs qvi trinitas consvbstantialis et coaeternvs svm tantvmmodo pater svm non etiam filivs spiritvs pvto qvintvs posterivs svvs ovis petro svi amans is qvovs amor ter confiteor commendo dico idem iohannis sic svi volo maneo donec venio qvintvs vbi etiam ego video altvs doceo mysterivm iste ipse iohanni evangelistvs dispensatio qvi in lvx liqvidvs verbvm svblimitas fero vbi trinitas aeqvalitas et incommvtabilitas video possvm et qvis magis proprietas disto ab ceteri homo qvi svsceptio verbvm caro factvm svm perspicve cerno cognosco qvovs non possvm nisi cvm ipse dominvs venio qvintvs ideo sic maneo donec venio vnvs maneo avtem nvnc in fides credo tvnc avtem facies ad facies contemplor svm cvm appareo vita noster et nos cvm ipse appareo in gloria vnvs qvisqvis avtem arbitror homo vita iste mortalis adhvc ago possvm contingo vt dimoveo atqve discvtio omnis nvbilvm phantasia corporalis atqve carnalis serenvs incommvtabilis veritas lvx potior et mens penitvs ab consvetvdo vita hic alienvs ille constanter et indeclinabiliter haereo nec qvis qvaero nec qvis qvaero intelligo pentvm credo ergo potivs svblimis avctoritas parvm qvovs fallax qvamdiv svm in corpvs peregrinor nos ab dominvs et ambvlo per fides non per species o ac sic perseveranter retineo atqve cvstodio spes fides et caritas intendo in species ex pignvs qvi accipio sanctvs spiritvs qvi nos doceo omnis veritas cvm devs qvi svscito lex christvs ab mortvvs vivifico et mortalis corpvs noster per inhabito spiritvs is in nos qvintvs privs avtem qvam vivifico hic qvi morior svm propter peccatvm procvl dvbivm corrvptibilis svm et aggravo anima o et si qvando adivvo excedo hic nebvla qvi tego omnis terra is svm hic carnalis caligo qvi tego omnis vita terrena tamqvam rapidvs corvscatio perstringo et in svvs infirmitas redeo vivo desiderivm qvo rvrsvs erigo nec svfficio mvnditia qvi figo o et qvantvs qvisqve hic magis possvm tanto magnvs svm qvanto avtem parvm tanto parvvs vnvs si avtem nihil adhvc talis mens homo experior svm in qvi tamen habito christvs per fides insto debeo minvo finio qvove cvpiditas hic saecvlvm moralis virtvs actio tamqvam in comitatvs tres ille evangelistae cvm mediator christvs ambvlo qvintvs is qvi filivs devs semper svm propter nos filivs homo facio vt sempiternvs virtvs is et divinitas noster infirmitas et mortalitas contempero de noster nos in svi atqve ad svi facio via cvm magnvs spes laetitia fideliter teneo et ne pecco ab christvs rex rego si forte pecco ab idem sacerdos christvs expio o atqve ita in actio bonvs conversatio et vita nvtrio pinna geminvs dilectio tamqvam dvo ala validvs eveho ab terra ab idem ipse christvs verbvm illvmino verbvm qvi in principivm svm ce verbvm apvd devs svm et verbvm devs svm o etsi per specvlvm et aenigmate longe tamen svblimis ab omnis similitvdo corporalis qvadrantal qvapropter qvamvis in ille tres activvs in iohanni avtem evangelivm donvm contemplativvs virtvs elvceo is qvi hic dignosco svm idonevs tamen et hic iohanni qvoniam ex pars svm sic maneo donec venio qvi perfectvs svm vnvs et alivs qvidem do per spiritvs sermo sapientia alivs sermo scientia secvndvm spiritvs o alivs dies sapio dominvs alivs de pectvs dominvs liqvide aliqvis bibo alivs levo vsqve ad tertivs caelvm ineffabilis verbvm avdio omnis tamen qvamdiv svm in corpvs peregrinor ab dominvs et omnis bonvs spes fidelis in liber vita scriptvm servo qvi dictvm svm et ego diligo is et ostendo ego ipse ille vnvs vervm tamen in hic peregrinatio qvantvm res hic intelligentia vel scientia qvisqve proficio tanto magis caveo diabolicvs vitivm svperbia et invidentia o memini hic ipse evangelivm iohanni qvam mvlto ample erigo ad contemplatio veritas tam mvlto ample praecipio de dvlcedo caritas vnvs et qvia ille praeceptvm vervs ac salvber svm qvanto magnvs svm tanto hvmilis tv in omnis qvi evangelista christvs longe ceteri alte commendo apvd is discipvlvs pes lavo qvintvs cvm dico nemo nosco filivs nisi pater non dico et qvi volo pater revelo qvemadmodvm cvm dico nemo nosco pater nisi filivs addo et qvi volo filivs revelo qvinqvaginta qvi non ita intelligo svm qvasi filivs ab nvllvs possvm cognosco nisi ab pater solvs pater avtem non solvm ab filivs sed etiam ab is qvi revelo filivs vnvs sic enim potivs dictvm svm vt intelligo et pater et ipse filivs per filivs revelor qvia ipse svm mens noster lvmen vt qvi postea infero et qvi volo filivs revelo non pater tantvm sed etiam filivs accipio vnvs ad totvs enim qvi dico infero svm pes verbvm enim svvs svi pater declaro o verbvm avtem non solvm is qvi per verbvm declaro sed etiam svi ipse declaro vnvs de pver sedeo in forvm et ad invicem clamo converto ordo ad propositvm respondeo qvadrantal nam qvi aio lamento et non ploro ad iohannis pertineo qvi abstinentia ab cibvs et potvs lvctvs paenitentia significo o qvi avtem aio canto tibia et non salto ad ipse dominvs qvi vtor cvm cetervs cibvs et potvs laetitia regnvm figvro qvintvs at ille nec hvmilis cvm iohannes nec cvm christvs gavdeo volo dico ille daemonivm habeo iste vorax et ebriosvs et amicvs pvblicanvs et peccatvm qvintvs qvi avtem svbivngo et ivstificatvs svm sapientia ab omnis filivs svvs ostendo filivs sapientia intelligo nec in abstineo nec in mandvco svm ivstitia sed in aeqvanimitas tolero inopia et temperantia per abvndantia non svi corrvmpo atqve opportvne svmo vel non svmo is qvi non vsvs sed concvpisco reprehendo svm vnvs non enim intersvm omnino qvis alimentvm svmo vt svccvrro necessitas corpvs dvmmodo congrvo in genvs alimentvm hic cvm qvi tv vivo svm pes neqve qvantvm svmo mvltvm intersvm cvm video alivs stomachvs cito satio et is tamen ille ipse parvvs qvo satio ardenter et intolerabiliter et omnino tvrpiter inhio  alivs avtem plvscvlvm qvidem satio sed tolerabilis inopia perpetior et vel ante hora pono epvlae si is in tempvs avt opvs svm avt necesse svm cvm tranqvillitas aspicio neqve tango vnvs magis ergo intersvm non qvis vel qvantvm alimentvm pro congrvens homo atqve persona svvs et pro svvs valetvdo necessitas qvis capio sed qvantvs facilitas et serenitas animvs careo cvm hic vel oportet vel etiam necesse svm careo vt ille in animvs christianvs compleo qvi apostolvs dico scio et parvm habeo scio et abvndo o vbiqve et in omnis imbvtvs svm et satio et esvrio et abvndo et penvria patior omnis possvm in is qvi ego conforto o et ille neqve si mandvco abvndo neqve si non mandvco egeo o et ille non svm enim regnvm devs esca et poto sed ivstitia et pax et gavdivm vnvs et qvia soleo homo mvltvm gavdeo de carnalis epvlae addo in spiritvs sanctvs vnvs ivstifico ergo sapientia ab omnis filiisivm svvs qvi intelligo vtor terrenvs tempvs opportvnvs svm debeo facilitas vero careo talis et amor frvor aeternvs non vario oportet per tempvs sed perpetvo retineo qvintvs qvisqvis avtem res praetereo restricte vtor qvam svi habeo mos is cvm qvi vivo avt temperans avt svperstitiosvs svm vnvs qvisqvis vero sic is vtor vt meta consvetvdo bonvm inter qvi versor excedo avt aliqvis significo avt flagitiosvs svm vnvs in omnis enim talis non vsvs res sed libido in cvlpa svm vnvs qvis igitvr locvs et tempvs et persona convenio diligenter attendo svm ne temere flagitivm reprehendo vnvs fio enim possvm vt sine aliqvis vitivm cvpedia vel voracitas pretiosvs cibvs sapiens vtor insipiens avtem foedvs gneos flamma in vilis ardesco qvintvs et sanvs qvisqve malo mos dominvs piscis vescor qvam lenticvlvs mos esav nepos abraha avt hordevm mos ivmentvm qvadrantal non enim propterea continens nos svm plervsqve bestia qvia vilis alo escis vnvs nam in omnis hic modvs res non ex is res natvra qvi vtor sed ex cavsa vtor et modo appeto vel probo vel improbo svm qvi facio  vnvs ieivnivs avt in tribvlatio svm avt in gavdivm pes in tribvlatio ad propitio devs pro peccatvm o in gavdivm vero cvm tanto parvm delecto carnalis qvanto spiritalis magnvs sagina svm vnvs cvm ergo dominvs interrogo svm cvr discipvlvs is non ieivno de vterqve ieivnivm respondeo pes namqve ad ille qvi in tribvlatio ieivno soleo pertineo qvi aio sponsvs filivs tvnc ieivno cvm ab is avfero svm sponsvs qvadranta tvnc enim desolo et in maeror ac lvctvs svm donec is per spiritvs sanctvs gavdivm consolatorivs retribvo qvadrantal qvi donvm percipio etiam ieivnivm alter genvs qvi fio per laetitia iam renovo in vita spiritalis convenienter celebro qvintvs qvi anteqvam accipio dico is tamqvam vetvs vestimentvm qvi inconveniter novvs pannvs assvo is svm aliqvis particvla doctrina qvi ad nonvs vita temperantia pertineo o qvia si hic fio et ipse doctrina qvidam modvs scindo qvi particvla vnvs qvi ad ieivnivm cibvs valeo inopportvne trado cvm ille doceo generalis ieivnivm non ab concvpisco cibvs tantvm sed ab omnis laetitia temporalis delectatio qvintvs qvi qvasi pannvs is svm pars aliqvis qvi ad cibvs pertineo dico non oportet homo adhvc vetvs consvetvdo dedo impertio qvia et illinc qvasi conscissio video fio et ipse vetvstas non convenio vnvs dico etiam similis is svm vetvs vter qvi vinvm novvs is svm spiritalis praeceptvm facile dirvmpo qvam is possvm contineo dico vnvs svm avtem iam vter novvs cvm post ascensvs dominvs desiderivm consolatio is oro et spero innovo qvintvs tvnc enim accipio spiritvs sanctvs qvi impleo cvm omnis qvi de diversvs gens assvm lingva loqvor dictvm svm mvstvm plenvs qvintvs novvs enim vinvm iam nonvs vter venio qvinqvaginta homvs qvidam descendo ab hiervsalis in hierichvs qvinqvaginta ipse ada intelligo in genvs hvmanvs qvadrantal hiervsalis civitas pax ille caelestis ab qvi beatitvdo lapsvs svm pes hierichvs lvna interpretor et significo mortalitas noster propter qvi nascor cresco senesco et occido vnvs latro diabolvs et angelvm is qvi is spolio immortalitas et plaga impono peccatvm svadeo relinqvo semivivvs o qvia ex pars qvi possvm intelligo et cognosco devs vivvs svm homo ex pars qvi peccatvm contabesco et premo mortvvs svm o et ideo semivivvs dico vnvs sacerdos avtem et levitvs qvi is video praetereo sacerdotivm et ministerivm vetvs testamentvm significo qvi non possvm prosvm ad salvs pes samaritanvs cvstos interpretor et ideo ipse dominvs significo hic nomen qvinqvaginta alligatio vvlnvs svm cohibitio peccatvm qvintvs olevm consolatio spes bonvs propter indvlgentia do ad reconciliatio pax vnvs vinvm exhortatio ad operor fervens spiritvs qvadrantal ivmentvm is svm caro in qvi ad nos venio dignor svm o impono ivmentvm svm in ipse incarnatio christvs credo qvintvs stabvlvm svm ecclesivs vbi reficio viator de peregrinatio in aeternvs patria redeo vnvs alter dies svm post resvrrectio dominvs vnvs dvo denarivs svm vel dvo praeceptvm caritas qvi per spiritvs sanctvs accipio apostolivm ad evangelizandvs ceteri vel promissio vita praesens et fvtvrvs qvintvs secvndvm enim dvo promissio dico svm accipio in hic saecvlvm septiens tantvm in fvtvrvm saecvlvm vita aeternvs conseqvor qvintvs stabvlarivs ergo svm apostolvs vnvs qvi svperero avt ille consilivm svm qvi aio de virgo avtem praeceptvm dominvs non habeo consilivm avtem do o avt qvi etiam manvs svvs operor svm ne infirmvs aliqvis in novitas evangelivm gravo cvm is licet pasco ex evangelivm qvintvs qvi martha excipio ille in domvs svvs significo ecclesia qvi nvnc svm excipio dominvs in cor svvs qvintvs maria soror is qvi sedeo ad pes dominvs et avdio verbvm is significo idem ecclesia sed in fvtvrvm saecvlvm vbi cesso ab opvs ministerivm qvove indigentia solvs sapientia perfrvor qvadrantal martha ergo occvpatvs svm circa mvltvm ministerivm qvia nvnc talis opvs exerceo ecclesivs qvintvs qvi avtem qveror qvod svi soror is non adivvo occasio do sententia dominvs qva ostendo iste ecclesia sollicitvs svm et tvrbo circa mvltvs cvm svm vnvs necessarivs ad qvi per ministerivm hic meritvm pervenio vnvs maria vero dico bonvs pars eligo qvi non avfero ab is ce et ideo intelligo bonvs qvia et per hic ad ille tendo et non avfero ce ille vero ministerivm qvamvis svm bonvm tamen avfero qvando indigentia qvi ministro transeo qvintvs amicvs ad qvi venio medivs nox vt accommodo tres panis vtiqve ad similitvdo pono secvndvm qvi qvis devs rogo in medivs tribvlatio constitvo vt is tribvo intelligentia trinitas qvi praesens vita consolor labor qvintvs sed comparatio svm ab parvvs vnvs si enim amicvs homo svrgo de lectvs et do non amicitia sed taedivm compello qvanto magis do ille qvi sine taedivm large dono qvod peto sed ad hic svi peto volo vt capax donor is fio qvi peto vnvs in tres avtem panis etiam ille significo vnvs svm svbstantia trinitas vnvs amicvs avtem qvi dico ille qvi peto venio de via et non svi habeo qvi pono ante ille intelligo homo appetitvs qvi debeo obtempero ratio vnvs servio avtem consvetvdo temporalis qvi via voco propter omnis per tempvs transeo o converto qvintvs avtem homo ad devs etiam ille appetitvs ab consvetvdo revoco qvintvs sed si non consolor intra gavdivm de doctrina spiritalis qvi creator trinitas praedico magnvs angvstia svm in homo qvi premo haervmna mortalis cvm ab hic qvi foris delecto praecipio abstinentia et intvs non svm refectio de laetitia doctrina salvtaris vnvs et ipse angvstia svm medivs nox qvi cogo vehementer insto peto vt accipio tres panis qvadrantal qvi avtem is dico de intvs iam ostivm clavdo svm pver qvovs is cvm is svm in cvbile significo tempvs fama verbvm cvm intelligentia clavdo qvintvs et ille qvi evangelica sapientia tamqvam panis erogo per orbis terra praedico pver pater familia iam svm in secretvs qvies cvm dominvs o et tamen oro efficio vt accipio desidero intellectvs ab ipse devs etiam si homo desvm per qvi sapientia praedico qvintvs decenti panis et piscis et ovvm qvi contrarivs pono lapis serpens scorpio vnvs intelligo panis caritas propter magnvs appetitvs et tam necessarivs vt sine ille cetera nihil svm sicvt sine panis mensa inops qvintvs qvi contrarivs svm cor dvritia qvi lapis coaeqvo qvadrantal piscis avtem intelligo fides invisibilis vel propter aqva baptismvm vel qvia de invisibilis locvs capio qvintvs qvi etiam fides hic mvndvs flvctvs circvmlatro non frango recte piscis comparo vnvs qvi contrarivm pono serpens propter venenvm fallacia qvi etiam primo homo male svadeo praesemino vnvs in ovvm intelligo spes o ovvm enim nondvm svm fetvs perfectvs sed foveo spero qvintvs qvi contrarivm pono scorpio qvi acvlevs venenatvs retro timeo svm sicvt spes contrarivs svm retro respicio cvm spes fvtvrvm in is qvi ante svm extendo pentvm cvm dico discipvlvs non debeo habeo sollicitvdo de cibvs aio et nolo in svblime tollo vnvs primo enim hic ad necessitas impleo homo qvaero o cvm avtem hic abvndo incipio et svperbio de talis qvintvs talis svm hic ac si svi vvlnero qvis iacto qvi habeo mvltvs emplastrvm in domvs cvm hic ille bonvm svm vt vvlnvs non habeo et ne vnvs qvidem indigeo emplastrvm qvintvs congrventer hydropicvs animal qvi cado in pvtevs comparo o hvmor enim laboro qvintvs sicvt ille mvlier qvi septendecim annvs alligo dico et ab idem alligatio solvo comparo ivmentvm qvi solvo vt ad aqva dvco qvintvs hydrops avtem recte comparo dives avarvs o sicvt enim ille qvanto magis abvndo hvmor inordinatvs tanto ample sitio sic iste qvanto svm copiosvs divitiae qvi non bene vtor tanto ardenter talis concvpisco o ille vero ita morbvs incvrvvs vt svi erigo non possvm anima terrenvs opinio debilito atqve opprimo ita vt divina cogito non valeo vnvs invs villicvs qvi dominvs eicio de villicatvs et lavdo is qvi in fvtvrvm svi prospicio non omnis debeo ad imitor svmo vnvs non enim avt dominvs noster facio svm in aliqvis fravs vt de ipse fravs elemosynvs facio avt is ab qvi recipio volo in tabernacvlvm aeternvs tamqvam debitor devs et dominvs noster fas svm intelligo cvm ivstvs et sanctvs significo hic locvs qvi is introdvco in tabernacvlvm aeternvs qvi necessitas svvs terrena bonvm commvnico o de qvi etiam dico qvod si qvis aliqvis is calix aqva frigida do tantvm in nomen discipvlvs non perdo merces svvs vnvs sed etiam ex contrarivm dvco iste similitvdo vt intelligo si lavdo possvm ille ab dominvs qvi fravs facio qvanto ample placeo dominvs devs qvi secvndvm is praeceptvm ille opvs facio o sicvt etiam de ivdex iniqvitas qvi interpello ab vidvvs comparatio dvco ad ivdex devs qvi nvllvs ex pars ivdex iniqvvs confero svm vnvs qvi avtem de centvm cadvs olevm qvinqvaginta scribo facio ab debitor et de centvm chorvs triticvm octoginta ad nihil alivs naleo arbitror nisi vt is qvi similiter in sacerdos atqve in levitas ivdaevs qvisqve operor in christvs ecclesivs abvndo ivstitia is svper scriba et pharisaei vt cvm ille decimvs do iste dimidivs do sicvt non de frvctvs sed de ipse bonvm svvs facio zacchevs avt certe dvplico decimvs vt dvo decimvs do svpero impendivm ivdaei qvintvs mamona vero iniqvitas ob hic ab dominvs appello svm iste pecvnia qvi possideo ad tempvs qvia mamona divitiae interpretor nec svm iste divitiae nisi iniqvvs qvi in is constitvo spes atqve copia beatitvdo svvs vnvs ab ivstvs vero cvm hic possideo svm qvidem iste pecvnia sed non svm ille divitiae nisi caelestis et spiritalis qvi indigentia svvs spiritamiter svppleo exclvdo egestas miseria beatitvdo copia ditor qvinqvaginta qvis svm qvi dico dominvs qvi svm in tectvm et vas is in domvs non descendo tollo ille in tectvm svm qvi excedo carnalis tamqvam in avra liber spiritaliter vivo qvintvs vas is in domvs svm sensvs carnalis qvi ad investigo veritas qvi intellectvs capio mvlti vtor penitvs erro qvintvs hic ergo spiritalis vir iam vas iste vaco in domvs qvia mens corpvs svperemineo per acies intelligentia tamqvam in tectvm pono perspicvitas sapientia velvt caelvm apertvs frvor qvintvs caveo ergo iste ne in dies tribvlatio rvrsvs vita carnalis qvi per sensvs corpvs pasco delecto ad vas hic modvs tollo descendo qvintvs qvis svm qvi dictvm svm similiter et qvi in ager svm similiter non redeo retro qvi operor in ecclesivs et sicvt pavlvs et apollo planto et rigo non respicio spes saecvlaris qvi renvntio pes qvis significo vxor loth is qvi in tribvlatio retro respicio et svi ab spes divinvs promissio averto pentvm et ideo statva sal facio svm vt admoneo homo ne hic facio tamqvam condio cor is ne svm fatvvs qvinqvaginta qvi svm in ille nox dvo in lectvs et dvo moleo in vnvs et dvo in ager de qvi omnis binvs singvlvs assvmo et singvlvs relinqvo tres genvs homo hic video significo vnvs is qvi otivm et qvies eligo neqve negotivm saecvlaris neqve negotivm ecclesiasticvs occvpatvs  qvi ille qvies lectvs nomen significo svm pes alter is qvi in plebs constitvo rego ab doctvs ago is qvi svm hic saecvlvm qvi et femina nomen significo qvia consilivm vt dico peritvs rex is expedio o et moleo dico propter temporalis negotivm orbis atqve circvitvs o qvi tamen in vnvs moleo dico in qvantvm de ipse res et negotivm svvs praebeo vsvs ecclesia pes tertivs is qvi operor in ecclesia ministerivm tamqvam in ager devs de qvi agricvltvra apostolvs loqvor qvintvs in hic ergo tres genvs binvs svm rvrsvs genvs homo in singvlvs et pro robvr svvs vis discerno qvintvs cvm enim omnis ad ecclesia membrvm pertineo video advenio tamen temtatio tribvlatio et ex ille qvi svm in otivm et ex ille qvi svm in negotivm saecvlvm et ex ille qvi devs ministro in ecclesivs aliqvis permaneo aliqvis cado qvintvs qvi permaneo assvmo o qvi cado relinqvo vnvs ergo vnvs assvmo et vnvs relinqvo non qvasi de dvo homo dico sed de dvo genvs affectio in singvlvs genvs tres professio qvintvs in ille nox ergo dico in ille tribvlatio  pes ad ipse tres genvs qvi assvmo arbitror pertineo etiam tres ille nomen vir sanctvs qvi solvs libero eo hiezechihes propheta denvntio novs danihel et io qvintvs video enim novs pertineo ad is per qvi ecclesivs rego sicvt per ille in aqva arca gvberno svm qvi figvra gesto ecclesia qvinqvaginta danihel avtem qvia eligo caelebs vita is svm nvptiae terrena contemgo vt sicvt dico apostolvs sine sollicitvdo vivo cogito qvi svm devs genvs is significo qvi svm in otivm sed tamen fortis in temtatio vt possvm assvmo qvintvs io avtem qvia et vxor habeo et filivs et amplvs terrena res copia ad ille genvs pertineo qvi molendinvs depvto svm sed tamen vt svm fortis in temtatio sicvt ille svm o non enim aliter assvmo possvm vnvs nec pvto alivs svm genvs homo qvi consto ecclesivs qvam iste tres habeo binvs differentia propter assvmtio et relictio qvamvis in singvlvs mvltvs stvdivm volvntas qvove diversitas ad concordia tamen vnitas qvovs concvrro possvm invenio qvis svm qvi ad semper oro et non deficio de ivdex iniqvvs volo parabola pono qvi cvm devs non timeo et homo non revereor vidvvs tamen assidvvs interpellatio cedo vt is vindico ne svi ab ille taedivm fio nam hic svm qvi aio ne venio svggilio ego vnvs qvoniam parabola dominvs ante secvndvm similitvdo aliqvis pono sicvt de servvs ille qvi dominvs dimitto qvod ratio reddo debeo invenio svm et ipse conservvs svvs dilatio saltem do nolo o et de fenerator vnvs qvi cvm dvo debitor dono qvod debeo ab is mvltvs dilectvs svm qvi mvltvs dono o et de homo qvi habeo dvo filivs magnvs in ager svi propinqvo parvvs avtem in longinqvvm lvxvrior  et innvmerabilis hic modvs de hic enim qvantvm similis svm dvco intellectvs is res qvi adhibeo insinvo avt reqviro qvintvs avt ex ipse dissimilitvdo aliqvis probo o velvt svm ille qvi si fenvm ager qvi hodie svm et cras in clibanvs mitto devs sic vestio qvanto magis vos modicvs fides ad hic genvs pertineo etiam ille qvi de servvs aio qvi dominvs denvntio vt ab villicatvs removeo o fravs qvippe ille facio dominvs svvs vt falso chirographvm debitor is qvantvm commodvs video svm relaxo qvintvs neqve vllvs modvs nos dominvs vt svi fravs facio hortor sed si fravdo qvasi provideo in postervs lavdo is dico ab dominvs ob qvantvs magnvs alacritas svi provideo debeo in aeternvs vita qvi vt ivste operor ivbeo amicvs facio de mamona iniqvitas qvi svvs locvs expono svm vnvs ad hic genvs pertineo et ille qvi non propter amicitia sed vt taedivm careo iam dormio excito vt tres panis commodo amicvs svvs qvintvs si enim ille molestia compello do qvanto magis devs qvi svvs servvs diligens vt peto hortor do bonvm posco svi itaqve ille svpervs gena hic verbvm adivngo possvm sicvt ille ita et ille o hic avtem postervs hic verbvm si ille qvanto magis ille avt si ille qvanto parvm ille sed alicvbi obscvre alicvbi aperte iste pono vnvs hic ergo iniqvvs ivdex non ex similitvdo sed ex dissimilitvdo adhibeo svm vt ostendo dominvs qvanto certvs svm debeo qvi devs perseveranter rogo fons ivstitia atqve misericordia vel si qvis excellenter dico avt avdio possvm cvm apvd iniqvvs ivdex vsqve ad effectvs impleo desiderivm valeo perseverantia deprecor qvadrantal ipsa vero vidvvs possvm habeo similitvdo ecclesia qvi desolo video donec venio dominvs qvi tamen in secretvm etiam nvnc cvra is gero pentvm si avtem moneo cvr electvs devs svi vindico deprecor qvi etiam in apocalybsi iohanni de martyr dico cvm aperte moneo vt pro nostri inimicvs et persecvtor oro intelligo svm is vindicta svm ivstvs vt omnis malvm pereo qvintvs pereo avtem dvo modvs avt conversio ad ivstitia avt amitto per svpplicivm potestas qvi nvnc adversvs boni qvamdiv hic ipse bonvm expedio vel temporaliter aliqvis valeo vnvs itaqve etiam si omnis homo converto ad devs inter qvi svm etiam inimicvs pro qvi ivbeo oro diabolvs tamen qvi operor in filivs diffidentia remaneo in saecvlvm finis damno pes qvi finis ivstvs cvm venio desidero qvamvis pro inimicvs svvs oro tamen non absvrde vindicta desidero dico vnvs vnvs svm ne impedimentvm aliqvis detineo qvia et hiems imber vel frigvs et sabbatvm in qvi proficiscor non licet impedio qvis ab iter o vel alivs ne in tristitia avt laetitia res temporalis qvis invenio ab dies ille qvintvs qvis svm qvi aio facilis svm camelvs per foramis one acvs transeo qvam dives intro in regnvm devs dives hic appello cvpidvs res temporalis et de talis svperbior vnvs hic dives contrarivs possvm salvvs fio cvm incomparabiliter magnvs tvrba svm pavper o videlicet intelligens in is nvmervs depvto etiam ille qvi qvamqvam talis non habeo tamen habeo cvpiditas rapio pentvm sensvs svm avtem qvi avtem aio qvi impossibilis svm apvd homo possibilivm svm apvd devs non ita accipio svm qvi cvpidvs et svperbvs qvi nomen ille dives significo svm in regnvm caelvm svm intro cvm svvs cvpiditas et qvintvs decimvs eo qvi scribo svm dominvs fingo svi longe eo non ad mendacivm pertineo  non enim omnis qvi fingo mendacivm svm sed qvando is fingo qvi nihil significo tvnc svm mendacivm vnvs cvm avtem fictio noster refero ad aliqvis significatio non svm mendacivm sed aliqvis figvra veritas vnvs alioqvi omnis qvi ab sapiens et sanctvs vir vel etiam ab ipse dominvs figvro dictvm svm mendacivm depvto qvia secvndvm vsitatvs intellectvs non svbsisto veritas talis dictvm vnvs non enim homo qvi habeo dvo filivs qvi parvvs accipio pars patrimonivm svvs proficiscor svm in regio longinqvvs et cetera qvi in ille narratio contexo ita dico tamqvam vere svm qvisqvam homo qvi hic in filivs svvs dvo avt patior svm avt facio qvintvs fictvs svm ergo iste ad res qvidam significo tam longe alte qvove magnvs et tam incomparabiliter differo vt per ille fingo homo devs vervs intelligo vnvs sicvt avtem dico ita etiam facio fingo sine mendacivm ad aliqvis res significo vnvs vnde svm etiam ille idem dominvs qvi in ficvs arbor frvctvs qvaero is tempvs qvi ille pomvm nondvm svm qvinqvaginta non enim dvbivs svm ille inqvisitio non svm vervs vnvs qvivis enim homo scio si non divinitas vel tempvs pomvm ille arbor non habeo vnvs fictio igitvr qvi ad aliqvis veritas refero figvra svm o qvi non refero mendacivm svm pes qvis ergo significo qvod svi eo longe dominvs fingo cvm comitor discipvlvs expono is sanctvs scriptvra vtrvm ipse svm ignoro qvis pvto nisi qvia hospitalitas officivm ad svvs cognitio pervenio possvm homo intimo vt cvm longe ipse ab homo abscedo svper omnis caelvs tamen ita cvm is svm qvi hic ille eo qvisqvis catecio verbvm in omnis bonvm is qvi svi catecizo commvnico o sicvt apostolvs dico commvnico qvi catecio verbvm is qvi svi catecizo in omnis bonvm o et alivs locvs cvm dico necessitas sanctvs commvnico statim svbicio hospitalitas sector vnvs et iste enim cateclo svm verbvm cvm is expono scriptvra et qvia hospitalitas sector svm is qvi in ipse expositio scriptvra non cognosco in panis fractio cognosco pentvm non enim avditor lex ivstvs svm apvd devs sed factor lex ivstifico qvinqvaginta evangeli dico ipse avtem ae fingo longe eo etiam ipse verbvm pono qvi mendax nimivm delecto vt impvne mentior o qvasi mendacivm omnis qvi fingo cvm veraciter alivs ex alivs significo cavsa tam mvltvs fingo qvinqvaginta si ergo nihil alivs significo iesvs in is qvi longe svi eo fingo merito ivdico svm mendacivm qvintvs porro avtem si bene intelligo et ad is qvi volo significo refero invenio svm mysterivm vnvs alioqvi svm cvnctvs mendacivm qvi propter qvidam res significo similitvdo cvm gero non svm tamqvam gero narro qvinqvaginta vnde svm et ille de dvo vnvs homo filivs magnvs qvi maneo apvd pater svvs et parvvs qvi longe peregrinor svm tam prolixvs narratio vnvs in qvi genvs fingo hvmana etiam dictvm vel factvm irrationabilis animans et res sensvs careo homo addo vt is modvs fictvs narratio sed verax significatio qvi volo commendate intimo qvadrantal nec apvd avctor tantvm saecvlarivm littera vt apvd horativs mvs loqvor mvrvs et mvstela vvlpicvla vt per narratio fingo ad is qvi ago verax significatio refero o vnde et aesopvs talis fabvla ad is finis refero nvllvs tam inervditvs svm qvi pvto appello mendacivm qvintvs sed in littera qvoqve sacrvm sicvt in liber ivdicvs lignvm svi rex reqviro et loqvor ad olea et ad ficvs et ad vitis et ad robvs  qvi totvs vtiqve fingo vt ad res qvi intendo fictvs qvidem narratio non mendax tamen sed verax significatio venio qvintvs hic dico propter qvi scribo svm de iesvs et ipse svi fingo longe eo ne qvisqvam ex hic verbvm sicvt priscillianista licet volo habeo mendacivm insvper etiam christvs contendo svm mentior vnvs qvisqvis avtem volo intelligo ille fingo qvis praefigvro attendo qvis ago perficio vnvs longe namqve postea proficiscor svper omnis caelvs non tamen desero discipvlvs svvs qvintvs propter hic significo svm divinitvs facio ad praesens ille svm hvmanitvs fictvs vnvs et ideo significatio verax in ille svm fictio praemitto qvia in hic profectio ille svm significatio veritas svbseqvor vnvs ille igitvr contendo christvs mentior svm fingo qvi nego is qvi significo impleo facio vnvs non svm ergo mendacivm cvm sileo abscondo vervm sed cvm loqvor promo falsvs vnvs iacob avtem qvi mater facio avctor vt pater fallo video si diligenter et fideliter attendo non svm mendacivm sed mysterivm vnvs qvi si mendacivm dico omnis etiam parabola ac figvra significo qvi res qvi non ad proprietas accipio svm sed in is alivs ex alivs svm intelligo dico svm mendacivm o qvi absvm omnino vnvs nam qvi hic pvto tropicvs etiam tam mvltvs locvtio omnis possvm hic importo calvmnia ita vt et ipse qvi appello metafora hic svm de res proprivs ad res non proprivs verbvm aliqvis vsvrpo translatio possvm iste ratio mendacivm nvncvpo vnvs cvm enim dico flvctvor seges gemmo vitis floridvs ivventvs nivevs canities procvl dvbivs flvctvs gemma flos nix qvia in hic res non invenio in qvi hic verbvm alivnde transfero ab iste mendacivm pvto qvintvs et petra christvs et cor lapidevs ivdaei qvadrantal item leo christvs et leo diabolvs et innvmerabilis talis dico svm mendacivm qvinqvaginta qvis qvod hic tropica locvtio vsqve ad is pervenio qvi appello antifrasvs vt dico abvndo qvi non svm dico dvlcis qvi acidvs svm lvcvs qvi non lvceo parca qvi non parco vnde ille svm in scriptvra sanctvs si non in facies benedico tv o qvi diabolvs aio dominvs de sanctvs io et intelligo maledico  pes qvi verbvm et nabvtthevs fingo crimen ab calvmnior nomino svm vnvs dictvm svm enim qvi benedico rex hic svm maledico qvintvs hic omnis modvs locvtio mendacivm pvto si locvtio vel actio figvro in mendacivm depvto qvintvs si avtem non svm mendacivm qvando ad intelligentia veritas alivs ex alivs significo refero profecto non solvm hic qvi facio avt dico iacob pater vt benedico sed neqve ille qvi iosephvs velvt illvdo loqvor svm frater nec qvod davivs simvlo insania nec cetera hic modvs mendacivm ivdico svm sed locvtio actio qvove propheticvs ad is qvi vervs svm intelligo refero o qvi propterea figvro velvt amictvs obtego vt sensvs pie qvaero exerceo et ne nvdo ac promta vilesco qvinqvaginta qvamvis qvi alivs locvs aperte ac manifeste dictvm disco cvm is ipse de abdo ervo qvidam modvs in noster cognitio renovo et renovo dvlcesco nec invideo discens qvod hic modvs obscvro sed commendo magis vt qvasi svbtraho desidero ardenter et invenio desidero ivcvndvs qvintvs tamen vervs non falsvs dico qvoniam vervs non falsvs significo sev verbvm sev facio vnvs qvi significo vtiqve enim ipse dico qvinqvaginta pvto avtem mendacivm qvoniam non is qvi vervs significo dictvm intelligo sed is qvi falsvs svm dictvm svm credo vnvs hic vt exemplvm fio plane is ipse qvi iacobes facio attendo vnvs hedinis certe pellis membrvm contego qvintvs si cavsa propior reqviro mentior pvto o hic enim facio vt pvto svm qvi non svm vnvs si avtem hic facio ad ille propter qvi significo res vervs facio svm refero per hedina pellis peccatvm per is vero qvi is svi operio ille significo svm qvi non svvs sed alienvs peccatvm porto qvintvs verax ergo significatio nvllvs modvs mendacivm recte dico possvm vnvs vt avtem in factvm ita et in verbvm qvintvs nam cvm is pater dico qvis svm tv filivs ille respondeo ego esavs primogenitas tvvs vnvs hic si refero ad dvo ille geminvs mendacivm video  si ante ad ille propter qvi significo iste gero dictvm conscribo svm ille svm intelligo in corpvs svvs qvi svm is ecclesivs qvi de hic res loqvor aio cvm video abraha isaac et iacor et omnis propheta in regnvm devs vos avtem expello foras o et venio ab oriens et occidens et aqvilo et avster et accvmbo in regnvm devs qvadrantal et ecce svm novvs qvi svm primvs et svm primvs qvi svm novvs qvintvs sic enim qvidam modvs parvvs magnvs primatvs frater avfero atqve in svi transfero frater vnvs cvm igitvr tam vervs tam qvovs significo veraciter qvis hic debeo pvto factvm dico qve mendaciter cvm enim qvi significo non vtiqve non svm in veritas sed svm sev praeterita sev praesentia sev svm procvl dvbivm vervs significatio svm nvllvs qvivis mendacivm vnvs sed aliqvanto commendate oportet vt dico cvr iste ego video tripartio ratio dispvto adversvs is qvi patrona mendacivm svvs scriptvra volo adhibeo divinvs vt privs ostendo nonnvllvs qvi ibi pvto svm mendacivm non svm qvi pvto si recte intelligo o deinde ille salvs svm in christvs o hic error qvidam pvto hic timor petrivs simvlo hic libertas pavlvs redargvo qvintvs qvi ergo aio omnis omnis facio svm vt omnis lvcrvm facio compatio is facio non mentior commodvm ac salvs corrvmpo qvintvs ad sempiternvs vero salvs nvllvs dvco svm opitvlor mendacivm  non enim malvm converto mos ad boni mos converto svm qvia si erga ille facio svm debeo etiam ipse intelligentia atqve ratio pes vnde cvm homo ipse admoneo volo svvs nosco natvra ita loqvor svm nam cvm devs bonvs nihil non ratio condo ipse qvovs homo animal rationalis intelligo capax ratio compos sensvs qvove vivax qvi omnis ratio expers prvdens ordinatio distribvo procreo pentvm hic tvvs verbvm satis assero qvi omnino vervs svm homo svm compos ratio atqve intelligentia capax qvi vtiqve non svm animal ratio expers ce vnde testimonivm divinvs is qvi non intelligo pecvs comparo non vtiqve habeo intellectvs qvintvs qvi et alivs locvs scribo svm nolo svm sicvt eqvvs et mvlvs qvi non svm intellectvs vnvs qvi cvm ita svm attendo etiam qvis verbvm spiritvs definio atqve describo cvm ille ab anima distingvo nitor hic anima inqvio qvi ex flatvs devs habeo origo sine sensvs proprivs atqve intellectvs interior svm non possvm qvi svm spiritvs  pes et pavlo post ne qvamvis anima inqvio animo corpvs tamen qvi sentio qvi sapio qvi vigeo spiritvs svm necesse svm  vnvs item pavlo post alivs svm inqvio anima alivs spiritvs o sapientia svm sensvs anima  pes hic verbvm satis indico qvis svm spiritvs homo sentio is svm rationalis nos qvi sentio atqve intelligo anima o non sicvt sentio corpvs sensvs sed sicvt svm ille interior sensvs ex qvi svm appello sententia vnvs hinc avtem pecvs sine dvbitatio praepono is qvod svm ille ratio expers qvintvs non habeo itaqve spiritvs pecvs is svm intellectvs et ratio ac sapientia sensvs sed anima tantvm vnvs nam et de ille dictvm svm prodvco aqva repens anima vivens et prodvco terra anima vivens vnvs vt ergo plene ac plane nosco is qvi anima svm mos divina eloqvivm etiam spiritvs dico appello pecvs spiritvs o et vtiqve non habeo pecvs ille spiritvs qvi tvvs dilectio discerno ab anima definio qvintvs vnde manifestvs svm qvi generalis vocabvlvm anima pecvs recte possvm sic voco sicvt lego in liber ecclesias qvis scio si spiritvs filivs homo ascendo ipse svrsvm et spiritvs pecvs si descendo ipse deorsvm in terra item qvovs in dilvvivm vastitas scribo svm et mortvvs svm omnis caro qvi moveo svper terra volatilis pecvs et ivmentvm et fera o et omnis serpens qvi moveo svper terra et omnis homo et omnis qvicvmqve habeo spiritvs vita vbi remotvs omnis dvbitatio ambages generalis anima nomen svm intelligo spiritvs vnvs qvi qvidem nomen significatio tam late pateo vt etiam devs voco spiritvs o et iste flatvs aerivs qvamvis svm corporevs appello in psalmvs spiritvs tempestas vnvs qvapropter is qvi anima svm etiam spiritvs nvncvpo pvto secvndvm ille avfero spiritvs is et deficio o et itervm exeo spiritvs is et revertor in terra svvs hic svm corpvs in pvlvis svvs qvintvs ergo nomen anima spiritvs svm ab is qvi spiritalis svm o anima nomen svm ab is qvi corpvs animo hic svm vivifico vnvs aestimo qvod admoneo hic qvi commemoro divinvs testimonivm pagina qvinqvaginta vbi et anima pecvs qvi non svm intellectvs appello lego spiritvs non nego vltra vnvs qvocirca si et ille qvi de anima incorporevs dispvto svm capio et sapio non svm vnde tv displiceo qvi is ego scio dico non corpvs svm sed spiritvs qvia et corpvs non svm monstro et generalis nomen spiritvs nvncvpo qvintvs non ob alivs ante adventvs dominvs scriptvm svm omnis qvi in sanctvs scriptvra lego nisi vt ille commendo adventvs et svm praesigno ecclesivs is svm popvlvs devs per omnis gens qvi svm corpvs is adivngo atqve annvmero omnis sanctvs qvi etiam ante adventvs is in hic saecvlvm vivo ita is credo venio svm sicvt nos venio vnvs sicvt enim iacobes manvs privs dvm nascor emitto ex vtervs qva etiam pes praenascor frater teneo deinde vtiqve seqvor svm capvt tvm demvm necessario membrvm cetera sed tamen capvt non tantvm is membrvm qvi seqvor svm sed etiam ipse manvs qvi in nascor praecedo dignitas ac potestas praecedo et qvamvis non tempvs appareo tamen natvra ordo privs svm ita et dominvs iesvs christvs etsi anteqvam appareo in caro et qvidam modvs ex vtervs secretvs svvs ad homo ocvlvs mediator devs et homo homo procedo qvi svm svper omnis devs benedictvs in saecvlvm praemitto in sanctvs patriarches et prophes qvidam pars corpvs svvs qvi velvt manvs svi nascor svm praenvntio etiam popvlvs svperbe praecedo vincvlvm lex tamqvam digitvs qvinqve svpplanto qvia et per qvinqve tempvs articvlvs praenvntio svm propheto qvivi non desisto  et hic res consono per qvi lex do svm qvinqve liber conscribo  et svperbvs carnaliter sentio et svvs ivstitia volo constitvo non apertvs manvs christvs repleo svm benedictio sed constringo atqve conclvdo retineo svm ce itaqve ille obligo svm pes et cado ce nos vero svrgo et erectvs svm qvamvis ergo vt dico praemitto dominvs christvs qvidam pars svvs corpvs in sanctvs qvi is nascor tempvs praeeo tamen ipse svm capvt corpvs ecclesia ille qvovs omnis idem corpvs qvi ille capvt svm cohaereo credo in is qvi praenvntio vnvs non enim praecvrro divello svm sed adivngo potivs exseqvor vnvs nam etsi manvs ab capvt praemitto possvm connexio tamen is svb capvt svm vnvs qvapropter omnis qvi ante scriptvm svm vt nos doceo scriptvm svm et figvra noster svm et in figvra contingo is scriptvm svm avtem propter nos in qvi finis saecvlvm obvenio qvadrantal qvi avtem magnvs cavsa svm adventvs dominvs nisi vt ostendo devs dilectio svvs in nos commendo is vehementer qvia cvm adhvc inimicvs svm christvs pro nos morior svm hic avtem ideo qvia finis praeceptvm et plenitvdo lex caritas svm vt et nos invicem diligo et qvemadmodvm ille pro nos anima svvs pono sic et nos pro frater noster anima noster pono et ipse devs qvoniam prior diligo nos et filivs svvs vnicvs non parco sed pro nos omnis trado is si amo piget saltem redamo non piget vnvs nvllvs svm enim magnvs ad amor invitatio qvam praevenio amo vnvs his ergo qvi loqvor ars cetervs homo excello video cvm venio vt christianvs fio hic ample qvam ille illitteratvs impertio debeo qvod sedvlo moneo svm vt hvmilitas indvo christianvs disco non contemno qvi cognosco mos vitivm qvam verbvm ample devito et cor castvs lingva exercito ne confero avdeo qvam etiam praefero consvesco qvintvs magis avtem iste doceo svm scriptvra divinvs avdio ne sordeo is solidvs eloqvivm qvia non svm inflatvs neqve arbitror carnalis integvmentvm involvo atqve operio dictvm vel facio homo qvi in ille liber lego non evolvo atqve aperio vt intelligo sed sic accipio vt littera sono o de qvi ipse vtilitas secretvs vnde etiam mysteria voco qvis valeo aenigmatvs latebra ad amor veritas acvo discvtio qvove fastidivm torpor ipse experientia probo svm talis cvm aliqvis is qvi in promtvs pono non ita moveo enodatio allegoria aliqvis ervo vnvs hic enim magis vtilis svm nosco ita svm praepono verbvm sententia vt praepono animvs corpvs qvinqvaginta ex qvi fio vt ita malo debeo vervs qvam disertvs avdio sermo sicvt malo debeo prvdens qvam formosvs habeo amicvs qvintvs nosco etiam non svm vox ad avris devs nisi animvs affectvs qvintvs ita enim non irrideo si aliqvis antistes et minister ecclesia forte animadverto vel cvm barbaris et soloecismvs devs invoco vel idem verbvm qvi pronvntio non intelligo pertvrbate qvove distingvo non qvia iste parvm corrigo svm vt popvlvs ad is qvi plane intelligo dico amo one sed tamen pie tolero svm ab is qvi disco vt sonvs in forvm sic votvm in ecclesivs benedicvs qvintvs itaqve forensis ille nonnvmqvam forte bonvs dictio nvmqvam tamen benedictio dico possvm vnvs cogitemvs qvis nos praerogo svm ab ille qvi demo one sterno nos exemplvm vt seqvor vestigivm is qvintvs qvantvmvis enim differo articvlo vox noster ab intelligentia noster vivacitas longe differens svm mortalitas caro ab aeqvalitas devs o et tamen cvm in idem forma svm svi ipse exinanio forma servvs accipio et cetera vsqve ad mors crvx qvadrantal qvis ob cavsa nisi qvia facio svm infirmvs infirmvs vt infirmvs lvcrvm facio avdio is imitator alibi etiam dico sive enim mens excedo devs sive temperans svm nos qvinqvaginta caritas enim christivs compello nos ivdico hic qvia vnvs pro omnis morior svm pes qvomodo enim paratvs svm impendo pro anima is si is piget inclino ad avris is hinc ergo facio svm parvvlvs in medivm noster tamqvam nvtrix foveo filivs svvs qvadrantal nvm enim delecto nisi amor invito decvrto et mvtilo verbvm immvrmvro et tamen opto homo habeo infans qvi is exhibeo et svavis svm mater minvtvs mansa inspvo parvvlvs filivs qvam ipse mando ac devoro grandis vnvs non ergo recedo de pectvs cogitatio gallina ille qvi langvidvlvs plvma tener fetvs operio et svsvrro pvllvs confringo vox advoco qvi blandvs ala refvgio svperbvs praeda fio ales qvintvs si enim intellectvs delecto in penetrabilis sincervs hic etiam intelligo delecto qvomodo caritas qvanto officiose descendo in infervs tanto robvstvs recvrro in interior per bonvs conscientia nihil qvaero ab is ad qvi descendo praeter is sempiternvs salvs pes sivs avtem confringo animvs tvvs alter actio qvi tamqvam magis necessarivs iam svspensvs svm omissio et proplisterea tristis insvaviter catecizae cogito debeo excipio qvi scio misericorditer nos ago qvisqvis cvm homo ago et ex officivm sincervs caritas hic ergo excipio incertvs svm qvis vtilis ago et qvis opportvnvs avt intermitto avt omnino omitto vnvs qvia enim meritvm homo nvm pro qvi ago qvalis svm apvd devs non nosco qvis is ad tempvs expedio ant nvllvs avt tenvis et incertvs coniectvra svspicor potivs qvam comprehendo vnvs qvapropter res qvidem ago pro noster captvs ordino debeo vnvs qvi is modvs qvi statvo si perago possvm non ideo gavdeo qvia nos sed qvia devs sic is ago placeo o si avtem aliqvis incido necessitas qvi noster ille ordo tvrbo flecto facile ne frango vt qvi devs s noster praepono ipse svm noster vnvs aeqvvs svm enim vt nos is qvam vt ille noster volvntas seqvor qvia et ordo ago res qvi nos pro arbitrivm teneo volo ille vtiqve approbo svm vbi potis procedo qvadrantal cvr ergo nos doleo homo ab dominvs devs tanto potis praecedo vt is ipse qvo nos amo ordo inordinatvs svm cvpio nemo enim bene ordino qvis ago nisi qvi paratvs svm non ago qvod divinvs potestas prohibeo qvam cvpidvs ago qvod hvmanvs cogitatio meditor qvia mvltvs cogitatio svm in cor vir consilivm avtemvm dominvs maneo in aeternvm qvinqvaginta sivs avtem de aliqvis erratvs noster vel peccatvm nos maestitvdo comprehendo non tantvm memini sacrificivm devs spiritvs svm contribvlo sed etiam ille qvia sicvt aqva ignis sic elemosynvs exstingvo peccatvm et qvia misericordia inqvio volo qvam sacrificivm vnvs sicvt ergo si periclitor incendivm ad aqva vtiqve cvrro qvo possvm exstingvo gratvlor si qvis is de proximvm offero ita et si de noster fenvm aliqvis peccatvm flamma svrgo et propterea contvrbo do occasio misericors opvs tamqvam de offero fons gavdeo vt inde ille qvi exardesco opprimo qvintvs nisi forte tam stvltvs svm vt alacre arbitror cvm panis cvrro qvis venter esvrio impleo qvam cvm verbvm devs qvis mens stvdeo instrvo vnvs hvc accedo qvia si tantvmmodo prosvm hic facio non facio avtem nihil obsvm infeliciter in pericvlvm salvs non iam propior sed noster offero remedivm sperno vnvs cvm vero ex os dominvs tam minaciter sono ser ivs neqvam et piger do pecvnia mevs nvmalarivs qvi tandem dementia svm qvoniam peccatvm nos nos ango ideo rvrsvs volo pecco non do pecvnia dominicvs volo et peto sed facio aliqvis venio ad nos qvi volo svm christianvs et de genvs qvidem idiota non tamen rvsticanvs sed vrbanvs qvalis apvd carthago mvltvs experior tv necesse svm o interrogo etiam vtrvm propter vita praesens aliqvis commodvm an propter reqvies qvi post hic vita spero christianvs svm desidero propter svm reqvies respondeo talis fortasse ab nos instrvo alloqvivm vnvs devs gratia frater o valde tv gratvlor et gavdeo de tv qvi in tantvs et pericvlosvs hic saecvlvm tempestas de aliqvis vervs et certvs secvritas cogito pes nam et in hic vita homo magis labor reqvies qvaero et secvritas sed pravvs cvpiditas non invenio o volo enim reqviesco in res inqvietvs et non permaneo vnvs et qvia ille et tempvs svbtraho et transeo timor is et dolor agito nec qvietvs is permitto vnvs si enim in divitiae volo homo reqviesco magis svperbvs efficio qvam secvrvs vnvs qvinqve hervs frater ille magnvs et vervs beatitvdo svm qvi in fvtvrvm saecvlvm sanctvs promitto qvintvs omnis vero visibilis transeo et omnis hic saecvlvm pompa et delicia et cvriositas intereo et cvm svi ad interitvs traho amator svvs qvintvs ab qvi interitvs hic svm ipse praedictvm propheta ascendo in caelvm et discipvlvs svvs spiritvs sancio mitto vnvs praedico svm enim non solvm ab prophes sed etiam ab ipse dominvs iesvs christvs qvod ecclesivs is per vniversvm orbis terra svm svm per sanctvs martyrivs passio qvovs dissemino et tvnc praedico qvando adhvc nomen is et lateo gens et vbi notvs svm rideo qvadrantal et tamen in virtvs miracvlvm is sive per svi ipse sive qvi per servvs svvs facio dvm annvntio hic et credo iam video qvi praedico svm svm compleo rex qvovs ipse terra qvi antea perseqvor christianvs iam christvs nomen svbivgo qvadrantal praedico svm etiam qvod schisma et haereo ex is ecclesivs svm exeo et ex is nomen per locvs vbi possvm svvs non christvs gloria qvaero o et iste compleo svm qvinqvaginta nvmqvid ergo ille qvi resto non svm venio manifestvs svm qvia sicvt iste praedictvm venio sic etiam ille venio svm qvicvmqve ivstvs tribvlatio adhvc resto et ivdicivm dies qvi separo omnis impivs ab ivstvs in resvrrectio mortvvs et non solvm is qvi svm extra ecclesia sed etiam ipse ecclesia palea qvi oportet vsqve ad novvs vevtilatio patienter svffero ad ignis debeo segrego qvintvs qvi avtem irrideo resvrrectio pvto qvod caro iste qvia pvtresco resvrgo non possvm ad poena in is resvrgo svm et ostendo is devs qvia qvi possvm hic corpvs facio anteqvam svm possvm is momentvm restitvo sicvt svm qvinqvaginta omnis avtem fidelis regno cvm christvs ita resvrgo in idem corpvs vt etiam mvto mereor ad incorrvptio angelica vt fio aeqvalis angelvs devs sicvt dominvs ipse promitto et lavdo is sine aliqvis defectvs et sine aliqvis fastidivm semper vivo in ille et de ille cvm talis gavdivm et beatitvdo qvalis nec dico nec cogito ab homo possvm vnvs tv itaqve credo iste caveo temtatio qvia diabolvs qvaero qvi cvm svi pereo vt non solvm per is qvi extra ecclesia svm sive paganvs sive ivdaei sive haereticvs non tv hostis ille sedvco sed etiam qvi in ipse ecclesivs catholicvs video male vivens avt immoderatvs volvptas venter et gvttvr avt impvdicvs avt vanvs cvriositas vel illicitvs dedo sine spectacvlvm sine remedivm avt divinatio diabolicvs sive in pompa et in tyfvs avaritia atqve svperbia sine in aliqvis vita qvi lex damno et pvnio non is imitor sed potivs conivngo bonvm qvi invenio svm facile si et tv talis svm vt simvl colo et diligo devs gratis qvia totvs praemivm nos ipse svm vt in ille aeternvs vita bonitas is et pvlchritvdo perfrvor vnvs sed amo svm non sicvt aliqvis qvi video ocvlvs sed sicvt amo sapientia et veritas et sanctitas et ivstitia et caritas et si qvis alivs talis dico o non qvemadmodvm svm
