devs et homo reconcilio devs vnvs homo avtem perverto etiam si intro paries ecclesiae non is arbitror intro in regnvm caelvm qvia svvs tempvs separo si svi in bonvs non commvto vnvs homo ergo bonvs imitor malvs tolero omnis amo qvia non scio qvis cras svm svm qvi hodie malvs svm pes nec is amo inivstitia sed ipse ideo amo vt apprehendo ivstitia qvia non solvm nos dilectio devs praeceptvm svm sed etiam dilectio propior in qvi dvo praeceptvm totvs lex pendeo et propheta qvadrantal qvi non impleo nisi qvi donvm accipio spiritvs sanctvs pater et filivs vtiqve coaeqvalis qvia ipse trinitas devs svm vnvs in qvi devs spes omnis pono svm pes nam in homo non svm pono qvaliscvmqve ille svm qvintvs alivs svm enim ille ab qvi ivstifico alivs ille cvm qvi ivstificor vnvs non avtem solvm per cvpiditas diabolvs tento sed etiam per terror insvltatio et dolor et ipse mors qvinqvaginta qvisqvis homo avtem patior svm pro nomen christvs et pro spes vita aeternvs et permaneo tolero magnvs is merces dono qvia si consentio diabolvm cvm ille damno vnvs sed opera misericordia cvm pivs hvmilitas impetro ab dominvs vt non permitto servvs svvs temtor vltra qvam possvm svstineo qvintvs prohibes etiam sanctvs do canis o nec contrarivs svm apostolvs dominvs qvia dico peccans coram omnis arge qveo vt ceteri timor habeo cvm ille dico corripio is inter tv et ipse vnvs vterqve enim facio svm sicvt infirmitas diversitas admoneo is qvod vtiqve non perdo sed corrigo cvro qvove svscipio et alivs sic alivs avtem sic sano svm o ita etiam svm ratio dissimvlo et tolero mali in ecclesivs et svm rvrsvs ratio castigo corripio non admitto vel ab commvnio removeo pes erro avtem homo non servo modvs et cvm in vnvs pars procliviter eo coepio non respicio divinvs avctoritas alivs testimonivm qvi possvm ab ille intentio revoco et in is qvi ex vterqve temperatvs svm veritas ac moderatio consisto o nec in hic res tantvm de qvi nvnc qvaestio svm sed etiam in alivs mvltvs pes nam qvidam intveor divinvs testimonivm littera qvi vnvs colo devs insinvo idem pater qvi svm filivs spiritvs qvovs sanctvs pvto qvinqvaginta alivs rvrsvs velvt morbvs contrarivs laboro cvm attendo is qvi trinitas declaro nec valeo intelligo qvomodo svm vnvs devs cvm et pater non svm filivs nec filivs svm pater nec spiritvs sanctvs avt filivs avt pater diversitas etiam svbstantia assero pvto qvadrantal qvidam intveor in scriptvra sanctvs virginitas lavs connvbivm damno qvadranta qvidam rvrsvs is testimonivm consector qvi castvs conivgivm praedico virginitas nvptiae aeqvo qvinqvaginta qvidam cvm lego bonvm svm frater non mandvco caro neqve bibo vinvm et nonnvllvs similis creo devs et qvi volo esca immvndvs svm sentio qvintvs qvidam vero lego omnis creo devs bonvm svm et nihil abicio qvi cvm gratia actio accipio in voracitas vinolentia qvovs collabor svm non svi valens avfero vitivm nisi is ex contrarivm vel tantvs vel magnvs svccedo vnvs sic etiam in hic cavsa qvi habeo in manvs qvidam intveor praeceptvm severitas qvi admoneo corripio inqvietvs non do sanctvs canis vt ethnicvs habeo ecclesia contemtor ab compages corpvs qvi scandolizo evello ita pertvrbo ecclesia pax vt conor ante tempvs separo scazania atqve hic error caecitas ipse potivs ab christvs vnitas separo qvadrantal qvalis nos cavsa svm adversvs schisma donativs et hic non cvm ille qvi nosco caecilianvs non vervs sed calvmniosvs crimen appetitvs et perniciosvs sententia svvs mortifer pvdor non desero sed cvm ille qvi dico etiam si malvs svm propter qvi in ecclesivs non svm vos tamen is fero qvi emendo avt segrego parvm possvm in ecclesivm permaneo debeo vnvs qvidam vero contrarivs periclitor cvm bonvm malvm qvivis commixtio in ecclesivs demonstro vel praedico svm perspicio et patientia praeceptvm disco qvi nos firmvs reddo vt etiam si video in ecclesivs svm zizania non tamen impedio avt fides avt caritas noster vt qvoniam zizania in ecclesivs svm cerno ipse de ecclesivm recedo destitvo pvto ecclesia disciplina qvidam perversvs secvritas praepono tribvo vt ad is non pertineo nisi dico qvis caveo qvis ivs svm facio qvilibet avtem qvisqve facio non cvro vnvs nos vero ad sanvs doctrina pertineo arbitror ex vterqve testimonivm vita sententia qvavis moderor vt et canis in ecclesivs propter pax ecclesia tolero et canis sanctvs vbi svm pax ecclesiae tvtvs non do vnvs cvm ergo sive per negligentia praepono sive per aliqvis excvsabilis necessitas sive per occvltvs obreptio invenio in ecclesivm mali qvi ecclesiasticvs disciplina corrigo avt coherceo non possvm tvnc ne ascendo in cor noster impivs et perniciosvs praesvmtio qvi existimo nos ab hic svm separo vt peccatvm is non inqvino atqve ita post nos traho conor velvt mvndvs sanctvs qvove discipvlvs ab vnitas compages qvasi ab malvm consortivm segrego qvintvs venio in mens ille de scriptvra similitvdo et divinvs oracvlvm vel certvs exemplvm qvi demonstro et praenvntio svm mali in ecclesivm permisceo bonvm vsqve in finis saecvlvm tempvs qvisqve ivdicivm svm et nihil bonvm vnitas ac participatio sacramentvm qvi is factvm non consentio obsvm vnvs cvm vero is per qvi ecclesivs rego assvm pax salvvs potestas disciplina adversvs improbvs avt nefarivs exerceo tvnc rvrsvs ne socordia segnitia qvove dormio alivs acvlevs praeceptvm qvi ad severitas cohercitio pertineo excito svm vt gressvs noster in via dominvs ex vterqve testimonivm ille dvx atqve adivtor dirigo nec patientia nomen torpesco nec obtentvs diligentia saevio qvintvs cavea ergo diligenter in adivtorivm dominvs devs noster non facio homo male secvrvs dico is qvod si svm in christvs baptipo qvomodolibet in is fides vivo is ad salvs aeternvs svm venio ne sic facio christianvs qvomodo ivdaei proselytvs qvi dominvs aio vae vos scriba et pharisaevs qvi circvmeo mare et terra facio vnvs proselytvs o cvm avtem facio facio is filivs gehenna dvplvm qvam vos svm o sed potivs sanvs doctrina devs magister in vterqve teneo vt sanctvs baptismvm consonvs svm vita christianvs nec qvisqvam qvintvs homo si vterlibet desvm vita promitto aeternvs vnvs qvi enim dico nisi qvis renatvs svm ex aqva et spiritvs sanctvs non intro in regnvm caelvm ipse etiam dico nisi abvndo ivstitia vester svper scriba et pharisaei non intro in regnvm caelvm vnvs de ille qvippe aio scriba et pharisaevs cathedra moysvs sedeo qvintvs qvi dico facio o qvi avtem facio facio nolo o dico enim et non facio vnvs ergo ivstitia is svm dico et non facio ac per hic noster svm volo abvndans svper ille dico et facio vnvs qvi si non svm non intro in regnvm caelvm non qvia qvisqvam debeo ita extollo vt non dico apvd alivs iacto sed apvd svi ipse pvto avdeo svi in hic vita svm sine peccatvm  sed nisi svm qvidam ita gravis vt etiam excommvnicatio plecto svm non dico apostolvs congrego vos et mevs spiritvs trado hic modvs satanvs in interitvs caro vt spiritvs salvvs svm in dies dominvs iesvs qvadrantal vnde etiam dico ne lvgeo mvlti ex hic qvi ante pecco et non ago paenitentia svper immvnditia et fornicatio qvi gero qvinqvaginta item nisi svm qvidam non is hvmilitas paenitentia sano qvalis in ecclesivs do is qvi proprie paenitens voco sed qvidam correptio medicamentvm non dico dominvs ipse corripio is inter tv et ipse et si tv avdio lvcratvs svm frater tvvs vnvs posterivs nisi svm qvidam sine qvi hic vita non ago non cotidianvs medella pono in oratio qvi doceo vt dico dimitto nos debeo noster sicvt et nos dimitto debitor noster qvintvs ia satis qvantvm arbitror de ille totvs opinio qvis ego video expono vnvs vbi tres qvaestio moveo vnvs de permixtio in ecclesivs bonvm et malvm tamqvam triticvm et zisania o vbi caveo svm ne ideo pvto svm propono iste similitvdo vel hic vel de immvndvs in arca animal vel qvicvmqve alivs qvi idem significo vt dormio ecclesia disciplina de qvi in figvra ille mvlier dictvm svm severvs svm conversatio domvs is sed vt non eo vsqve progredior dementia potivs temeritas qvam severitas diligentia vt qvasi boni ab malvm per nefarivs schisma separo praesvmo qvinqvaginta neqve enim per hic similitvdo et praenvntiatio consilivm desidia bonvm do svm qvi negligo qvi prohibeo debeo sed patientia qva perfero salvvs doctrina veritas qvi emendo non valeo vnvs nec qvia scribo svm introeo ad novs in arca etiam immvndvs animal ideo praepono veto non debeo si qvis immvndvs ad baptismvm volo intro salto qvi svm certe mitis o sed per hic figvra res gero praenvntio svm immvndvs in ecclesivm svm propter tolerantia ratio non propter doctrina corrvptio vel disciplina dissolvtio vnvs non enim qvacvmqve libet intro immvndvs animal area compages confringo sed is integer per vnvs atqve idem ostivm qvi artifex facio qvadrantal alter qvaestio svm in qvi is video svm fides solvs baptizo svm trado postea vero iam baptino doceo svm de mos qvintvs sed satis demonstro svm nisi fallo tvnc magis pertineo ad cvra specvlator cvm omnis qvi fidelis competo sacramentvm omnis qvi dico intente et sollicite avdio non taceo de poena qvam male vivo dominvs comminor ne in ipse baptismvm res svm gravis crimen qvi venio vt remitto reor omnis peccatvm qvintvs tertivs qvaestio svm pericvlosvs qvi parvm consideratvs et non secvndvm divinvs eloqvivm pertracto totvs ille opinio ego video exorior in qvi promitto sceleste tvrpiter qvove vivo etiam si is modvs vivo persevero et tantvmmodo credo in christvs is qvove sacramentvm percipio is ad salvs vita qvovs aeternvs svm venio contra apertvs dominvs sententia qvi desidero vita aeternvs respondeo si vis venio ad vita servvs mandatvm o et commemoro qvi mandatvm vbi is scilicet peccatvm vito qvi nescio qvomodo salvs aeternvs promitto propter fides sine opvs morior qvintvs de hic tres qvaestio satis qvantvm existimo dispvto demonstro qvove sic tolero in ecclesia mali vt non negligo ecclesiasticvs disciplina o sic catecizo is qvi baptis peto vt non solvm avdio atqve svscipio qvis credo vervm etiam qvaliter vivo debeo o sic promitto fidelis vita aeternvs vt non etiam per fides morior qvi sine opvs salvo non possvm ad is svi qvisqve pervenio possvm arbitror sed per ille fides gratia qvi per dilectio operor qvintvs decemivs prophetvs qvi aio apostolvs qvidam qvidem do devs in ecclesivs apostolvs qvidam avtem propheta hic intelligo qvi ipse scribo propheta is dico ex iste locvs ex qvi agabvs svm non ille qvi venio in caro dominvs propheto qvadrantal evangelistvs vero invenio qvi apostolos svm non lego sicvt svm marcvs et lvcae o pastor avtem et doctor qvi magis vt discerno volo idem pvto svm sicvt et tv video svm vt non alivs pastor alivs doctor intelligo sed ideo cvm praedico pastor svbivngo doctor vt intelligo pastor ad officivm svvs pertineo doctrina pes ideo enim non aio qvidam avtem pastor qvidam vero doctor sed cvm svpervs ipse locvtio genvs distingvo dico qvidam apostolvs qvidam avtem propheta qvidam vero evangelistvs sed hic tamqvam vnvs aliqvis de dvo nomen amplector svm qvidam avtem pastor et doctor qvintvs illa plane difficvlter discerno vbi ad timothevs scribo aio obsecro itaqve primvm omnis fio obsecratio oratio interpellatio gratia actio qvinqvaginta precation et deprecatio mvlti nostri hic idem pvto et hic cotidianvs vsvs iam omnino praevaleo qvintvs qvi avtem distincte latine loqvor svm precatio vtor in opto bonvs deprecatio vero in devito malvm qvintvs precor enim dico svm precor bonvm opto imprecor malvm qvi vvlgo iam dico maledico o deprecor avtem malvm precor depello qvintvs sed vsitatvs iam loqvor modvs potivs seqvor et sive precatio sive deprecatio invenio qvi graeci deraae voco non pvto svm emendo vnvs mvlta hinc dico possvm qvi improbo non svm qvinqvaginta sed eligo in hic verbvm hic intelligo qvi omnis vel paene omnis freqvento ecclesivs vt precatio accipio dico qvi facio in celebratio sacramentvm anteqvam ille qvi svm in dominvs mensa incipio benedicvs oratio cvm benedico et sanctifico et ad distribvo comminvo qvi totvs petitio fere omnis ecclesivs dominicvs oratio conclvdo qvintvs interpellatio avtem sive vt vester cavdex habeo postvlatio fio cvm popvlvs benedico o tvnc enim antistes velvt advocatvs svscipio svvs per manvs impositio misericordvs offero potestas qvintvs qvi perago et participo tantvs sacramentvm gratia actio cvnctvs conclvdo qvi in hic etiam verbvm vltimvs commendo apostolvs qvadrantal hic avtem cavsa praecipvvs svm iste dico vt hic breviter perscribo atqve significo non pvto negligo qvi seqvor pro omnis homo pro rex et hic qvi in svblimitas svm vt qvietvs et tranqvillvs vita ago in omnis pietas et caritas ne qvisqvam sicvt svi habeo hvmanvs cogitatio infirmitas aestimo non iste svm facio pro hic ab qvi persecvtio patior ecclesivs cvm membrvm christvs ex omnis svm homo genvs colligo qvintvs vnde adivngo et dico hic enim bonvm svm et acceptvs coram salvator noster devs qvi omnis homo volo salvvs fio et ad agnitio veritas venio vnvs et ne qvisqvam dico possvm svm salvs via in bonvs conversatio et vnvs devs omnipotens cvltvs sine participatio corpvs et sangvis christvs vnvs enim devs inqvio et vnvs mediator devs et homo homo christvs iesvs vt ille qvi dico omnis homo volo salvvs fio nvllvs alivs modvs intelligo praesto nisi per mediator non devs qvi semper svm verbvm sed homo christvs iesvs cvm verbvm caro factvm svm et habito in nos qvintvs decimvs evangelivm inqvisitio tvvs soleo mvlti moveo qvomodo dominvs post resvrrectio cvm in idem corpvs resvrgo ab qvidam qvi is nosco vterqve sexvs homo et agnosco non svm et agnitvs svm vnvs vbi primvm qvaero soleo vtrvm in is corpvs an potivs in ille ocvlvs aliqvis factvm svm qvi non possvm agnosco vnvs cvm enim lego teneo ocvlvs is ne agnosco is impedimentvm qvidam agnosco video in lvmen factvm svm cerno o cvm vero aperte alibi dico appareo is in alivs effigies vtiqve in ipse corpvs qvi alivs svm effigies aliqvis factvm svm qvi impedimentvm teneo is svm mora agnosco patior ocvlvs ille qvintvs sed ego miror cvm dvo svm in corpvs qvi qvisqve species agnosco lineamentvm et color cvr ante resvrrectio qvi in mons ita transfigvro svm vt fio vvltvs is splendidvs sicvt sol et nemo moveo vsqve ad tantvs excellentia fvlgor et lvx color svvs corpvs is mvto possvm et post resvrrectio moneo aliqvatenvs lineamentvm mvto vt non possvm agnosco et rvrsvs idem potentia facilitas sicvt tvnc pristinvs color sic et post resvrrectio pristinvs lineamentvm revoco qvintvs nam et ille tres discipvlvs ante qvi ocvlvs in mons transfigvro svm non is agnosco si ad is talis alivnde venio sed qvia cvm ille svm ipse svm certe retineo vnvs at enim corpvs ipse svm in qvi resvrgo pes qvis hic ad res nam et ille vtiqve ipse corpvs svm in qvi in mons transfigvro svm et ipse svm ivvenis in qvi natvs svm et tamen si qvis is ivvenis repente video qvi non nisi infantvlvs nosco non vtiqve agnosco vnvs an vero ad lineamentvm mvto non possvm celeriter devs potestas qvi possvm per annvs mora homo aetas de verbvm symeon vbi aio virgo mater dominvs et tvvs ipse anima pertransio gladivs in alivs epistola qvi exemplvm etiam modvs mitto dico qvis ego video ce qvi etiam tv inter cetera video svm mille et qvi adivngo vt denvdo mvltvs cor cogitatio hic intelligo pvto qvia per dominvs passio et insidiae ivdaei et discipvlvs infirmitas pateo qvinqvaginta tribvlatio igitvr gladivs nomen significo svm credibilis svm qvi maternvs anima vvlnero svm dolor affectvs pes ipse svm gladivs in os perseqvor de qvi in psalmvm dico et gladivs in os is qvinqvaginta ipse enim svm filivs homo qvi dens arma et sagitta et lingva is gladivs acvtvs qvadrantal nam et ferrvm qvi pertranseo anima iosephvs pro dvrvs tribvlatio pono ferrvm ego video qvintvs aperte qvidem dico ferrvm pertranseo anima is donec venio verbvm is is svm tamdiv svm in dirvs tribvlatio donec fio qvi praedico qvintvs hinc enim magnvs habitvs et ab ille tribvlatio libero qvadranta sed ne hvmanvs sapientia tribvo qvi venio verbvm is is svm factvm svm qvi praedico mos svvs scriptvra sanctvs devs inde do gloria et continvo svbivngo eloqvivm dominvs ignio is vnvs dominvs in evangelivm dico qvi non svm cvm ego adversvs ego svm et qvi cvm ego non colligo spargo vnvs tamen cvm ad is discipvlvs refero video svi qvidam in is nomen pello daemonia et prohibeo qvia cvm ille is non seqvor nolo inqvio prohibeo  qvi contra vos non svm pro vos svm pes non possvm enim qvisqvam in mevs nomen facio aliqvis et male loqvor de ego vnvs si nihil in ille corrigo svm secvrvs svm ergo qvisqvis extra commvnio ecclesia constitvo colligo in christvs nomen dissocio ab societas christianvs qvintvs atqve ita falsvs svm ille qvi non svm cvm ego adversvs ego svm et qvi cvm ego non colligo spargo vnvs si avtem qvi discipvlvs dominvs per ignorantia facio volo is in is corrigo svm qvi dominvs dico nolo prohibeo cvr hic ipse prohibeo prohibeo et qvomodo svm vervs qvi ibi aio qvi contra vos non svm pro vos svm tv in hic enim factvm non contra is sed pro is svm vbi per nomen christvs sanitas operor qvadrantal vt ergo vterqve sententia vervs svm sicvt vervs svm et ille vbi aio qvi non svm cvm ego adversvs ego svm et qvi cvm ego non colligo spargo et ille vbi aio nolo prohibeo ce qvi enim contra vos non svm pro vos svm qvis resto intelligo nisi qvia ille in tantvs nomen veneratio confirmo svm vbi non svm contra ecclesia sed pro ecclesivs et in ille tamen separatio cvlpo vbi si colligo spargo et si forte venio ad ecclesia non ille qvi habeo ibi accipio sed in qvi aberro emendo neqve enim et cornelivs gentilis homo oratio non svm exavdio avt elemosyne non svm accipio immo et angelvs ad svi mitto et mitto mereo intveor per qvi possvm vtiqve sine homo aliqvis accessvs cvnctvs necessarivs disco vnvs sed qvoniam qvisqvis bonvm in oratio et elemosyni habeo prosvm ille non possvm nisi per vincvlvm christianvs societas et pax incorporo ecclesivs ivbeo mitto ad petrvs et per ille disco christvs  per ille etiam baptizo christianvs popvlvs consortivm qvoqve commvnio adivngo qvi solvs bonvm opvs similitvdo ivngo qvadranta perniciose qvippe contemno bonvm qvi nondvm habeo svperbiens ex ille qvi habeo vnvs sic etiam qvi svi ipse ab societas ceteri separo caritas violo vnitas vincvlvm rvmpo si nihil facio is qvi in ille societas accipio in omnis separatvs svm o et ideo qvi svi socio si venio ad ecclesia volo debeo omnis qvi non accipio accipio vnvs si vero nonnvllvs idem facio non svi in is separo et ex is pars in textvra compages detineo in cetera scindo svm qvintvs proinde si qvis svi socio ex is pars necto ecclesia in qvi nec ille separatvs svm o et ideo si venio ad ecclesia volo in is sano vbi lanio erro vbi vero sanvs connecto non cvro sed agnosco ne cvm sanvs cvro volo potivs vvlnero vnvs itaqve ille qvi baptipo sano ab vvlnvs idolatria vel infidelitas sed graviter ferio vvlnvs schisma qvintvs idolatra enim in popvlvs devs gladivs interimo schismaticvs avtem terra hiatvs absorbeo ce et apostolvs si habeo inqvio omnis fides ita vt mons transfero caritas avtem non habeo nihil svm vnvs sinvs qvis addvco ad medicvs in aliqvis necessarivs pars corpvs gravis vvlnvs savcio si dico medicvs morior inde nisi cvro non opinor vt ille qvi is addvco ita desipio vt consideratvs atqve nvmero cetervs membrvm is sanvs respondeo medicvs et dico ergo iste sanvs tot membrvm non valeo ad is vita et vnvs ille vvlnero valeo ad mors non vtiqve hic dico sed cvro offero pentvm nec ideo tamen qvia cvro offero medicvs rogo vt etiam ille qvi sanvs svm cvro sed ille vnvs locvs medicina instanter adhibeo vnde mors etiam salvvs ceteri immineo et nisi sano advenio qvintvs qvis ergo prosvm homo vel sanvs fides vel sanvs fortasse solvs fides sacramentvm vbi letalis vvlnvs schisma peremtvs svm sanitas caritas per qvi solvs peremtio etiam ille integer traho ad mors qvi ne fio non cesso misericordia devs per vnitas sanctvs ecclesia svvs vt venio et cvro per medicamentvm reconciliatio per vincvlvm pax qvintvs nec ideo svi pvto sanvs svm qvia dico is habeo aliqvis sanvs nec rvrsvs ideo pvto cvro svm qvi sanvs svm qvia ostendo aliqvis vvlnero vnvs itaqve in sacramentvm sanitas qvia contra nos non svm pro nos svm o in schisma avtem vvlnvs qvisqvis cvm christvs non colligo spargo vnvs non extollo ex hic qvi habeo qvintvs qvis tantvm per is qvi sanvs svm svperbvs ocvlvs dvco et vvlnvs svvs dignor hvmiliter intveor nec solvm qvis assvm sed etiam qvis desvm attendo qvintvs video qvam mvltvs et qvam magnvs nihil prosvm si vnvs qvidam desvm et video qvis svm ipse vnvs nec ego in hic avdio sed apostolvs si lingva homo inqvio loqvor et angelvs caritas avtem non habeo facio svm aeramentvm sono et cymbalvm tinnio o et si habeo prophetia et scio omnis sacramentvm et omnis scientia et si habeo omnis fides vt mons transfero caritas avtem non habeo nihil svm vnvs qvis ergo is prosvm si lingva in sacrvm mysterivm habeo angelvs et propheticvs qvemadmodvm caiphas et savlis vt aliqvando propheto qvi svm damnabilis sanctvs scriptvra testor si sacramentvm non tantvm scio sed et habeo sicvt habeo simo one magvs si fides sicvt daemonia confiteor svm christvs neqve enim non credo cvm dico qvis nos et tv svm filivs devs o scio qvi svm vnvs si dispertio etiam ipse svbstantia svvs pavper sicvt mvlti non solvm in catholicvs sed in diversvs haeresvs facio si aliqvis ingrvo persecvtio trado ad flamma cvm nos corpvs svvs pro fides qvi pariter confiteor tamen qvia separatvs hic ago non svffero invicem in dilectio neqve stvdeo servo vnitas spiritvs in vincvlvm pax caritas vtiqve non habeo etiam cvm ille omnis qvi nihil is prosvm ad aeternvs salvs pervenio non possvm vnvs sed video svi argvte qvaero vtrvm genero filivs baptior christvs in pars donativs an non genero o vt si consentio qvi genero svvs svm assevero ecclesia mater qvi filivs possvm de christvs baptisma genero et qvia vnvs oportet svm ecclesia ex hic iam noster non svm ecclesia criminor ce si avtem dico non genero cvr ergo inqvio apvd vos non renascor per baptismvm qvi transeo ab nos ad vos cvm apvd nos svm baptiso si nondvm natvs svm qvasi vero ex hic genero vnde separatvs svm et non ex hic vnde conivnctvs svm vnvs separatvs svm enim ab vincvlvm caritas et pax sed ivngo svm in vnvs baptismas pes itaqve vnvs svm ecclesivs qvi solvs catholicvs nomino et qvisqvis svvs habeo in commvnio diversvs ab svvs vnitas separo per hic qvi svvs in is habeo ipse vtiqve genero non ille pentvm neqve enim separatio is genero sed qvod cvm svi de iste teneo o qvi si et hic dimitto omnino non genero vnvs haectvs itaqve in omnis genero qvi sacramentvm retineo vnde possvm talis aliqvis vbicvmqve genero qvamvis non omnis qvi genero ad is pertineo vnitas qvi vsqve in finis persevero salvo qvintvs neqve enim hic solvm ad is non pertineo qvi separatio apertvs sacrilegivm manifestvs svm sed etiam ille qvi in is vnitas corporaliter misceo per vita malvs separo qvintvs etenim simon magvs per baptimma ipse pario  qvi tamen dico svm qvi non habeo pars in hereditas christvs pes nvmqvid is bapio nvmqvid evangelivm nvmqvid sacramentvm desvm sed qvia is caritas desvm frvstra natvs svm et is expedio fortasse non nascor vnvs nvmqvid non svm nascor qvi apostolvs dico tamqvam parvvlvs in christvs lac vos poto do non esca is tamen ab sacrilegivm schisma revoco in qvi ideo irrvo qvia carnalis svm qvasi parvvlvs inqvio in christvs lac vos poto do non esca  nondvm enim possvm vnvs sed nec adhvc qvidem possvm o adhvc enim svm carnalis qvinqvaginta cvm enim svm inter vos aemvlatio et contentio nonne carnalis svm et secvndvm homo ambvlo cvm enim qvis dico ego qvidem svm pavlvs alivs avtem ego apollo nonne homo svm de hic enim svpra dico obsecro avtem vos frater per nomen dominvs noster iesvs christvs vt is ipse dico omnis et non svm in vos schisma sitis avtem perfectvs in idem sensvs et in idem scientia vnvs nvntio svm ego de vos frater mevs ab hic qvi svm cloes qvia contentio svm in vos qvintvs hic avtem dico qvia vnvsqvisqve vos dico ego qvidem svm pavlvs ego avtem apollo ego vero cefa ego avtem christvs vnvs divido svm christvs nvmqvid pavlvs pro vos crvcificvs svm avt in nomen pavlvs baptipo svm iste ergo si in hic obstinatio et perversitas remaneo certe qvidem natvs svm nec tamen ad ipse ecclesia de qvi natvs svm per pax atqve vnitas vincvlvm pertineo qvintvs ergvs ipse genero per vtervs svvs et per vtervs ancilla ex idem sacramentvm tamqvam ex vir svvs semen qvintvs non enim frvstra dico apostolvs omnis ille in figvra svm gero vnvs sed qvi svperbio et legitimvs mater non adivngo similis svm hismaeelvs de qvi dico svm eicio ancilla et filivs is o non enim heres svm filivs ancilla cvm filivs mevs isaac vnvs qvi avtem pacifice diligo legitimvs pater svvs conivx qvi legitimvs ivs regenero svm similis svm filivs iacobes qvamvis de ancilla natvs sed tamen idem hereditas svmo qvinqvaginta qvi avtem de vtervs ipse mater intvs in vnitas nascor negligo gratia qvi accipio similis svm esav filivs isaac qvi reprobo svm devs attestor et dico iacor diligo esavs avtem odivm habeo cvm ambo ex vnvs concvbitvs concipio ex vnvs vtervs nascor svm qvintvs qvaero etiam vtrvm peccatvm dimitto per baptis in pars donativs vt si dico dimitto respondeo ergo svm illic spiritvs sanctvs qvia cvm insvfflo dominvs do svm discipvlvs tvnc seqvor svm et aio baptizate gens in nomen pater et filivs et spiritvs sanctvs  si qvi dimitto peccatvm dimitto is  si qvis teneo teneo vnvs et si ita svm inqvio commvnio noster svm ecclesivs christvs qvintvs non enim praeter ecclesia dimissio peccatvm spiritvs sanctvs operor qvintvs et si noster commvnio svm ecclesivs christvs non svm ecclesivs christvs vester commvnio vnvs vnvs svm enim qvicvmqve ille svm de qvi dictvm svm vnvs svm colvmba mevs vnvs svm mater svvs nec possvm ecclesia tot svm qvot schisma qvintvs si avtem dico non ibi dimitto peccatvm ergo inqvio non svm illic vervs baptimvs et propterea qvi ab nos svscipio vos baptizo debeo o qvi qvia non facio in ecclesivm christvs vos non svm fateor vnvs his ita resisto secvndvm scriptvra is interrogo vt qvi ab nos qvaero svi ipse respondeo pentvm qvaero enim vt dico vtrvm dimitto peccatvm vbi caritas non svm pentvm peccatvm enim tenebrae anima svm qvinqvaginta avdio iohannis qvippe dico qvi odi frater svvs in tenebrae svm vsqve adhvc o nvllvs avtem schisma facio si fraternvs odivm non excaeco qvinqvaginta si ergo dico non ibi dimitto peccatvm qvomodo renascor qvi apvd is baptilor qvis svm enim renascor per baptismvm nisi ab vetvstas renovo qvomodo avtem renovo ab vetvstas qvi peccatvm praeterita non dimitto qvod si renascor non svm nec christvs indvo vnvs ex qvi conficio vt denvo baplipo video qvia dico apostolvs qvotqvot enim in christvs baptizo svm christvs indvo  qvi ille si non indvo nec in christvs baptizo habeo svm vnvs porro qvia in christvs dico baptizatvs fateor is christvs indvo o et si hic fateor regenero fateor qvintvs qvi si ita svm et peccatvm dimitto svm qvinqvaginta qvomodo ergo dico iohannes qvi odi frater svvs in tenebrae maneo vsqve adhvc si iam facio svm remissio peccatvm an non svm in schisma odivm fraternvs qvis hic dico cvm et origo et pertinacia schisma nvllvs svm alivs nisi odivm frater hancvs ille qvaestio solvo svi video cvm dico non svm ergo in schisma remissio peccatvm et ideo nec regeneratio novvs homo et propterea nec baptismvs christvs vnvs nos avtem qvia fateor ibi svm baptismvs christvs hic is qvaestio solvo propono magvs ille simo one vtrvm vero christvs baptismas tingo svm vnvs respondeo ita ve qvia sanctvs scriptvra avctoritas cogo qvinqvaginta qvaero ergo vtrvm fateor is dimitto peccatvm qvintvs profecto fateor qvadrantal item qvaero cvr is dico petrvs non is habeo pars in sors sanctvs vnvs qvia inqvio postea pecco pecvnia volens emo donvm devs qvi venditor apostolvs credo qvintvs qvis si ad ipse baptis fingo accedo dimitto svm is peccatvm an non svm dimitto eligo qvi volo o vterlibet eligo svfficio nos vnvs si dimitto dico qvomodo ergo spiritvs sanctvs disciplina effvgio fictvs si in iste fictvs operor svm peccatvm remissio si dico non svm dimitto qvaero si postea fictio svvs cor concvtio et vervs dolor fateor denvo baplipo ivdico qvi si demens svm dico fateor vero baptismo christvs baptizo possvm homo et tamen cor is in malitia vel sacrilegivm persevero peccatvm abolitio non sino fio atqve ita intelligo in commvnio ab ecclesivs separo possvm homo baptizo vbi christes baptior idem sacramentvm celebratio do et svmo qvi tamen tvm prosvm ad remissio peccatvm cvm qvisqve reconcilio vnitas sacrilegivm dissensio exvo qvi is peccatvm teneo et dimitto non sino vnvs sicvt enim in ille qvi fictvs accedo fio vt non denvo baptipo sed ipse pivs correctio et verax confessio pvrgo qvi non possvm sine baptimmvm sed vt qvi ante do svm tvnc valeo incipio ad salvs cvm ille fictio verax confessio recedo sic etiam iste qvi baptisma christvs qvi non amitto qvi svi separo inimicvs caritas et pax christvs in aliqvis haereo avt schisma accipio qvi sacrilegvs scelvs peccatvm is non dimitto cvm svi corrigo et ad ecclesia societas vnitas qvovs venio non itervm baplipo svm qvia ipse reconciliatio ac pax praesto vt ad remissio peccatvm is in vnitas iam prosvm incipio sacramentvm qvi accipio in schisma prosvm non possvm vnvs sivs avtem dico in ille qvi fingo accedo per sanctvs vis tantvs sacramentvm dimitto qvidem ille svm peccatvm in ipse tempvs pvnctvm sed per fictio ipse redeo continvo vt spiritvs sanctvs et assvm baptizo vt peccatvm recedo et perseverantia fictio fvgio vt redeo vt et ille vervs svm qvotqvot in christvs baptipo svm christvs indvo et ille sanctvs enim spiritvs disciplina effvgio fictvs is svm vt et indvo is christvs sanctitas baptis et exvo is christvs pernicies fictio sicvt fio cvm qvisqve ab tenebrae per lvx transeo ad tenebrae o ocvlvs qvidem is in tenebrae perpetvo dirigo sed non possvm is lvx nisi perfvndo transeo si hic ergo dico hic etiam in is intelligo fio qvi extra ecclesia commvnio sed tamen baptismas ecclesia baptizo pentvm qvi vbicvmqve svm sanctvs svm per svi ipse et ideo non svm is qvi svi separo sed is vnde svi separo qvintvs valeo tamen apvd is hactenvs vt per is lvx transeo ad dissensio svvs tenebrae continvo redeo peccatvm qvi baptisma sanctitas in ille tempvs pvnctvm dimitto tamqvam redeo obscvritas qvi lvx in transitvs excvtio qvadranta nam redeo dimitto peccatvm vbi fraternvs caritas non svm aperte dominvs in evangelivm doceo de ille servvs  qvintvs qvi cvm invenio debitor decem mille talentvm deprecor omnis dimitto o ille avtem conservvs svvs qvi is debeo centvm denarivs cvm miseror non svm ivbeo is dominvs reddo qvi is dimitto qvintvs tempvs ergo qvi accipio indvlgentia per baptis tamqvam tempvs svm reddo ratio vt omnis debeo qvi invenio svm dimitto qvintvs non tamen ille servvs postea do conservvs svvs mvtvvs pecvnia  qvi cvm ille non possvm reddo non is misertvs svm sed iam is debeo conservvs is cvm ipse ratio dominvs svvs reddo tantvs nvmervs debitvm solvo o nec dimitto conservvs svvs qvi is debeo et sic accedo vt is dimitto dominvs pes hic indico verbvm conservvs dico patientia habeo in ego et reddo tv vnvs alioqvi dico iam ego hic dimitto o cvr itervm repeto hic et ipse dominvs verbvm manifeste aperio vnvs aio enim egressvs avtem servvs ille invenio vnvs de conserva svvs qvi debeo is centvm denarivs qvintvs non dico qvi debeo iam centvm denarivs dimitto o si enim dimitto non is debeo vnvs qvia ergo dico debeo is manifestvs svm qvi non dimitto pes et bonvs qvidem svm atqve hic potivs congrvo tanto debitor reddo ratio et exspecto misericordia dominvs svvs vt prior ipse conservvs dimitto qvi is debeo et sic ad ratio reddo vbi misericordia dominvs imploro svm accedo qvadrantal nec tamen ille qvi nondvm conservvs dimitto impedio dominvs is qvominvs in ille tempvs accipio ratio dimitto is omnis qvi debeo vnvs sed qvis prosvm qvando qvidem in capvt is propter odivm perseverantia rvrsvs omnis continvo replico svm sic non impedio baptis gratia qvominvs omnis peccatvm dimitto etiam si odivm fraternvs in is qvi dimitto animvs persevero vnvs solvo enim hesternvs dies et qvisqvis svpra svm solvo etiam ipse hora momentvm qvovs ante baptis et in baptimmvm o deinceps avtem continvo revs svm incipio non solvm conseqvens sed etiam praeteritvs dies hora momentvm redeo omnis qvi dimitto svm qvintvs et saepe iste contingo in ecclesivs qvintvs namis plervmqve fio vt homo habeo inimicvs qvi iniqve odi qvamqvam etiam inimicvs diligo ivbeo et oro pro is o svbitvs avtem pericvlvm mors incipio pertvrbo et posco baptis qvi tantvs festinatio accipio vt necessarivs interrogatio pavci verbvm vix pericvlvm tempvs admitto qvanto parvm sermo longvs vt ille odivm cor pello etiam si baptizon svm cognosco vnvs certe iste non solvm apvd nos sed etiam apvd ille evenio non cesso vnvs qvis ergo dico dimitto peccatvm hic homo an non dimitto prorsvs qvi volo eligo vnvs si enim dimitto continvo redeo evangelivm loqvor veritas clamo vnvs sive ergo dimitto sive non dimitto necessarivs svm postea medicina nec tamen si vivo atqve is corrigo svm disco atqve corrigo denvo baptilo sive apvd ille sive apvd nos vnvs sic et ille qvi schismaticvs vel haereticvs non aliter habeo nec aliter ago qvam vervs ecclesivs cvm ad nos venio non emendo sed potivs approbo vnvs in qvi enim non dissentio ab nos in is non diivngo ab nos qvintvs sed tamen qvia nihil is prosvm vnvs qvamdiv schismaticvs et haereticvs svm propter alivs in qvi ab veritas dissentio et propter ipse separatio immanis scelvs sive permaneo in is peccatvm sive continvo dimitto redeo vt ad salvs pax atqve caritas venio adhortor non solvm vt aliqvis habeo qvi non habeo sed vt is etiam ille prosvm incipio qvi habeo qvintvs frvstra ergo nos dico si baptis nos accepto qvis parvm habeo qvod nos de vester commvnio consvlo pvto respondeo enim non baptis vester accepto qvia non svm bapti ille schimmaticvs vel haereticvs sed devs et ecclesia vbicvmqve svm invenio et qvicvmqve transfero o vester avtem non svm nisi qvi pra qvie sentio et sacrilege ago et impie separo vnvs nam si cetera omnis vervs vel habeo vel sentio et in idem tamen separatio dvro adversvs vincvlvm pax fraternvs adversvs vnitas omnis frater qvi totvs terra orbis sicvt promissvm svm ita exhibeo qvi omnis cavsa et cor nvllvs modvs vmqvam nosco ac discvtio possvm vt merito damno  qvi non possvm propterea res svm qvia ivdex ecclesiasticvs potivs qvam litigator credo hic solvm parvm habeo qvi parvm habeo qvi caritas non habeo vnvs iam qvis opvs svm vt nos retexo vos ipse in apostolvm inspicio qvantvm svm qvi parvm habeo vnvs qvis avtem intersvm qvi caritas non habeo vtrvm foras avolo aliqvis ventvs temtatio avfero an intvs de messis dominicvs non recedo in vltimvs ventilatio separo et tamen etiam talis si iam semel per baptismvm natvs svm itervm is nascor non oportet vnvs ecclesivs qvippe omnis per baptismvm pario sive apvd svi is svm ex vtervs svvs sive extra svi de semen vir svvs vnvs sed et esavs de vxor nascor propter fraternvs discordia separatvs svm ab popvlvs devs et aser per vxor qvidem potestas sed ex ancilla nascor propter fraternvs concordia terra promissio accipio qvintvs vnde et hismagelis vt separo ab popvlvs devs non obsvm mater ancilla sed obsvm fraternvs discordia o et non prosvm potestas vxor qvi magis filivs svm qvia per ipse ivs conivgalis et ancilla semino svm et ex ancilla svscipio o sicvt apvd iste ecclesia ivs qvi svm in baptimmvm nascor qvicvmqve nascor qvinqvaginta sed si concordo cvm frater per vnitas pax ad terra venio promissio non de maternvs vtervs rvrsvs eicio sed in paternvs semen cognosco qvinqvaginta si avtem in discordia persevero ad hismaeelis fvnicvlvs pertineo qvintvs prior avtem svm hismahel et postea isaac et prior esavs postervs avtem iacob non qvia prior  pes pario haereo qvam ecclesivs avt ipse ecclesivs privs carnalis vel animalis et postea spiritalis sed qvia in ipse sors mortalitas noster ex qvi de ada nascor non svm privs qvi spiritalis sed qvi animalis postea qvi spiritalis vnvs ex ipse avtem animal sensvs qvia homo animal non percipio qvi svm spiritvs devs omnis dissensio et hic schisma genero qvintvs in qvi sensvs persevero apostolvs dico ad vetvs testamentvm pertineo is svm ad terrenvs promissvm cvpiditas in qvi qvidem spiritalis figvro sed animal homo non percipio qvi svm spiritvs devs qvintvs qvicvmqve ergo tempvs talis homo svm coepio in hic vita vt iam divina pro saecvlvm distribvtio sacramentvm imbvo adhvc tamen carnaliter sapio et carnalis de devs sive in hic vita sive post hic vita spero atqve desidero animalis svm qvintvs ecclesivs vero qvi svm popvlvs devs etiam in iste vita peregrinatio antiqvvs res svm in alivs homo habeo animalis portio in alivs avtem spiritalis pes ad animal pertineo vetvs testamentvm ad spiritalis novvs qvadrantal sed primvs tempvs vterqve occvltvs svm ab ada vsqve ad mosvs ne vnvs ab mosvs avtem manifestatvs svm vetvs et in is ipse occvlto novvs qvia occvlte significo qvintvs postea vero qvam in caro dominvs venio revelatvs svm novvs o vetvs avtem sacramentvm cesso sed concvpisco talis non cesso qvintvs in ille enim svm qvi apostolvs iam per sacramentvm nosco testamentvm natvs adhvc tamen dico animal non possvm percipio qvi svm spiritvs devs qvintvs sicvt enim in sacramentvm vetvs testamentvm vivo qvidam spiritalis ad novvs scilicet testamentvm qvi tvnc occvlto occvlte pertineo sic et nvnc in sacramentvm novvs testamentvm qvi iam revelatvs svm pleriqve vivo animalis qvadrantal qvi proficio si nolo ad percipio qvi svm spiritvs devs qvo is hortor sermo apostolicvs ad vetvs testamentvm pertineo o si avtem proficio et anteqvam capio ipse profectvs et accessvs ad novvs pertineo et si privsqvam spiritalis fio ex hic vita rapio cvstodio per sacramentvm sanctitas in terra vivo compvto vbi svm spes noster et portio dominvs vnvs nec invenio qvis vervs intelligo in is qvi scribo svm imperfectvs mevs video ocvlvs tvvs qvando qvidem seqvor et in liber tvvs omnis scribo qvintvs eo qvaes avtem pario abel et enochis et novs et abraha ipse pario et mosvs ne et propheta tempvs postervs ante dominvs adventvs o et qvi iste ipse et apostolos et martyres noster et omnis bonvs christianvs qvadrantal omnis enim diversvs qvidem tempvs nascor appareo sed societas vnvs popvlvs contineo et idem civitas civis labor hic peregrinatio experior svm et qvidam is nvnc experior et vsqve in finis ceteri experior vnvs item qvi pario caivs one et cham et hismaheles et esavs idem ipse pario et datha ne et alivs in idem popvlvs similis o et qvi iste idem ipse et lvdo psevdoapo et simon magvs et ceteri vsqve ad hic tempvs psevdochrianvs in affectio animal pertinaciter obdvro sive in vnitas permisceo svm sive apertvs praecisio dissentio qvintvs sedes cvm talis ab spiritalis evangelizo et sacramentvm imbvo tamqvam per svi ipse rebeccvs is pario sicvt esavs o cvm avtem per ille qvi non caste annvntio evangelivm talis in devs popvlvs genero sarra qvidem sed per agar qvintvs item bonvs spiritalis qvando evangelis vel baptizo carnalis genero lia qvidem vel rachel ivs conivgalis is sed per ancilla vtervs pario qvadrantal cvm vero per spiritalis in evangelivm genero bonvs fidelis qvi vel evado in spiritalis aetas affectvs vel eo tendo non desisto vel ideo non facio qvia non possvm sicvt ex vtervs sarra isaacvs vel rebeccvs iacobes in nonvs vita et nonvs testamentvm nascor qvintvs itaqve sive intvs versor video sive aperte foris svm qvod caro svm carvs svm  sive in area in svvs sterilitas persevero sive occasio temtatio tamqvam ventvs extra tollo qvi palea svm palea svm et semper ab ille ecclesia qvi sine macvla et rvga svm vnitas divido svm etiam qvi congregatio sanctvs in carnalis obdvratio misceo qvintvs de nvllvs tamen despero svm sive qvi intvs talis appareo sive qvi foris manifeste adversor vnvs spiritalis avtem sive ad hic ipse pivs stvdivm proficio non eo foras qvia et cvm aliqvis vel perversitas vel necessitas homo video expello ibi magis probo qvam intvs permaneo cvm adversvs ecclesia nvllatenvs erigo sed in solidvs vnitas petra fortis caritas robvr radico pentvm ad hic enim pertineo qvi in ille abrahae sacrificivm dico avis avtem non divido qvintvs extanto beatvs martyrvs cyprianvs in is littera docvmentvm vt ad ille iam venia de qvi svi avctoritas iste carnaliter blandior cvm is caritas spiritaliter perimo qvintvs nam ille tempvs anteqvam plenarivs concilivm sententia qvis in hic res seqvor svm totvs ecclesia consensio confirmo visvs svm is cvm ferme octoginta coepiscops svvs africanvs ecclesia homo qvi extra ecclesia catholicvs commvnio baptizo svm oportet ad ecclesia venio denvo baptizo qvod non recte fio tantvs vir nimirvm propterea dominvs non aperio vt is pivs et hvmilitas et caritas in cvstodio salvbriter ecclesia pax patesco qvinqvaginta parvm ergo ille penetro vt cerno secretvm abdo sacramentvm o sed si scio omnis sacramentvm caritas avtem non habeo nihil svm vnvs cvm avtem parvm ille perspicio hic tamen hvmiliter fideliter fortiter cvstodio ad martyrivs corona mereo pervenio vt si qvis in is lvcidvs mens ex hvmanvs condicio nebvla irrepo gloriosvs serenitas fvlgens sangvis fvgo qvintvs non enim frvstra ipse dominvs iesvs christvs cvm svi ipse dico vitis svvs avtem tamqvam in vitis sarmentvm praecido dico is et de vitis avfero tamqvam invtilis sarmentvm qvi frvctvs non do qvintvs qvis svm avtem frvctvs nisi nonvs ille fetvs de qvi item dico mandatvm novvs do vos vt vos invicem diligo ipse svm ille caritas sine qvi cetera nihil prosvm pentvm dico et apostolvs frvctvs avtem spiritvs svm caritas gavdivm pax longanimitas benignitas bonitas fides mansvetvdo continentia vnvs qvi  pentvm omnis incipio ab caritas et per cetervs ivnctvra qvasi boter mirabilis facio vnvs nec tamen frvstra idem dominvs addo qvi avtem sarmentvm in ego do frvctvs pvrgo ille pater mevs vt magnvs frvctvs affero nisi qvia et ipse qvi frvctvs praevaleo caritas possvm tamen aliqvis habeo pvrgo qvi incvltvs agricola non relinqvo vnvs qvi ergo ille vir sanctvs de baptimmvm aliter sentio qvi svi res habeo qvi postea pertracto et diligens consideratio firmo svm in catholicvs vnitas permaneo et caritas vbertas compenso svm et passio falx pvrgo vnvs sicvt ergo et intvs qvi diabolvm svm argvo svm sic et foris qvi christvs svm agnosco svm vnvs an extra vnitas ecclesia non habeo svvs christvs et in vnitas ecclesia habeo svvs diabolvs hic fortasse de homo dico possvm vt sic extra ecclesia commvnio non habeo devs aliqvis svvs qvintvs sicvt inter angelvs sanctvs non habeo diabolvs aliqvis svvs ecclesia vero hic qvi adhvc caro mortalitas porto qvamdiv peregrinor ab dominvs licet diabolvm misceo zisania hic svm malvs homo et permitto svm propter ipse ecclesia peregrinatio vt reqvies ille patria qvi sanctvs angelvm perfrvor desidero ardenter qvintvs de sacramentvm avtem hic dico non possvm vnvs sicvt enim is possvm habeo atqve tracto non ad salvs sed ad pernicies svvs in qvi ignis destinatvm svm interior scazania sic et exter zizania qvi ab interior recedo accipio qvia recedo non amitto pentvm qvi sine dvbivm manifesto cvm redeo non restitvo qvando forte aliqvis ex is ipse qvi recedo revertor qvintvs nec qvisqvam dico qvis enim frvmentvm habeo zisania si enim hic ita svm et intvs et foris ad hic dvmtaxat par condicio svm vnvs neqve enim in sczania exter non invenio granvm frvmentvm et in interiora invenio qvintvs de sacramentvm avtem cvm qvaero non vtrvm habeo aliqvis frvmentvm zisania qvaero sed vtrvm habeo aliqvis caelvm vnvs et exter enim et interior zizania cvm ipse triticvm svm plvvia commvnis qvi caelestis et dvlcis svm ipse etiam si ex is zizania steriliter cresco sic et evangelix christvs sacramentvm divinvs et svvs qvis svm neqve propter is sterilitas qvi etiam foris complvo improbo pes ia satis ostendo ad baptismvm qvi verbvm evangelix consecro non pertineo qvisqvam vel do vel accipio error sive de pater sive de filivs sive de spiritvs sanctvs aliter sentio qvam doctrina caelestis insinvo qvintvs mvlti enim carnalis et animalis etiam intvs baptizor cvm aperte dico apostolvs animal avtem homo non percipio is qvi svm spiritvs devs et percipio iam baptimmvm dico is adhvc animalis svm vnvs secvndvm avtem sensvs carnalis non possvm nisi carnaliter de devs sapio anima corporevs sensvs deditvs qvintvs vnde mvltvs post baptis proficio et magis qvi infans vel pver baptino svm qvanto magis is intellectvs sereno et illvmino dvm interior homo renovo de dies in dies prior svvs opinio qvi de devs habeo cvm svvs phantasma lvdifico irrideo et detestor atqve confiteor abicio qvintvs nec tamen ideo non accipio baptis existimo avt talis baptis accipio dico qvalis svm error ipse sed in is et sacramentvm integritas honoro et mens vanitas emendo etiam si confirmo et fortasse mvltvs contentio defendo calleo doe qvapropter etiam haereticvs qvi perspicve foris svm baptis illic evangelicvm accipio non talis vtiqve baptis accipio qvalis error caeco vnvs et propterea si respicio video relinqvo svm qvi male teneo non simvl is relinqvo svm et bonvm qvi accipio nec qvia error ille improbo svm propterea in ille christvs baptimvs exsvfflo svm vnvs iam enim ex hic qvi intvs contingo de devs falsvs opinor baptizo satis elvceo discerno svm sacramentvm veritas ab male credo error qvamvis vterqve in homo vnvs valeo invenio o et ideo cvm etiam foris in error aliqvis constitvo vero tamen sacramentvm svm baptizatvs cvm ecclesia reddo vnitas sicvt falsvs fides vervs svccedo non sic possvm etiam vero baptismvs vervs baptior svccedo qvi qvidem ipse svi svccedo non possvm qvia nec decedo possvm vnvs ad hic ergo haereticvs ad catholicvs venio vt qvi is malvm svm corrigo non qvi devs bonvm svm repeto vnvs dicitvs aliqvis nihilne ergo intersvm si dvo in error par atqve malitia constitvo svm nec vita et cor mvto alivs is foris alivs intvs baptileo fateor intersvm qvintvs ille enim malvs svm qvi etiam foris baptilor non is qvi baptilor sed is qvi foris svm pes svm etiam ipse divisio nec nvllvs nec parvvs malvm si tamen ille qvi intvs baptilo non propter aliqvis terrenvs avt temporalis commodvm intvs svm nolo sed qvod vnitas ecclesia totvs orbis diffvndo schisma concisio praefero o alioqvi etiam ipse inter ille qvi foris svm depvto svm pes constitvo ergo dvo aliqvis iste modvs vnvs is verbvm gratia is sentio de christvs qvod fotinvs opinor svm et in is haereo baptizor extra ecclesia catholicvs vnitas o alivs vero hic idem sentio sed in catholicvs baptizo existimo ipse svm catholicvs fides iste nondvm haereticvs dico nisi manifestatvs svi doctrina catholicvs fides resisto malo et ille qvi teneo eligo o qvi anteqvam fio manifestvs svm ille qvi foris svm svm malvs vnvs itaqve in hic solvs falsvs opinio in ille avtem etiam ipse divisio corrigo svm sed in nevter ipse sacramentvm veritas repeto pes qvod si qvisqvam idem sentio qvi ille et svm haereo nosco ab vnitas catholicvs separo vbi hic doceo et disco sed aliqvis saecvlaris emolvmentvm cavsa in catholicvs vnitas baptizo volo vel in is baptizatvs propter hic inde exeo nolo non solvm separatvs habeo svm vervm etiam tanto sceleratvs qvanto magis error haereo et divisio vnitas fallacia simvlatio adivngo vnvs qvam ob res qvisqve homo pravitas qvanto pericvlosvs svm et tortvosvs tanto instans et operosvs corrigo svm vnvs nec ideo tamen si qvis habeo integer praesertim non svvs sed devs propter is pravitas vel nvllvs pvto svm vel idem modvs vitvpero vel is pravitas tribvo ac non ille largitatvs qvi etiam fornico ab svi anima et eo post amator svvs do panis svvs et vinvm svvs et olevm svvs et alivs vel alimentvm vel ornamentvm qvi nec ab svi ipse nec ab is amator is svm sed ab ille qvi is miserans vbiqve volo ad qvi redeo admoneo vnvs constitvo ergo aliqvis castvs continens non avarvs non idola servio hospitalis indigens ministro non qvisqvam inimicvs non contentiosvs patiens qvietvs nvllvs aemvlor nvllvs invideo sobrivs frvgalis haereticvs nvllvs vtiqve dvbivs svm propter hic solvs qvi haereticvs svm regnvm devs non possideo vnvs constitvo alivs fornicator immvndvs lvxvriosvs avarvs vel etiam apertvs idola deditvs veneficvs discordiosvs contentiosvs aemvlvs animosvs seditiosvs invidvs ebriosvs comisator catholicvs nvmqvid propter hic solvs qvi catholicvs svm regnvm devs possideo ago talis de qvi sic conclvdo apostolvs qvi praedico vos sicvt praedico qvoniam qvi talis ago regnvm devs non possideo si hic dico nos ipse sedvco vnvs nam sermo devs non nos sedvco qvi nec taceo nec parco nec vllvs advlatio nos decipio vnvs ideo qvippe et alibi dico hic avtem scio cognosco qvoniam omnis fornicator avt immvndvs avt avarvs qvi svm idolvs servitvs non habeo hereditas in regnvm christvs et devs o nemo vos sedvco inanis verbvm qvintvs non svm ergo qvi de sermo devs conqveror qvinqvaginta dico omnino et aperte ac libere dico is qvi male vivo ad regnvm devs non pertineo vnvs his igitvr omnis vitivm circvmseptvs catholicvs non advlo nec is qvia christianvs catholicvs svm impvnitas qvi scriptvra divinvs non promitto promitto avdeo o nec si aliqvis vnvs habeo ex hic qvi dictvm svm debeo is societas svpernvs ille patria polliceor qvintvs ad corinthivs enim singvlvs envmero in qvi singvlvs svbavdio qvod regnvm devs non possideo nolo inqvio erro neqve fornicator neqve idola servio neqve advlter neqve mollis neqve mascvlvs concvbitor neqve fvr neqve avarvs neqve ebriosvs neqve maledicvs neqve rapax regnvm devs possideo vnvs non aio qvi hic omnis vitivm simvl habeo regnvm devs non possideo sed neqve ille neqve ille vt singvlvs hic svbavdio qvi nvllvs is regnvm devs possideo qvintvs sicvt ergo haereticvs regnvm devs non possideo sic avarvs regnvm devs non possideo vnvs nec dvbito svm qvidem poena ipse qvi crvcio qvi regnvm devs non possideo pro diversitas crimen svm diversvs et alivs alias acer vt in ipse ignis aeternvs pro dispar pondvs peccatvm svm dispar tormentvm poena qvintvs neqve enim frvstra ipse dominvs aio tolerabilis svm sodom qvam vos in dies ivdicivm vnvs svm etiam qvidam ex is nvmervs qvi adhvc neqviter vivo avt etiam in haeresvs vel in gentilis svperstitio iaceo et tamen etiam illic dominvs nosco qvi svm is pentvm namqve in ille ineffabilis praescientia mvltvs qvi foris video intvs svm et mvltvs qvi intvs video foris svm qvintvs ex ille ergo omnis qvi vt ita dico intrinsecvs et in occvltvm intvs svm consto ille hortvs conclvdo fons signo pvtevs aqva vivvs paradiscor cvm frvctvs pomvm qvintvs hic mvnvs concedo divinitvs partim svm proprivs sicvt in hic tempvs infatigabilis caritas et in fvtvrvm vita aeternvs partim vero cvm malvm perversvs qvove commvnis sicvt omnis cetera in qvi svm et sacrosanctvs mysteria vnvs hinc itaqve iam facilis nos et expeditvs arca ille qvi novs fabricator et gvbernator svm consideratio propono qvintvs aio enim petrvs in arca novs pavci is svm octo anima homo salvvs facio svm per aqva ce qvi et vos similis forma baptismvs salvvs facio non caro depositio sordes sed conscientia bonvs interrogatio vnvs qvapropter sicvt appareo homo in vnitas catholicvs baptipo qvi saecvlvm verbvm sol et non factvm renvntio qvomodo pertineo ad hic arca mysterivm in qvi non svm conscientia bonvs interrogatio avt qvomodo salvvs fio per aqva qvi sanctvs baptismas male vtor cvm video svm intvs vsqve in finis vita in flagitiosvs et perditvs mos persevero avt qvomodo non svm per aqva salvatvs qvi in praeteritvm cvm is baptismas qvi in haereo accipio in ecclesia simpliciter admitto cyprianvs ipse commemoro idem qvippe arca vnitas is salvvs facio in qvi nemo nisi per aqva salvatvs svm vnvs ipse enim dico potens svm dominvs misericordia svvs indvlgentia do et is qvi ad ecclesia simpliciter admitto in ecclesia dormio ab ecclesia svvs mvnvs non separo pes si non per aqva qvomodo in arca si non in arca qvomodo in ecclesia si avtem in ecclesivs vtiqve in arca o et si in arca vtiqve per aqva vnvs possvm ergo fio et vt qvidam foris baptipo per devs praescientia vere intvs baptizo depvto qvia illic is incipio aqva prosvm ad salvs o neqve enim aliter dico possvm salvvs factvm in arca qvintvs nisi per aqva qvintvs et rvrsvs qvidam qvi video intvs baptipo per idem praescientia devs foris baptipo vere depvto o male qvippe vtor baptimmvm per aqva morior qvi nvllvs tvnc accido nisi qvi praeter arca svm vnvs certe manifestvs svm is qvi dico in ecclesivs intvs et foris in cor non in corpvs cogito qvando qvidem omnis qvi cor svm in arca vnitas per idem aqva salvvs fio per qvi omnis qvi cor svm foris sive etiam corpvs foris svm sive non svm tamqvam vnitas adversarivs morior qvinqvaginta sicvt ergo non alivs sed idem aqva et in arca pono salvvs facio et extra area pono interimo sic non alio sed idem baptismvs et bonvs et catholicvs salvvs fio et malvm catholicvs vel haereticvs pereo qvintvs vnvs vnvs etia cor tardvs qvantvm existimo intelligo bapio mvm christvs nvllvs perversitas homo sive do sive accipio possvm violo qvintvs nec ob alivs ille tempvs qvando iste qvaestio contra vtilis consvetvdo dispvtatio salvvs caritas atqve vnitas alterco discvtio visvs svm qvidam etiam egregivs vir antistes christvs inter qvi praecipve beatvs cyprianvs cor rectitvdo apvd haereticvs non invenio ipse qvoqve sacramentvm illic non svm pvto vnvs sed converto ocvlvs ad interior palea mvltitvdo cvm et hic qvi in ipse vnitas perversvs svm et perdite vivo appareo remissio peccatvm nec do possvm nec habeo qvia non malignvs sed bonvs filivs dictvm svm si qvis dimitto peccatvm dimitto is o si qvi teneo teneo habeo tamen et do et accipio baptismvs qvisqvam nvnc in ecclesivm qvantvslibet proficio petrivs apostolatvs confero svm vnvs qvapropter reddo debeo reverentia dignvs qvovs honor qvantvm valeo persolvo pacifico episcopvs et gloriosvs ex apostolvm pavlvs salvto doctrina per vniversvs ecclesia retineo atqve servo vnvs dispvtans ergo de sententia cyprianvs mvltvm infra meritvm cyprianvs dico sacramentvm baptis et boni et mali possvm habeo possvm do possvm accipio et boni qvidem vtiliter ac salvbriter malvs avtem perniciose atqve poenaliter cvm ille tamen in vterqve svm aeqvaliter integer atqve nihil intersvm ad is aeqvalis in omnis integritas qvanto malvs is habeo inter mali sicvt nihil intersvm qvanto bonvs is habeo inter boni qvintvs ac per hic nihil etiam intersvm qvanto malvs is trado sicvt nihil intersvm qvanto bonvs o atqve ita nihil intersvm qvanto malvs is accipio sicvt nihil intersvm qvanto bonvs vnvs ille enim per svi ipse et in is qvi non aeqvaliter ivstvs svm et in is qvi non aeqvaliter iniqvvs svm aeqvaliter sanctvs svm pes sed vt dico svm nihil intersvm ad baptis sanctitas qvantvs qvisqve malvs is habeo et qvanto malvs trado vnvs possvm tamen trado separatvs sicvt possvm habeo separatvs o sed qvam perniciose trado ille avtem qvi trado possvm salvbriter accipio si ipse non separatvs accipio sicvt pleriqve accido vt catholicvs animvs et cor ab vnitas pax non alieno aliqvis necessitas mors vrgvo in aliqvis haereticvs irrvo et ab is christvs baptismvs sine ille perversitas percipio et sine defvnctvs sive libero neqvaqvam apvd is remaneo ad qvi nvmqvam cor transeo qvinqvaginta si avtem etiam ipse separatvs accipio tanto perniciose accipio qvanto magis bonvm svm qvi non bene accipio et tanto magis valeo ad exitivm separatvs qvanto magis possvm ad salvs valeo conivngo vnvs et ideo si ab ille perversitas corrigo et ab separatio converto venio ad catholicvs pax svb idem baptismas qvi accipio is peccatvm dimitto propter vincvlvm caritas svb qvi baptisma peccatvm is teneo propter sacrilegivm divisio qvia ille et in homo ivstvs et in homo inivstvs semper sanctvs svm qvi neqve aliqvis aeqvitas avgeo neqve aliqvis iniqvitas minvo vnvs qvi cvm ita svm qvis hic perspicvvs veritas obsvm qvod mvlti coepiscopvs cyprianvs in ille sententia consentio svvs qvivis in idem conveniens proprivs profero nisi vt magis magis qvovs ille vir erga vnitas christvs caritas innotesco si enim solvs iste sentio nvllvs consentiens remaneo video propterea refrigesco ab scelvs schisma qvia socivs non invenio error o tam mvltvs avtem svi consentio qvod cvm ceteri diversvs sentio in vnitas permaneo catholicvs vniversitas sanctvs vincvlvm non timor solitvdo sed pax amor servo pes svm ergo fio vt aliqvis malvs svm ethnicvs et tamen in is christvs sacramentvm non solvm svm sed etiam non svm malvs qvam in homo sanctvs et ivstvs vnvs etsi enim qvantvm in ille homo svm non is servo sed animvs et volvntas violo tamen qvantvm ad ipse attineo sacramentvm et cvm contemtor et repvdiator svvs integer inviolatvs qvivis permaneo vnvs nonne sodomitae ethicvs svm is svm gentilis malvs ergo svm ivdaei qvi dominvs dico tolerabilis svm sodomvs in dies ivdicivm qvam vos et qvi propheta dico ivstifico sodoma is svm in comparatio vester sodoma ivstificatvs svm vnvs nvmqvid tamen ideo sacramentvm divina qvi apvd ivdaei svm talis svm qvalis ipse svm qvi dominvs qvoqve ipse svscipio et ad is svm ethicvs qvando qvidem in malitia sodomitae praefero svm et tamen ille sacramentvm svm vterqve integer atqve divina qvintvs nam et ipse gentilis si qvis divinvs et rectvs in doctrina svvs habeo possvm non improbo sanctvs noster qvamvis ille per svvs svperstitio et idolatria et svperbia ceteri qvovs perditvs mos detestor svm et nisi corrigo divinvs ivdicivm pvnio qvintvs nam et pavlvs apostolvs apvd athenienses cvm de devs qvidam dico perhibeo testimonivm qvod qvidam is talis aliqvis dico qvi vtiqve si ad christvs venio agnosco in is non improbo et sanctvs cyprianvs talis adversvs idem ethnicvs vtor testis pes nam cvm de magis loqvor tamen inqvio praecipvvs ostanes et forma vervm devs nego conspicio possvm et angelvs vervs dico sedeo is assisto qvintvs in qvi et platon par ratio consentio et vnvs devs servo ceteri angelvs vel daemona dico o hermes qvoqve trimegistvs vnvs devs loqvor et is incomprehensibilis atqve inaestimabilis confiteor vnvs si ergo iste venio ad percipio christianvs salvs non is vtiqve dico hic malvm habeo vel falsvs habeo sed plane merito dico hic vos qvamvis integer et vervs nihil tamen prosvm nisi ad christvs gratia venio  vnvs si ergo in ipse ethnicvs possvm aliqvis divinvs invenio recte qvovs approbo qvamvis is salvs adhvc ab christvs praesto svm non oportet nos ita moveo etiam si malvs svm haereticvs vt qvi in is malvm ipse svm volo corrigo et qvi in is bonvm svm christvs nolo agnosco vnvs verivs vniversitas ecclesia catholicvs placeo vt haereticvs vel schismaticvs qvi iam christvs baptismvs illic vnde venio accipio in catholicvs commvnio cvm ille admitto ab error svvs corrigo in caritas radico atqve fvndo vt qvi attineo ad baptis sacramentvm non assvm qvi desvm sed prosvm qvi insvm pes et beatvs qvidem cyprianvs iam corpvs qvi corrvmpo non aggravo anima nec deprimo terrenvs inhabitatio sensvs mvltvs cogito serenvs perspicio veritas qvi mereo adipiscor per caritas vnvs adivvo itaqve nos oratio svvs in iste caro mortalitas tamqvam in caliginosvs nvbes laboro vt dono dominvs bonvm is qvantvm possvm imitor qvintvs si qvis avtem aliter sentio et qvidam frater collega qvove persvadeo qvod nvnc eo qvi diligo revelo iam cerno nos longe impar meritvm svvs ecclesia tamen catholicvs avctoritas qvi ipse egregivs et carvs membrvm svm pro noster infirmitas sector adversvs haereticvs atqve schismaticvs enodo qvi praecido ab vnitas qvi teneo et aresco caritas qvi vigeo et elabor ab hvmilitas qvi sto tanto ample improbo atqve condemno qvanto magis is nosco ad insidior perscrvtor volo qvi scribo et ad paciscor imitor nolo qvi facio vnvs sicvt ille qvi svi christianvs nazareni voco et mos ivdaicvs carnalis praepvtivm circvmcido nascor haereticvs ex ille error in qvi petrvs devio ab pavlvs revoco svm in hic adhvc vsqve persisto sicvt ergo ille petro in primatvs apostolor martyrivs gloria corono in svvs perversitas praecido ab ecclesivm remaneo sic iste cyprianvs per abvndantia caritas in sors sanctvs passio claritas svscipio svi ipse exsvl vnitas agnosco et contra vnitas patria pro svvs calvmnia civis vnitas oppono pentvm ostendo dominvs devs noster per pacificvs episcopvs cyprianvs et ille qvi is consentio qvantvm svm catholicvs vnitas diligo vt in is qvi aliter sapio donec devs is qvoqve revelo tolero potivs diversvs sentio qvam svi ab is nefarivs schisma separo qvadrantal vbi donatista prorsvs os clavdo etiam si de maximianes nihil dico vnvs si enim malvm boni in vnitas contamino nvllvs iam ecclesia qvi socio vel ipse cyprianvs invenio si avtem malvm boni in vnitas non macvlo nvllvs cavsa separatio sacrilegvs donatista propono qvintvs baptismvs avtem si habeo et trado alivs tam mvltvs qvi operor opvs caro qvalis qvi ago regnvm devs non possideo habeo ac trado et haereticvs qvi inter ille opvs envmero svm vnvs qvod qvia recedo non amitto et trado maneo possvm o sed tam infrvctvose atqve invtiliter talis talis qvam et ille ceteri par is in is qvod regnvm devs non possideo vnvs et qvemadmodvm ille corrigo baptisma non incipio assvm qvi svm de sed prosvm qvi insvm sic et haereticvs qvinqvaginta vnde cyprianvs et qvi cvm is sentio catholicvs ecclesiae qvi nolo praecido non possvm praescribo vnvs qvi vero aliter sapio non expavisco qvia cvm is veneror et petrvs o qvi avtem ab vnitas non recedo gavdeo qvia cvm is aedifico in petra vnvs timor itaqve castvs permaneo in saecvlvm saecvlvm timeo devs omnis semen israhel vnvs timeo qvi diligo non altvs sapio sed hvmilis consentio cvm timor et tremor svvs ipse salvs operor qvinqvaginta devs svm enim qvi operor in is et volo et operor pro bonvs volvntas doivs haec svm ivstitia devs hic svm qvi devs dono homo cvm ivstifico impivs o hic devs ivstitia ignoro svperbvs ivdaei et svvs volens constitvo ivstitia devs non svm svbiectvs o hic svperbia deicio vt hvmilis insero oleaster et ille eo in tenebrae exter de qvi inter alivs reqviro venio ab oriens et occidens mvlti qvi recvmbo cvm abraha et isaac et iacob in regnvm caelvm qvintvs svm enim modo in exter tenebrae vnde correctio despero non svm vnvs qvam si contemo eo in tenebrae exter vbi correctio locvs non svm qvoniam devs lvx svm et tenebrae in is non svm vllvs  sed lvx cor non iste qvi in caro svm ocvlvs qvintvs nec omnino talis hic visibilis lvx phantasia cogito qvamqvam et ibi svm video sed longe aliter longe dissimiliter vnvs qvalis enim lvx svm ipse caritas qvis verbvm explico qvis is res qvi sensvs corpvs adiaceo vllvs demonstro exemplvm an forte lvx caritas non svm avdio apostolvs dico iohannis vnvs ipse qvippe dico qvi modo commemoro qvoniam devs lvx svm et tenebrae in is non svm vllvs qvi rvrsvs dico devs caritas svm pes ac per hic si devs lvx svm et devs caritas svm profecto caritas lvx ipse svm qvi diffvndo in cor noster per spiritvs sanctvs qvi do svm nos vnvs item dico qvi odi frater svvs in tenebrae svm vsqve adhvc vnvs iste svm tenebrae in qvi diabolvs et angelvm is mvltvm svperbior progredior svm qvintvs caritas enim non aemvlor non inflo o ideo non aemvlor qvia non inflo vnvs vbi enim praecedo inflatio continvo seqvor aemvlatio qvoniam svperbia mater svm invidentia vnvs diabolvs igitvr et angelvm is ab lvx atqve fervor caritas aversvs et nimis in svperbia invidia qvovs progredior velvt glacialis dvritia torpeo et ideo per figvra tamqvam in aqvilo pono qvadrantal vnde cvm genvs hvmanvs diabolvs incvbo venio gratia salvator dico in canticvm canticvm exsvrgo aqvilo et venio avster et perflvm hortvs mevs et flvo aromatvs qvinqvaginta exsvrgo qvi irrvo qvi svbdo incvmbo qvi possideo premo o exsvrgo vt ab tvvs pondvs relevo erigo qvi anima premo cvrvo qvintvs et venio avster inqvio spiritvs invoco flo de meridies velvt ab pars fervidvs et lvminosvs vt flvo aromatvs qvintvs vnde apostolvs dico christvs bonvs odor svm in omnis locvs qvintvs hinc etiam dico in qvidam psalmvs converto dominvs captivitas noster sicvt torrens in avster o captivitas scilicet qvi svb diabolvm tamqvam svb aqvilo teneo vbi abvndo iniqvitas frigvo et qvidam modvs congelo qvintvs hinc enim et evangelivm dico qvoniam abvndo iniqvitas refrigesco caritas mvlti qvintvs at vero flo avster glacies resolvo et torrens flvo is svm peccatvm remissvs popvlvs ad christvs caritas concvrro qvinqvaginta hinc et alibi scribo svm sicvt glacies in serenvm ita solvo peccatvm tvvs qvintvs proinde rationalis creo sive in angelicvs spiritvs sive in anima hvmanvs ita facio svm vt svi ipse bonvm qvi beatvs fio svm non possvm sed mvtabilitas is si converto ad incommvtabilis bonvm fio beatvs  vnde si averto miser svm pes aversio is vitivm is et conversio virtvs is svm vnvs natvra ergo non svm malvs qvia creo spiritvs vita rationalis etiam privatvs bonvm qvi participatio beatificor is svm etiam vitiosvs bonvs svm corpvs qvi svpervs svm in corpvs is svm hic lvx qvi sentio ocvlvs caro qvia et ipse corpvs svm vnvs omnis avtem corpvs qvilibet incorporevs natvra praestans non moles qvia non nisi corpvs svm moles sed vis qvidam qvi svpergredior omnis phantasia qvi volvto animvs havrio de sensvs corpvs qvinqvaginta sed qvemadmodvm in ipse corpvs is qvi infervs svm sicvt terra et aqva et ipse aer bonvs fio participatio bonvs is svm cvm lvx illvmino et fervor vegeto sic incorporevs creo rationalis ipse creator fio participatio bonvs cvm is cohaereo pvrvs et sanctvs caritas qvi omnis modvs si careo tenebrisco et obdvrisco qvidam modvs qvintvs proinde infidelis homo tenebrae svm qvintvs qvi per fides converto ad devs qvidam praemitto illvminatio lvx fio o in qvi proficio si ex fides ad species pervenio vt is qvi credo etiam prospicio sicvt tantvm bonvm possvm conspicio mereor perfectvs recipio imago devs qvintvs talis enim dico apostolvs svm aliqvando tenebrae nvnc avtem lvx in dominvs vnvs porro diabolvs et angelvm is tenebrae svm infidelis homo exter qvadrantal mvltvs enim ab ille caritas aversvs et in svvs fastvs obstinatio qvovs progredior svm qvintvs et qvoniam exter ivdicivm dico svm christvs is qvi ad sinister discerno eo in ignis aeternvs qvi paratvs svm diabolvm et angelvs is hic malignvs spiritvs conivngo simvl qvove damno dico eo in tenebrae exter is svm in societas poenalis diabolvm et angelvs is qvintvs hic poena contrarivm svm qvi bonvs servvs dico intra in gavdivm dominvs tvvs vt qvantvs svm iste tenebrae exter tantvs svm lvmen ille intra vnvs non hic per locvs intervallvm inanis phantasma cogito svm qvinqvaginta localis spativm non occvpo nisi corpvs moles qvadrantal non svm hic spiritvs vita non svm hic anima rationalis mvlto parvm devs omnis benignvs conditor et ivstvs ordinator vnvs volvntas et affectvs iste vel propinqvo vel longe fio vel intro vel exeo dico qvintvs sede qvia malvs opvs is svm tenebrose delecto facio seqvor svm avtem poena qvi torqveo ideo dominvs vbi dico tenebrae exter addo etiam ibi svm ploratvs et stridor dens ne talis oblectatio qvalis hic iniqvvs perfrvor qvando infidelitas atqve in pentvm ivstitia tenebrae svm etiam in ille svpplicivm svi vtor dementer existimo qvintvs qvia enim volo inivste vtor bonvm ivste nolo crvcio malvm qvinqvaginta vnde possvm etiam tenebrae exter intelligo poena corporalis qvinqvaginta corpvs qvippe svm anima exter vt svm anima malvm qvi ab caritas lvmen qvintvs aversvs in peccatvm oblecto exter tenebrae corpvs avtem malvm qvi aeternvs in finis torqveo exter tenebrae qvi solvs timeo qvi servilis adhvc timor detineo vnvs nam si is licet in ille exter qvi svm in peccatvm impvne semper volo et involvo profecto nvmqvam volo accedo ad devs et illvmino et inhaereo ille per caritas vbi eo timor castvs permaneo in saecvlvm saecvlvm qvadrantal qvi timor non crvcio sed tenax facio anima bonvm ille o qvi si dimitto cado vnvs meritvs ergo iste qvi satvro vivo cor in saecvlvm saecvlvm qvinqvaginta vita enim christvs svm qvi habito in cor is interim per fides post etiam per species pes video enim nvnc per specvlvm in aenigma tvnc avtem facies ad facies vnvs vnde ipse caritas nvnc in bonvs opvs dilectio exerceo qvi svi ad svbvenio qvaqvaversvs possvm porrigo o et hic latitvdo svm vnvs nvnc longanimitas adversvs tolero et in is qvi veraciter teneo persevero o et hic longitvdo svm vnvs hic avtem totvs propter adipiscor vita facio aeternvs qvi ille promitto in excelsvm o et hic altitvdo svm vnvs exsisto vero ex occvltvm iste caritas vbi fvndatvs qvidam modvs et radicatvs svm vbi cavsa volvntas devs non investigo qvi gratia svm salvvs factvm non ex opvs ivstitia qvi nos facio sed secvndvm is misericordia pes volvntarie qvippe gigno nos verbvm veritas et hic volvntas is in abditvm svm vnvs qvi secretvm profvnditas qvidam modvs expavesco apostolvs clamo o altitvdo d is vis tiar vm sapientia devs ao scientia qvam inscrvtabilis svm ivdicivm is et investigabilis via is qvis enim hinc igitvr svm ille apostolivm qvi reqviro inter cetera pono hic res gratia inqvio flecto genv mevs ad pater dominvs noster iesvs christvs ex qvi omnis paternitas in caelvm et in terra nomino vt do do vos secvndvm divitiae gloria svvs virtvs corroboro per spiritvs is vnvs hic svm divitiae de qvi dico o altitvdo divitiae abdo enim habeo cavsa o vbi nvllvs meritvm praecedo qvis habeo qvi non in caritas inqvio radico et fvndatvs praevaleo comprehendo cvm omnis sanctvs qvintvs iste svm commvnio qvidam divinvs caelestis qvivis respvblica o hinc satvro pavper non svvs qvaero sed qvi iesvs christvs is svm non commodvm privatvs sector sed in commvne vbi salvs omnis svm consvlo qvadrantal nam de ipse panis qvi talis satvro qvidam locvs apostolvs dico vnvs panis vnvs corpvs mvltvs svm video nondvm svi video qvi credo vnvs porro avtem qvi vervs ratio iam qvi tantvmmodo credo intelligo profecto praepono svm is qvi cvpio adhvc intelligo qvi credo vnvs si avtem nec cvpio et is qvi intelligo svm credo tantvmmodo existimo qvi res fides prosvm ignoro vnvs nam pivs fides sine spes et sine caritas svm non volo vnvs sic igitvr homo fidelis debeo credo qvi nondvm video vt visio et spero et amo vnvs et visibilis qvidem res praeteritvs qvi temporaliter transeo solvs fides svm qvoniam non adhvc video spero sed facio et transigo credo qvadrantal sicvt svm ille qvi christvs semel pro peccatvm noster mortvvs svm et resvrgo nec iam morior et mors is vltra non dominor vnvs is vero qvi nondvm svm sed svm svm sicvt nostri spiritalis corpvs resvrrectio ita credo vt etiam video spero sed ostendo modo nvllvs possvm modo qvintvs qvi vero ita svm vt neqve praetereo neqve svm svm sed aeternvs permaneo partim svm invisibilis sicvt ivstitia sicvt sapientia partim visibilis sicvt christvs immortalis iam corpvs vnvs sed invisibilis intelligo conspicio ac per hic et ipse modo qvidam svi congrvo video et cvm video mvlto certvs svm qvam is qvi corpvs sensvs attingo o sed ideo dico invisibilis qvia ocvlvs iste mortalis video omnino non possvm vnvs at ille qvi visibilis svm permaneo possvm si ostendo etiam hic mortalis ocvlvs conspicio sicvt svi discipvlvs post resvrrectio dominvs ostendo sicvt etiam post ascensio apostolvs pavlvs et diaconvs stephanvs qvinqvaginta proinde iste visibilis permaneo ita credo vt etiam si non demonstro spero is nos qvandoqve video nec is conor ratio intellectvs qvove comprehendo nisi vt is qvia visibilis svm ab invisibilis distincte cogito et cvm cogitatio qvalis svm imaginor satis vtiqve nosco is nos notvs non svm vnvs nam et antiochia cogito incognitvs sed non sicvt carthago cognosco o ille qvippe visio cogitatio mevs fingo hic recolo neqvaqvam tamen dvbito sine qvi de ille testis mvltvs sine qvi de iste mevs aspectvs credo vnvs ivstitia vero et sapientia et qvisqvis is modvs svm non aliter imaginor aliter contveror sed hic invisibilis simplex mens atqve ratio intentio intelligo conspicio sine vllvs forma et modvlvs corporalis sine vllvs liniamentvm figvra qvove membrvm sine vllvs localis sive finis sine spativm infinitvs qvintvs ipse qvove lvmen qvi cvnctvs iste discerno in qvi nos satis appareo qvis svi omnis svbicio non pvto o inseparabilis enim svm operatio pater et filivs vnvs alioqvi nec ipse pater svi svbicio omnis sed filivs is svbicio qvi is regnvm trado et evacvo omnis principatvs et sic arbitror christvs trado regnvm devs et pater vt adimo svi o nam et hic qvidam vaniloqvvs credo pentvm cvm enim dico trado regnvm devs et pater non separo ipse qvia simvl cvm pater vnvs devs svm vnvs sed divinvs scriptvra incvriosvs et contentio stvdiosvs fallo verbvm qvi pono svm donec o ita namqve seqvor oportet enim ille regno donec pono inimicvs svb pes svvs tamqvam cvm pono non svm regno nec intelligo ita dico sicvt svm ille confirmo svm cor is  non commoveo donec video svper inimicvs svvs o non enim cvm video iam commoveo pentvm qvis ergo svm cvm trado regnvm devs et pater qvasi modo non habeo regnvm devs et pater vnvs sed qvia omnis ivstvs qvi nvnc regno ex fides vivo mediator devs et homo homo christvs iesvs perdvco svm ad species qvi visio dico idem apostolvs facies ad facies intelligo qvi is gigno pater vt non iam tamqvam exsisto et non habeo do aliqvis sed ipse do vt habeo gigno svm vt svm vnvs non enim sicvt creo ita devs filivs ante incarnatio et ante assvm creo
